Title: Senior IT Engineer [ITE0423]
Skills: Apache TomEE|Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)|Elastic Stack (ELK)|Gitlab|Linux System Administration|Microsoft Products|Tomcat|
Job Description:
About the job

Are you a talented IT Engineer with strong technical skills, and the ability to innovate, multi-task, and work in an agile environment? Then, join our fast-growing team for Product Development and Projects Implementation.


VoiceWeb has been one of the early pioneers of speech and NLP technologies since 2001, building next-generation Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Understanding and Machine Learning products with focus on Multimodal and Cross-Channel User Interfaces for our clients in Europe, Middle East & Africa.


The position requires individuals who enjoy taking on challenges, prioritize and meet deadlines, have a collaborative work ethic and teamwork spirit, working closely with a local and remote team of developers, speech scientists, engineers and subcontractors. The role is hybrid combining a blend of in-office and remote working.


We have:


  • A state-of-the-art, highly innovative Product platform, the first of its kind globally, that we continuously expand/improve to maintain our leadership
  • A team of seasoned experts to collaborate with
  • International clients and projects in 3 continents
  • An open mind to new technologies, methodologies, challenges and innovation


We are looking for you if you have:


  • Minimum 5 years of experience in IT consulting or support
  • A degree in Computer Science, Software Development or related field
  • Experience with Microsoft Windows / Microsoft Office / Microsoft 365 products
  • Thorough knowledge of Linux Administration
  • Experience in areas such as Networking, Security, DB Administration, Backups
  • Experience with any infrastructure monitoring tool (open source or commercial)
  • Solid experience in the deployment and administration of web application stacks (e.g. Nginx, Apache, Tomcat / TomEE / PHP-FPM).
  • High attention to detail including precise and effective customer communications. Ability to manage multiple & competing priorities simultaneously
  • Proven track record of taking ownership and successfully delivering results in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
  • Experience in software QA methodologies, tools, and processes is considered a plus


Optionally, you might also have experience with:


  • JIRA/ Confluence
  • Familiarity with network protocols relevant to speech processing, such as: SIP, MRCP, RTP, DTMF, SDP, HTTP, Websockets, and VXML.
  • Container Orchestration: Nomad, Kubernetes, Docker Swarm (standalone or their cloud offerings by Azure/GCP/AWS)
  • Git merge request review and approve
  • Build tools & scripts (Maven or similar like Ant, Gradle)
  • CI/CD tools: Gitlab, CircleCI, Jenkins or similar like Bamboo, Hudson or TravisCI
  • Configuration Management tools such as: Ansible, Puppet, Chef, Salt
  • Application Performance & Monitoring: Elastic Stack
  • Central Log Management: Grafana, Prometheus, Kafka, Application Traces
  • Experience with Observability Toolbox such as Sentry
  • Experience with Sonarqube, Junit and Selenium integration into a devops pipeline
  • Experience in one or more of the following technology sectors: IVR/CTI, ASR/STT or similar
  • Domain knowledge in Customer Service/Contact Center applications
  • ISTQB Foundation Level Certification


You are:


  • Proficient in English, both verbal and written
  • Hard worker, task, deliverables and quality oriented
  • Highly knowledgeable and efficient in standards and documentation
  • Self-motivated, with demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities
  • Fun to work with and be around, like we are
  • Passionate, enthusiastic and with a desire to meet objectives and company targets
  • Responsible and accountable, with multi-tasking abilities, sound judgment and professionalism
  • Efficient, proactive, organized, with problem solving and time management skills
  • Quick to adjust inside a rapid-changing environment


We offer:


  • An attractive remuneration package
  • Private insurance & health plan
  • Continuous learning/training and research in new technologies, methodologies and innovations
  • A great environment to work in, excel and progress professionally
  • An excellent opportunity for international career development within a dynamic, fast moving market sector offering demonstrable career challenges internationally


If you want to join a team of global leaders in their field, send your CV to careers@voiceweb.eu referencing the position code. All applications will be treated in strict confidentiality. Only suitable candidates will be contacted.

Title: The Best Civil 3D Expert
Skills: Autodesk Civil 3D|Autodesk InfraWorks|Infrastructure Projects|Navisworks|Scrumban|
Job Description:
About the job

At a glance

Race is looking for a senior true expert in Autodesk's Civil 3D software to contribute to the firm’s strategic transition towards generative design, and to the development of infrastructure transportation projects (mostly motorways and railroads) from conception through to completion.


Featured Projects in Greece

Thessaloniki ring road - Flyover urban motorway (PPP project)

Patra - Pyrgos motorway (concession project)

The Hellinikon Development program (mega real estate development)


About You

You are very keen to work-for, and shape-in, the backbone of the firm’s transition towards generative design.

You will (learn to) operate in an environment that embraces Design Thinking and Scrumban methodology, and you will definitely (learn how to) create value for our society and the shareholders - in that order.

You will have a say in how infrastructure mega-projects will look like and operate, and you will collaborate with challenging teams, from different engineering disciplines.


Responsibilities

  • Co-lead firm’s operations transition to generative design.
  • Reshape and upgrade firm’s existing technical procedures and automations in infrastructure design and engineering.
  • Train firm’s project teams in Civil 3D best practices.
  • Contribute to the design and development of large-scale engineering projects in a timely and sustainable manner.
  • Build up road models that satisfy technical and permitting specifications.
  • Provide advice and resolve creatively any emerging deficiencies and wicked problems.
  • Liaise with a variety of stakeholders.
  • Comply with guidelines and regulations including design approvals, permits, etc. and deliver technical files and other technical documentation as required.


Main Challenge

To intervene and change our clients (concessionaires and main contractors) value chain on how big infrastructure projects (should) get done.


Qualifications (in that order)

  1. High ethical and professional values.
  2. Value-driven mindset (not task-driven).
  3. Team building.
  4. Synthetic thinking.
  5. Problem solving.
  6. Strong communication and interpersonal skills (mostly in listening).
  7. Any professional qualification and real-life experience in Agile Project Management is a big plus.


Requirements

  • Excellent knowledge and deep experience in the Civil 3D software.
  • Experience in Infraworks, Navisworks and Vault Autodesk’s software will be considered as a big plus.
  • Proven working experience in the design and engineering of medium to large scale civil infrastructure and/or transportation projects.
  • Proficiency in road alignment layout, grading, utility design, etc.
  • Professional proficiency in Greek and English languages.


Benefits

  • Very competitive financial package
  • Performance bonus
  • Work - Life balance
  • Great Networking
  • Continuous Learning, Training & Development

Title: Presales Consultant - System Architect (2301)
Skills: Bid Management|Bid Writing|Contract Negotiation|English|Microsoft Excel|Microsoft Office|Microsoft Outlook|Microsoft PowerPoint|Presales|Project Management|
Job Description:
About the job

QUALITY & RELIABILITY S.A. (“Q&R S.A.”) is an international technology innovator with a broad portfolio of software products and services within the primary industry segments in which it operates.


We are looking for a motivated Presales Consultant – System Architect who will be part of a presales and bidding team with primary responsibility to write proposals for large-scale Public & Private Sector Tenders in Greece and abroad. The role includes strong interactions with the Sales and the Operation Departments.


Responsibilities

  • Actively guiding team members in the presales process and writes proposals for customers.
  • Participates in the assessment and design of complex ITC projects, challenging the proposed solutions based on technical, functional, and financial requirements.
  • Bid management (co-ordination internally and externally with partners).
  • Participate in the preparation of a winning proposal according to Tender or Customer Requirements.
  • Identify and engage all appropriate personnel to develop, review or approve relevant sections of the proposal.
  • Support the company during the contract negotiations phase as required, managing changes from the submitted proposal.
  • Prepare and present sales offers, lead the technical and commercial discussion, in order to get the sales orders executed.
  • Propose the appropriate IaaS (Public – Private Cloud) & SaaS solutions that best address customer needs.
  • Liaise thoroughly with internal and external business Partners, combining technical advice to design and fulfil the best possible solution for customer’s needs.

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s Degree in a technical, operational, or similar field; Master’s Degree or MBA preferred.
  • 3 or more years proven hands-on experience in Bid Management, Bid Writing and Presales, IT Project Management or IT Consulting included.
  • Ability in explaining and presenting technical solutions
  • Excellent verbal, written and presentational skills in both Greek and English.
  • Highly proficient in MS Office Suite (Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, and Excel).
  • Willingness to travel for client meetings as required.


Pluses:

  • Relevant technical certifications


Skills

  • Project management skills, a strong sense of urgency, and relentless commitment to meeting deadlines and exceeding customer expectations.
  • Team Player
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

· Opportunity to learn new technologies and build knowledge, techniques, and experience on top of existing know-how.

You are/have:

· Strong skills in teamwork, communication, analytical thinking and problem solving

· Ability to work both independently and in a team

· Strong communication and interpersonal skills

· Organized and methodical

What is there for you

· We want our people to be well compensated, so we offer an attractive salary package

· Health is the most important asset, so we have you secured with a health insurance plan from day one.

· You will appreciate the ticket restaurant card and you will enjoy spending it for yourself and your family.

· Being a member of our company is a gift to us. Therefore, we give you a gift expenses card to show you our appreciation.

· Everyone needs a vacation, so a vacation expenses card is a benefit that will allow you to enjoy more this special period of year.

· We are excited for challenges, so you are invited to take part in exciting, innovative projects that make a difference.

· We never stop learning and evolving! We encourage our people to follow the pace by providing them Udemy Online Training Courses, so that they adapt new tech skills and develop their soft skills.

· Most important, we work as a team, so we gather on a smaller and bigger occasions to celebrate good times together! Happy Fridays, bowling sessions, running events and everything that help us have fun and enjoy working to our team.

For information regarding our company, current projects, and openings please visit our website: www.qnr.com.gr

*All applications will be treated as strictly confidential

Title: Trade Marketing & Business Insights Specialist Greece, Cyprus, Malta
Skills: Business Insights|Category Management|Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG)|Interpersonal Skills|Market Planning|Presentations|Sales & Marketing|Sales Analysis|Sales Metrics|Trade Marketing|
Job Description:
About the job

Job Location: Athens, Greece


Company Description


Ferrero is a family-owned company with a truly progressive and global outlook and iconic brands such as Nutella®, Tic Tac®, Ferrero Rocher®, Raffaello®, Kinder Bueno® and Kinder Surprise®. As the love for our brands continues to grow, so too does our global reach. Represented in more than 50 countries, with products sold in more than 170, the Ferrero Group is loved by generations around the world. The secret to our global success? 38,767 dedicated employees who celebrate care and quality to craft a business, careers and brands we are proud of. Join us, and you could be one of them.


Diversity Statement


Ferrero is committed to building a diverse and inclusive culture in which all employees feel welcomed and appreciated and have the same opportunities. We believe all of our people are equally talented in their own way. In nurturing the curiosity and natural abilities of our employees, we provide them, generation after generation, the means to succeed personally and professionally, enabling them to craft their journey at Ferrero. The diversity of our talents is what makes our work environment multicultural, innovative and highly rewarding.


About the Role:


If you have advanced analytical skills, commercial mindset, you like challenges & have great energy and passion this is the opportunity you were looking for.


As a Trade Marketing & Business Insights Specialist you will be identifying, evaluating, and pursuing business development opportunities that will contribute to the BU's short- and long-term business goals.


You are going to collect, compile verify, and analyze sales, competition, market & other information about actual business and business potential, supporting strategic and operational decisions based on deep understanding of category/channel/retailer/market dynamics.


Main Responsibilities:


  • Monitor and analyze internal sales, trade, competitors, and related shopper market data to identify business opportunities and propose trade marketing plans & tactics
  • Prepares regular analysis and presentation about execution and results of promo activities, providing feedback and future improvements to sales & marketing
  • Set-up and analysis of KPIs about customers/channels performance assessing and identifying opportunities to growth by category/brand
  • Identify categories insights to tackle new business opportunities
  • Builds up standardized, ad-hoc reports & dashboards to follow key sales metrics for execution results of Ferrero (and competitors') promotions & in-store activities
  • Elaborates on commercial argumentations & in the development of business plans to support Sales on yearly/session/ad-hoc negotiations with customers
  • Monitors the distributors’ promo calendar of activities for clients
  • Participate in category management projects & help customers to meet their shoppers’ needs through development tactics
  • Communicate, co-operate with people in multiple departments


Who we are looking for:


Job Requirements:


  • Bachelors’ degree in Business/Economics/Engineering or any related field
  • At least 3 - 5 years working experience on trade marketing, business insights or sales analysis departments
  • Business acumen, understanding of the FMCG industry dynamics
  • Advanced analytical & presentation skills
  • Skilled use all the Microsoft Office Programs (Excel & Power Point)
  • Good knowledge of SAP, BW, IRI / Nielsen platforms is an advantage
  • Fluency in English & Greek
  • Master’s Degree would be considered as an extra asset


Desired traits:


  • Excellent in interpreting data and driving value adding & actionable insights
  • Commercial mindset, identifying opportunities
  • Professional with strong interpersonal skills
  • Flexible & results-orientated
  • Organized person with high accountability
  • Proactive and team player


How to be successful in the role and at Ferrero:


Consumers, quality and care are at the heart of everything we do.


So, to be successful at Ferrero, you’ll need to be just as consumer and product centric as we are - dedicated to crafting brilliant results for consumers around the world.


We encourage all our people to think creatively to set personal targets and objectives and push new, better ways to work.


Employee contribution and engagement at Ferrero is based on three dimensions: individual, team and organization that’s why you should have the ability to work independently, proactively and as a team member.


A demonstrable great organizing skill and ability to collaborate at all organizational levels will help you in building your position among stakeholders and achieve team goals.

Title: Cooks B' & C'
Skills: Boutique Hotels|Cooking|Culinary Arts|Fine Dining|Mediterranean Cuisine|Resorts|Villas|
Job Description:
About the job

Ψάχνεις εργασία στο χώρο του fine dining; Θες να εξελιχθείς στη 5* γαστρονομική σκηνή της Σαντορίνης;

Στείλε μας το βιογραφικό σου!


Το Santo Collection Resorts & Villas του Metaxa Hospitality Group αναζητά για τη βραβευμένη γαστρονομική ομάδα του, για τη σαιζόν 2023:


COOKS B' & COOKS C'

(ζεστή και κρύα κουζίνα)


COOKS B (ζεστή ή κρύα κουζίνα)

Ενδεικτικές αρμοδιότητες θέσης:

  • Διατήρηση καθαρής και τακτοποιημένης κουζίνας
  • Εκτέλεση οδηγιών Α΄Μάγειρα και Executive Chef
  • Συμμόρφωση με τις διατροφικές οδηγίες και τους κανόνες υγιεινής

Απαραίτητα προσόντα:

  • Αποδεδειγμένη εμπειρία τουλάχιστον 2 ετών σε οργανωμένη κουζίνα
  • Πτυχίο σχολής μαγειρικής τέχνης

Επιθυμητά προσόντα:

  • Αποδεδειγμένη εμπειρία τουλάχιστον 2 ετών σε A la Carte εστιατόριο σε θέση Μάγειρα Β΄
  • Εργασιακή εμπειρία στην Σαντορίνη ή σε άλλον πολυτελή προορισμό


COOKS C (ζεστή ή κρύα κουζίνα)

Ενδεικτικές αρμοδιότητες θέσης:

  • Εκτέλεση οδηγιών Α΄,Β΄ Μάγειρα και Executive Chef
  • Προετοιμασία πρώτων υλών (κοπές των λαχανικών, προετοιμασία κρεάτων, θαλασσινών, μαρινάδες)
  • Εκτέλεση ανατεθειμένων παρασκευών

Απαραίτητα προσόντα:

  • Αποδεδειγμένη εμπειρία τουλάχιστον 1 έτους σε οργανωμένη κουζίνα
  • Πτυχίο σχολής μαγειρικής τέχνης

Επιθυμητά προσόντα:

  • Αποδεδειγμένη εμπειρία τουλάχιστον 1 έτους σε A la Carte εστιατόριο σε θέση Μάγειρα Γ΄


Προσφέρουμε:

  • Ανταγωνιστική αμοιβή αναλόγως προϋπηρεσίας
  • Διατροφή στο Staff Restaurant
  • Διαμονή στα εξοπλισμένα και άνετα Staff Houses (ένας συγκάτοικος maximum)
  • Μετακίνηση με τα σύγχρονα transfers συνεργαζόμενης εταιρείας
  • Εξαιρετικό κλίμα εργασίας με κέντρο τον άνθρωπο (εταιρικοί διαγωνισμοί και εταιρικές επιβραβεύσεις, ''Employee of the Month'' και ''Employee of the Year'')
  • Αποπληρωμή εισιτηρίου (τιμή ακτοπλοϊκού) για την άφιξη και την αναχώρηση στη Σαντορίνη
  • Bonus Τέκνου (εάν έχεις γίνει πρόσφατα γονιός) και Bonus Γάμου (εάν έχεις παντρευτεί πρόσφατα)
  • Bonus Ολοκλήρωσης της σαιζόν και Bonus Σύστασης νέου εργαζομένου
  • Δωρεάν πρόσβαση σε εκπαιδεύσεις και προοπτικές εξέλιξης


Στείλε μας το βιογραφικό σου στο hr@metaxahospitality.gr


Βρες το επόμενο επαγγελματικό βήμα που θα σε βοηθήσει να ξεχωρίσεις στα Santo Collection Resorts & Villas.

Work with us – Dream with us – Grow with us

Title: Senior Unity Developer
Skills: C#|Computer Science|Control Systems|Game Development|Research and Development (R&D)|SDKs|Scripting|Unity|Version Control|iOS|
Job Description:
About the job

Senior Unity Developer


As a senior Unity developer in FM GAMES, you will help the team by maintaining existing features and/or implementing new ones in our games’ backbone library. Occasionally you will also work on existing or new games on our portfolio.


In this role, you will join a diverse, multi-national team and:


  • Create, debug, maintain and optimize our games’ code, backend library, editors and related tools used for our games’ development.
  • Offer technical solutions, innovate and improve the quality of implementation, performance and usability of our games’ code, library, editor and tool chain as a whole.
  • Keep the existing libraries and tools up to date, in accordance with the latest changes occurring in the development pipeline (e.g. new SDKs or middleware versions).
  • Implement new features and services in close partnership with the rest of our teams and with respect for the player’s comfort and game’s performance.
  • Write technical design documents, reports and documentation for milestones and internal use.


To be successful in this role, you must have:


  • A minimum 5 years of working experience in game development.
  • Hands-on experience with Unity3D engine (editor and scripting).
  • Excellent knowledge writing C# and software engineering patterns.
  • Availability to work with and/or implement new APIs and concepts.
  • Able to work on projects that might involve a lot of changes.
  • Able and interested to work in highly iterative processes and R&D.
  • Experience working with source control systems such as Git in a multi developer team environment.
  • Experience in using Jira.
  • Used to communicating effectively with both technical and non-technical parties.
  • Able to provide guidance to the programming team.
  • Proficiency in spoken and written English.
  • Bachelor's Degree Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field


Extra bonus for (make sure to mention any below that applies to you in your cover letter):


  • Experience in implementing Android and/or iOS native plugins.
  • Experience with scripting languages.
  • We do love cover letters! Tell us a bit more beyond your CV, what made you apply here with us, how did you find us, etc.


Location:


The position is open for the candidate to work in Athens, Greece. We are working as hybrid at the moment, and can provide assistance with hardware and home office setup.


Our office is located in the beautiful southern sector of Athens right next to a Metro station with all the modern amenities where you will be based. Occasionally you might be required to travel to our offices in Limassol (Cyprus).


We are offering:


  • Competitive remuneration packages
  • Private health insurance
  • 23 days off + public holidays.
  • Comfortable offices in the most vibrant location of Limassol and Athens
  • A company environment that wants to see you succeed and level up!


About FM Games


FM GAMES was founded in 2015 by a team of experienced entrepreneurs with strong backgrounds in building international digital business ventures. Looking for their next challenge, they saw a big opportunity to build a company that focuses on all-time classic card and board games, bringing them to the fast-growing mobile audience.


FM GAMES was built on the culture of being adventurous, generous and with just a dash of mischievous fun. We celebrate people who dare to make a difference each day. Our team has the freedom to pursue projects that are stimulating and rewarding, in an environment that celebrates change and progress, and in a company that knows that our people are the reason for our success.


Today, FM GAMES manages a growing portfolio of 15+ games across all major mobile platforms, created and maintained by over 30 experts across all disciplines. Our games touch the lives of people and entertain gamers of all ages all around the world. They are played every day by hundreds of thousands of people, and have been downloaded to millions of devices.

Title: Senior IT & Cloud Administrator
Skills: Azure Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)|Cloud Infrastructure|Cloud Services|Employee Benefits|Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)|Network Security|System Configuration|Virtual Machines|
Job Description:
About the job

We are looking for an agile and experienced Senior IT & Cloud Administrator to join our team. This is a fantastic career opportunity for a proactive, highly motivated individual, who possesses excellent technical skills and expertise in the operation and administration of on-premise and cloud-based infrastructures and services along with proven technical troubleshooting skills.


Key Responsibilities


  • Advise and participate with IT Leadership in the identification and development of Cloud platform strategies.
  • Design, implement, configure, and maintain various Azure SaaS Cloud Services such as Azure AD, AIP, ATP, ASR, CAS, EM+S, Teams, Intune, AAD Connect, Exchange Online.
  • Deploy and maintain Azure IaaS Virtual Machines and Azure Application and Networking Services to support growth into the cloud.
  • Optimize Azure buildouts for cost/performance (VM optimization, reserved instances, etc.)
  • Recommend, develop, plan, manage, implement, and fully document IT projects
  • Identify improvements to IT documentation, network maps, processes/procedures, and tickets
  • Research products and new technologies to increase efficiency of business and operations
  • Ensure System configuration is consistent with institutional policies/procedures.
  • Communicate technical/complex information both verbally and in writing to peers, senior management, and other non-technical personnel.
  • Provide the project teams the appropriate support regarding cloud-specific expertise when implementing solutions
  • Support development and production system environments, and provide technical support to users
  • Install and maintain third-party application software, maintaining continuity with licensing and maintenance agreements.
  • Monitor and tune system for performance.
  • Administer system security, data backups and recoveries.


Required skills/experience


  • 5 or more years of working experience
  • Bachelor or Master’s degree or equivalent experience.
  • Microsoft Azure certification
  • Good knowledge of network administration, TCP/IP protocols, Internet services (DNS, FTP, etc.), Windows family protocols
  • Good knowledge of firewall principles
  • Fluency in English (oral and written)
  • Container and Orchestration Experience with APIs and Microservices (Kubernetes, Docker)
  • Hands-on experience in cloud infrastructure and best practices
  • An ability to establish and maintain cooperation, understanding, trust and credibility within the team.
  • Perform multiple tasks concurrently and respond to emergency situations effectively.
  • Ability to work on multiple IT projects, as well as manage day to day operations.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills.


Benefits


  • We offer a highly competitive salary and benefits, directly dependent on the candidate’s qualifications and skills.
  • Excellent working environment which encourages team spirit, cooperation and continuous learning.
  • Flexibility to work remotely
  • Long term employment, holidays and vacation time, career opportunity with professional growth and development


Does this sound like you?

Please send your CV to recruit@validata-software.com quoting ‘C-Cloud0323’ in the subject.

Title: Integration Engineer
Skills: Automation|ERP Software|IT Integration|Java|SQL|Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP)|Software Development|Software as a Service (SaaS)|Spring Framework|Technical Assistance|
Job Description:
About the job

Description


As our Integration Engineer, you will be part of one of the most critical functions of our platform, which is Document Exchange between Shipping and Supplier Companies. You will be expected to work in a fast and competitive environment, take on responsibilities and collaborate effectively with the other members of the team. We are looking for a person who will be excited about the prospect of working for a pioneering technology company.


Requirements


The right candidate will have experience in building applications, including hands-on development using technologies such as Java, Spring Framework. The candidate should also be willing to take on a business role, communicating with clients both in Greece and abroad.


  • Knowledge or experience on integrations/software connections (JSON & XML files, APIs, SFTP)
  • Experience in sql (pl/SQL) will be considered a plus.
  • Demonstration of a deep technical background and willingness to work hard and undertake technical challenges
  • Very diligent with high attention to detail and able to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Excellent organizational, operational & communication skills
  • Software Engineering background will be considered a strong plus
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills in both Greek & English
  • Combination of high-level education and work experience will be considered positively


Responsibilities


• Create from scratch or extend existing company tools to build integration applications. (XML over Rest/FTP based communication)

• Use best software engineering practices

• Automate processes for testing/deployment high availability

• Facilitate communication between Business, Developers and Clients

• Attend technical meetings with customers and drive them to correct integration specifications

• Organize, track and maintain existing & new integrations with clients' systems

• Provide technical assistance to the business department and to clients

• Engage in subsystems’ design analysis and integrate with the overall system

• Define system specifications, input/output processes and hardware or software compatibility

• Code integration activities and perform branch integration

• Develop and automate change validation to tools before roll out and handle validation

• Assist clients in testing integrated interfaces


Benefits


• Attractive compensation package based on experience and skill-set

• Friendly & collaborative work environment

• Career growth opportunities

Title: Junior Financial Analyst
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business Planning|Business Strategy|Economics|Financial Analysis|Financial Risk Management|Financial Statements|Quantitative Analytics|Quantitative Finance|Regulatory Requirements|
Job Description:
About the job

HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO APPLY YOUR EDUCATION IN EXCITING AND MEANINGFUL WAYS FROM DAY 1? ARE YOU PASSIONATE ABOUT CRUNCHING THE NUMBERS TO DRIVE STRATEGY IN A SUBSTANTIAL WAY? IF SO, WE HAVE THE PERFECT ROLE FOR YOU.


We are seeking passionate leaders who make things happen, analytical thinkers and problem solvers, and excellent communicators to develop your knowledge and management abilities for a dynamic-fast-moving consumer goods company.


YOUR ROLE AS A FINANCIAL ANALYST YOU WILL BE:


  • the leader in strategy development and execution, providing objective BUSINESS insights to achieve the right balance for sustainable growth.
  • one of the STEWARDS of the company, delivering accurate financial reports, prudent financial risk management and compliance to external regulatory requirements.
  • business process specialist, championing SIMPLIFICATION while delivering the business objectives.
  • the finance leader on a team with representatives from various other functions that is responsible for a brand or category. Within these teams, you will find strong collaboration among team members and an environment where everyone's opinions are valued and encouraged to be shared. Our focus is to win as a team with everyone's strong individual contributions.
  • responsible setting strategy, decision-making, business planning, and analysis across all aspects of the business.


WHAT WE OFFER:


  • Responsibilities as of Day 1– you will feel the ownership of your project from the beginning, and you will be given specific projects and responsibilities’
  • Business topics at the heart of today’s news– Evolving channels (Discounters, E-commerce), competition, and customers' reality makes working in a consumer good's business dynamic every single day!
  • Recognized Financial leadership- Our finance people are part of every multi-functional team and are the key actors in business development and decision-making.
  • Continuous coaching & mentoring– you will work with passionate people and receive both formal training as well as day-to-day mentoring from your manager
  • Dynamic and respectful work environment– employees are at the core; we value every individual and encourage initiatives promoting agility and work/life balance


BECOMING PART OF P&G, YOU WILL BENEFIT OF:


  • Competitive salary package, annual bonus and vacation bonus
  • Private medical insurance & life insurance
  • Stock Ownership Plan -You have the opportunity to buy P&G shares quoted on the New York Stock Exchange to participate in the profits of the Company and the company will match part of the investments
  • Flexible working schedule & Hybrid Work from Home/Work from Officeoption
  • Access to a variety of learning and development platforms,including Bookster, LinkedIn Learning, Harvard Business Review etc.
  • Employee Assistance Program– confidential expert guidance and specialist support on any work, wellbeing, emotional, financial, physical or family issue.


Qualifications


  • Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, Banking, Business Administration or any related field, coupled with a passion for numbers and business strategy
  • Proven ability to make business recommendations based on financial analysis and understanding of business strategy
  • Previously worked with big data sets and the ability to present the data efficiently to support business decisions - would be preferred
  • Strong analytical thinking
  • Collaboration and leadership skills, able to empower and influence
  • Excellent command of English


ABOUT US:


We produce globally recognized brands and we grow the best business leaders in the industry. With a portfolio of trusted brands as diverse as ours, it is paramount our leaders are able to lead with courage the vast array of brands, categories and functions. We serve consumers around the world with one of the strongest portfolios of trusted, quality, leadership brands, including Always®, Ariel®, Gillette®, Head & Shoulders®, Herbal Essences®, Oral-B®, Pampers®, Pantene®, Tampax® and more. Our community includes operations in approximately 70 countries worldwide.


Visit http://www.pg.com to know more.


Our consumers are diverse and our talents - internally - mirror this diversity to best serve it. That is why we’re committed to building a winning culture based on Inclusion and our ideal candidate is passionate about the same principle: you will join our daily effort of being “in touch” so we craft brands and products to improve the lives of the world’s consumers now and in the future. We want you to inspire us with your unrivaled ideas.


We are committed to providing equal opportunities in employment. We do not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, color, gender, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, citizenship, disability, veteran status, HIV/AIDS status, or any other legally protected factor.

Title: Retail Salesperson
Skills: Bicycle|Bicycle Repair|Motorcycle|Retail Sales|
Job Description:
About the job

Πωλητής Υπάλληλος Καταστήματος στην Αρτέμιδα Αττικής


Η εταιρία GATSOULIS ασχολείται με την εμπορία ποδηλάτων, μικρών μοτοσυκλετών, ανταλλακτικών, αξεσουάρ και λοιπού εξοπλισμού τους. Είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες εταιρίες στο χώρο και αποτελεί αντιπρόσωπο πολλών παγκοσμίως καταξιωμένων brand.


Ο ρόλος:

Θα αναλάβεις να εξυπηρετείς τους λάτρεις του ποδηλάτου και της μοτοσυκλέτας στο κατάστημα μας στην Αρτέμιδα Αττικής.


Τι θα αναλάβεις:

  • Την εξυπηρέτηση των πελατών του καταστήματος, την εύρεση των κατάλληλων λύσεων για το ποδήλατό ή τη μοτοσυκλέτα τους και φυσικά την διεκπεραίωση πωλήσεων
  • Την παροχή υψηλού επιπέδου υπηρεσιών εξυπηρέτησης στους πελάτες του καταστήματος
  • Τη παροχή τεχνικής υποστήριξης/σέρβις στο κομμάτι του ποδηλάτου
  • Να τηρείς την εφαρμογή των πολιτικών, διαδικασιών & των κανόνων λειτουργίας που διέπουν την εταιρία
  • Να υποστηρίζεις συνολικά την λειτουργία του καταστήματος (έλεγχος διαθεσιμότητας αποθήκης, παραγγελίες κτλ)
  • Να συμμετέχεις ενεργά στην οργάνωση του χώρου έκθεσης, την προετοιμασία και τη σωστή παρουσίαση των προϊόντων


Τι αναζητούμε:

  • Μια ευχάριστη προσωπικότητα με ταλέντο στην πώληση ή τη τεχνική υποστήριξη και έντονο ενδιαφέρον για το ποδήλατο ή τη μοτοσυκλέτα
  • Πιθανή εμπειρία στις πωλήσεις ή το σερβις στο τομέα του ποδηλάτου, της μοτοσυκλέτας ή παρόμοιου αντικείμενου είναι plus αλλά όχι υποχρεωτική
  • Προσανατολισμός στην άψογη εξυπηρέτηση του πελάτη
  • Άριστες επικοινωνιακές ικανότητες με διαφορετικούς τύπους πελατών
  • Άριστη γνώση Ελληνικής γλώσσας και ικανοποιητική γνώση Αγγλικών
  • Υπευθυνότητα και ομαδικό πνεύμα
  • Εμπειρία στην χρήση ηλεκτρονικού υπολογιστή και εφαρμογών ERP


Θέλουμε έναν/μια υποψήφια με υψηλό αίσθημα ευθύνης που να έχει επιθυμία για συνεχή ενημέρωση και παρακολούθηση των εξελίξεων στο τομέα του ποδηλάτου και της μοτοσυκλέτας.


Things to know:

• Ωράριο Καταστημάτων στην Περιφέρεια Ανατολικής Αττικής

• Μόνιμη εργασία με σταθερό ωράριο

Title: Customer Service Representative (German Speaker B2)
Skills: Communication|Customer Service|English|German|Information Technology|Multilingual|Networking|Sales|
Job Description:
About the job

Job Overview:


The Customer Support Representative (CSR) is responsible for providing support to a wide range of services. As the first point of contact, the CSR will represent the Brand Promise by delivering a low-effort experience and driving a complete resolution of the customer’s needs. The CSR will support customers, partners, and employees through a variety of channels such as phone, email, and chat. Complex and out-of-scope work will be passed quickly to the next level of support.


What we’re looking for:


Fluency in written and spoken English and German.

Minimum of 6 months of outstanding customer service experience in a service-driven environment.

Computer savvy and confident in my ability to make full use of the Internet.

A great listener ensures a thorough understanding of the support request and remains calm in stressful situations.

Decisive, identifying root causes and going beyond initial symptoms, and thinking strategically.

Focused on outcome ensuring a satisfactory resolution for the customer.

Learns rapidly and eagerly, understanding customer and business needs.

Confident, self-driven, and inspires others to excel.

Contributes to our effort to reduce complexity by generating new ideas/solutions.

Proactive and open to sharing information and continuously seeking what is best for the customer.

Excellent oral and written English communication skills.

Excellent problem-solving skills.

Empathy and related soft skills to build customer rapport.


Education:


The minimum degree is a diploma in Business related field or Modern Languages Experience.

0-4 years of experience in a customer support environment.

Title: Insurance Sales Representative
Skills: General Insurance|Insurance|Insurance Sales|Sales|
Job Description:
About the job

Θέσεις εσωτερικών πωλητών/πωλητριών ασφαλιστικών προϊόντων για την εταιρεία InsuranceBeat AE για τη Κεντρική, Δυτική Ελλάδα και Πελοπόννησο.


Περιγραφή θέσης

  • Παρουσίαση και προώθηση των εταιρικών ασφαλιστικών προϊόντων στη Κεντρική, Δυτική Ελλάδα και στη Πελοπόννησο.
  • Συμβάσεις συνεργατών.
  • Επικοινωνία, εξυπηρέτηση και παροχή τεχνικής υποστήριξης στους συνεργάτες της εταιρείας πριν και μετά την πώληση.
  • Ανάληψη της εμπορικής ανάπτυξης του δικτύου συνεργατών της περιοχής ευθύνης του, αναπτύσσοντας σχέσεις συνεργασίας με υφιστάμενους και νέους συνεργάτες.
  • Παρακολούθηση και ενημέρωση της εμπορικής διεύθυνσης για τις τρέχουσες εξελίξεις και τάσεις της αγοράς και του ανταγωνισμού.


Απαραίτητα προσόντα

  • Προϋπηρεσία τουλάχιστον 1 έτους σε ανάλογη θέση. Η προϋπηρεσία σε εταιρεία του ασφαλιστικού κλάδου και η κατοχή πιστοποίησης για τη διαμεσολάβηση και σύναψη ασφαλιστικών συμβάσεων θα εκτιμηθούν ιδιαίτερα.
  • Άριστη γνώση και δυνατότητα χειρισμού της αγγλικής γλώσσας στον γραπτό και προφορικό λόγο – ασφαλιστική ορολογία – Κάτοχος Proficiency.
  • Άριστη γνώση MS Office
  • Άριστη γνώση της ασφαλιστικής αγοράς αυτοκινήτου αλλά και των λοιπών κλάδων ασφάλισης.
  • Εξοικείωση με την διαχείριση ηλεκτρονικού αρχείου και καταχώρηση δεδομένων.
  • Δυνατότητα πολύ καλής επικοινωνίας με συνεργάτες/πελάτες.
  • Επαγγελματική εμφάνιση, συνέπεια και υπευθυνότητα.
  • Άριστη ικανότητα επικοινωνίας, διαχείρισης, διαπραγμάτευσης με τους πελάτες/συνεργάτες και απόδοση σε συνθήκες πίεσης.

Προσφέρονται

  • 5νθήμερη απασχόληση (full time).
  • Μηνιαίες αποδοχές με βάση τα προσόντα και τα έτη εμπειρίας στο κλάδο ασφάλισης.
  • Αμοιβές – μπόνους βάση στόχων.
  • Προοπτικές εξέλιξης και συνεχή Εκπαίδευση.
  • Σύγχρονο εργασιακό περιβάλλον.
  • Εταιρικό αυτοκίνητο.
  • Εταιρικό κινητό και Laptop.

Title: Software Support Consultant
Skills: CRM Software|Customer Relationship Management (CRM)|Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)|Infor Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)|Microsoft SQL Server|Troubleshooting|
Job Description:
About the job

Description:

The ERP Software Support Consultant will work closely with the clients’ users and he/she will be our company’s link between our products and the client’s needs.


Responsibilities & tasks:

  • Support and analysis on clients' needs
  • Technical online software support
  • Perform advanced troubleshooting
  • Perform SQL queries

Qualifications & Skills:

  • Working experience in ERP/ CRM software
  • Working experience in MS-SQL

Title: Talent Acquisition Consultant
Skills: Communication|Critical Thinking|Greek|Human Resources (HR)|Interpersonal Skills|Interviewing|Recruiting|Stakeholder Management|Talent Management|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Role purpose:
Our HR function enables the organisation to maximise the contribution of people to the delivery of our strategic goals. In our Talent Acquisition team, we are seeking for a TA Consultant, who will be responsible for the end-to-end delivery of recruiting projects, serving various business units.

Key accountabilities and ownership:
  • Delivers end-to-end recruitment projects of various seniority levels and functions, ensuring both speed and quality of hires
  • Partners with HR Business Partners and hiring managers to analyse hiring needs and develop effective attraction and sourcing strategies to successfully identify best-in-class talent
  • Builds talent pipelines across different skill categories, through research and sourcing of passive candidates
  • Assesses internal and external candidates’ skills, behaviours and potential, using competency-based methodology to conclude on a shortlist
  • Participates in Employer Branding initiatives and represents Vodafone in career fairs, events and meet-ups of different communities
  • Plays a key role in assessment centres for “Discover” youth talent development program
  • Drives a fully digital recruiting process, using SAP Success Factors, AI-driven platforms and digital tools
  • Provides input in global and local TA dashboards, keeping track of critical KPIs (ie. candidate experience, diversity, time-to-hire) that support data-driven HR and Business decision making
  • As a member of an agile TA community of practice, collaborates with other internal TA experts at a global and local level, following agile team rituals, co-working on special projects and sharing best practices
  • Develops and maintains solid relationships with candidates, hiring managers and HR Business Partners, providing expert consultation


Skills and competencies:


  • Strong stakeholder management skills and efficiency in managing multiple projects in a tech-driven, fast-paced and agile environment
  • Advanced communication, negotiation and interpersonal skills, being able to effectively connect experienced and youth talent with our EVP
  • Strong critical thinking and judgement ability
  • Learning agility, resilience, genuine curiosity and restless desire for making the difference
  • Ability to combine speed and quality of deliverables
  • Creativity to identify new opportunities in attracting and recruiting high-caliber candidates
  • Robust online presence and familiarity with LinkedIn and other social media and professional networks
  • Experience in agile methodology and environment will be considered an asset

Why you should get Ready for the challenge:
  • You will have the opportunity to advocate internally and externally a high-performing brand
  • You will gain high internal and external exposure, working closely with the HR function and experts from different business areas
  • This role is your chance to drive the change you want to see in the Vodafone world!
  • You will work closely with professionals who share the same passion for talent management, workplace culture, DEI and employee experience

Must have professional qualifications:
  • 3-5 years of experience in Talent Acquisition
  • Executive Search or Recruiting Agency experience will be considered a plus
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both Greek and English

What's in it for you:
  •   Competitive pay, bonus and remuneration package
  • Private health & medical insurance
  • Hybrid way of working: a blend of remote (60%) and office-based (40%) working, including the option to work up to 20 days from abroad
  •   Remote work equipment to help you create a comfortable, ergonomic workspace at home
  •   Unlimited access to learning resources and trainings
  •   Vodafone Parental Leave: 16 weeks of fully paid parental leave to all employees regardless of gender, sexual orientation or length of service
  •   Spirit of Vodafone Day: one day each quarter dedicated to your personal development
  •   Extra days off: Vodafone Day, Family Day, Volunteering Day
  •   Needless to say, we cater for your communication wherever you are
  • Office amenities (subject to the office location): such as restaurant, beauty corner, gym and parking
  • Special employee offers and discounts


#Vodafonespirit #Togetherwecan

Title: Senior Backend .NET Software Engineer - Tech Lead
Skills: .NET Core|.NET Framework|API Development|Application Programming Interfaces (API)|C (Programming Language)|C#|Debugging|Model-View-Controller (MVC)|Problem Solving|SQL|
Job Description:
About the job

Let’s Build the Next Industrial Revolution Together


Behind every product is a person


At Vimachem, we’re using technology to empower the people who manufacture medicines for our world. This is why we are developing the world’s biggest manufacturing intelligence AI platform that saves lives. The technology is self-developed and proprietary and is used daily by decision-makers to optimize pharmaceutical manufacturing and product quality.


What’s In for You

As a Senior Backend Software Engineer – Tech Lead, you will be part of an Agile / Scrum squad developing the Vimachem OptimZ Platform. This is a role where you develop new applications from scratch and if this excites you this is the place to be. You will also work closely with the Software Architect and the CTO in deciding the architecture and technology stack.


Tech stack

  • C# / .NET 5
  • Angular 12
  • Mongo DB
  • MS SQL Server
  • TimescaleDB
  • RabbitMQ
  • Redis
  • Azure DevOps for CI


What will you do?

  • Create new solutions and see them through, from conception to production;
  • Turn requirements into simple and sophisticated technological systems. Our large scale, highly available infrastructure is at the core of that challenge;
  • Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code;
  • Research new technologies to find new and efficient ways to solve day to day challenges;
  • Ship high-value features quickly;
  • Challenge the status quo and improve the team and product.


Skills and Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree (or equivalent work experience or specialized training) in Information Technology (IT), Computer Science (CS), Software Engineering, or related discipline.
  • At least 5 years’ experience in .NET Technology: C#, .NET MVC, .NET Core, Web API Development.
  • At least 4 years’ experience with .NET Core and WebAPI.
  • Experience working with large-scale distributed architecture and microservices is a plus.
  • Good understanding of basic web technologies such as HTTP, REST, etc.
  • Practical understanding of algorithms and design patterns
  • Experience with testing (Unit/Integration) and TDD.
  • Experience with SQL Server and Entity Framework.
  • Experience developing high performance production API driven web applications.
  • High attention to detail, pride yourself on delivering intuitive software that is high quality.
  • Detail-oriented, focusing on writing maintainable code of high quality (Clean Code, Clean Architecture)
  • Have a positive mindset, be proactive and a team player
  • A thirst for learning and a passion for new technologies, processes and patterns.
  • Excellent problem solving and debugging skills.


Working At Vimachem:

We are building a strong, diverse team that values hard work, families, and personal wellbeing.

Benefits of working with us include:

  • Competitive salary and sign on bonus.
  • We offer a hybrid or fully remote working environment with outmost flexibility.
  • Benefits package including Health insurance, Life insurance, Short-term Disability, Long-term Disability, Commuter Benefits, Parental Leave, and Retirement Plan.
  • Monthly allowance for lunch & commuting expenses.
  • Continuous training and LinkedIn Learning accounts.
  • A buddy will support you with onboarding.
  • Latest i7, lots of RAM, fast SSD.
  • Fitness subsidies.
  • Virtual company events, free office snacks and happy hours.
  • Relocation package and relocation bonus for Greek expats.


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. Help us build an inclusive community that will transform manufacturing.

Title: Registered Nurse
Skills: Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS)|Basic Life Support (BLS)|Nursing|
Job Description:
About the job

We are currently seeking a highly skilled Registered Nurse to join our medical team at a construction site in Halkidiki.

Responsibilities

  • Triage and assign cases to the doctor. Provide first aid support to cases (illnesses/injuries) as appropriate.
  • Assist the doctor in the assessment and immediate treatment of illness or injury.
  • Assist to stabilize and monitor medical and trauma cases that are serious enough to require evacuation to a larger medical facility.
  • Keep a detailed and factual medical record of all cases seen including diagnosis, treatment given and final disposition, and apply appropriate confidentiality to the records.
  • Responsible for setting up the emergency room in readiness to receiving and managing cases arriving at the site clinic.
  • Undertake patient medical escort to facilities in the immediate project location and/or to main centers of medical excellence in Greece.
  • As directed by the doctor, provide advice and necessary assistance to client and sub-contractors’ personnel on the measures to be taken for the physical and mental health of all personnel in a specific working environment.
  • Assist the doctor in the provision of advise on the implementation of measures to protect the health of employees and to prevent accidents
  • Monitor inventory daily for medications and other supplies to ensure continuous availability and acceptable levels of medications, disposable items and equipment.
  • Maintain a controlled drug register in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
  • Undertake the appropriate management and maintenance of the Clinic inventory including the ambulances in a manner that aligns with internationally accepted standards and pass audit inspections.
  • Undertake the routine checks on Ambulances assigned to the project and ensure the appropriate documentation, reporting and records keeping.
  • Carry out clinic equipment checks, recording and monitoring of calibration schedules to ensure that all medical equipment and its consumables are in date, functional and clean.
  • Carry out oxygen checks; when ordering oxygen, factor the logistic arrangements in the planning.
  • Work with the site in preparing preventive vaccination plans for staff on the project


What we look for

  • Qualified Nurse Professional (AEI / TEI)
  • Hold a valid license to practice as a Nurse in Greece
  • Trained and qualified in Advanced Trauma Life Support (ATLS), Advanced Cardiac life Support (ACLS) or Basic Life Support experience.
  • English proficiency is required both verbal and written; additional language(s) is an advantage
  • Excellent computer skills especially in Microsoft office.
  • Ability to take ownership and work on its own.


﻿What we offer

  • Competitive Compensation Package
  • Coverage for Food & Accommodation

Title: Senior Business Consultant, Investment Management Software
Skills: Client Services|Consulting|Financial Instruments|Financial Software|Investment Management|Portfolio Management|Risk Management Software|Software Implementation|
Job Description:
About the job

Finvent, since 2001, a successful regional provider of award-winning software and services for the investment management industry and the exclusive distributor and professional services partner of SS&C Advent Software.

Our clients span 15+ countries and include asset managers, wealth managers, Pension Funds, hedge funds, family offices, fund managers, and fund administrators. Our solutions streamline their processes for portfolio management, trading, and order management, risk management & compliance, portfolio accounting, fund distribution, remote client services, performance analytics, reporting, and more.

Description

We are seeking a talented and service-minded person to join our team as Senior Business Consultant, Investment & Risk Management Software Unit.

In this role, you will help our clients across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa optimize business workflows, by implementing and advising on technology solutions to streamline their processes, for increased efficiencies and reduced operational risk. Given the geographical spread of our client base, this role is ideal for candidates who are flexible in terms of traveling and enjoy exploring different cultures and business practices across the globe.

This is a unique opportunity to blend financial industry knowledge with technology skills, in a vibrant, international work environment. You get to tap into the knowledge of leading financial institutions as well as our experienced team, to learn and develop skills that will ultimately help you progress your career, and grow a solid network within the fin-tech industry.

Responsibilities

Typical tasks include workflow analysis, business requirement specification, system configuration, data conversion, specification of custom deliverables, system testing, user training, and client communication. You will also advise on potential enhancements to clients’ technology stack and processes.

Delivering business and technical consulting services of high quality, on time, and on budget, as part of implementation projects is an important tenet of this position.

Communicating clearly to clients and ensuring that the correct expectations are set throughout the entire project.

Contributing to senior strategic and service review meetings with clients as necessary.

Building and maintaining good working relationships with clients as well as internal teams and partners, and handling issues related to any aspect of the services provided.


Qualifications & Skills

  • Relevant work experience (consulting, asset management or financial software).
  • Strong IT/technical skills (MS Windows, MS SQL, MS IIS, integration tools, reporting tools, scheduling, networks and databases).
  • Understanding of the investment management industry & practical experience of financial instruments (stocks, bonds, funds, derivatives, private equity).
  • Postgraduate degree in a related field
  • Prior knowledge of Advent systems is a strong plus, but not a requirement.
  • Ability to work independently as well as with others in a team environment.
  • Flexibility to travel to different regions if required.

· Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Greek is required. Communication skills in additional European languages skills are very desirable.

Benefits

On top of challenging work and a competitive salary, we are offering:

• Competitive salary and bonus payment plans

• Private health & medical insurance plan

• International product certification and continuous training programs

• International travel and global professional experience as well as working flexibility

• Become part of a mission-driven team that constantly learns and improves

• Be part of a socially responsible entity and with a group of like-minded people

Your race, age, ethnicity or disability, gender identity, and expression make no difference to Finvent. We want to attract, develop, promote, and retain the best people based only on their abilities and professional behavior.

CV Submission (in English) & Communication Address:

hr@finvent.com

CODE: CON23

All applications are confidential.

Please Respond ONLY if you comply with most Job Qualifications

Disclaimer: Finvent collects and processes personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are bound to use the information provided within your job application for recruitment purposes only and not to share these with any third parties. We will keep your resume in our database for potential future consideration.

In case you want to be deleted from our database you can contact us via email at hr@finvent.com
