Title: Associate Lawyer Position for Mergers & Acquisitions
Skills: Analytical Skills|Command|Commercial Awareness|Communication|Contract Law|English|Legal Document Preparation|Legal Issues|Legal Writing|Relationship Building|
Job Description:
About the job

Description of Position

POTAMITISVEKRIS is currently looking for an associate to join its dynamic and

highly motivating legal practice. By joining us you will become part of a collegial and continuously growing group, dealing with a diversified client portfolio and varied caseload, mainly in the field of corporate law, M&A and sale of loan portfolios.

YOUR ROLE


As an associate you will focus on the delivery of client engagements by understanding expectations and demonstrating personal accountability, exercising effective communication and relationship-building skills.

In your role you will commit to personal learning and development, explore opportunities to make an impact by delivering sound legal work and demonstrate a committed and client orientated work ethic.

OUR REQUIREMENTS


Our ideal candidate is a bright and motivated lawyer that focuses on delivering work of utmost quality, commits to high levels of service and is able to build strong client relationships.

We expect that the candidate can demonstrate interpersonal and organizational skills and work effectively within a team.

Also, the candidate must have commercial awareness, an outstanding command of the English language and thorough analytical and drafting skills.

Last, to qualify for the role, candidates must have:

• A law degree from a Greek law school

• An LL.M. from a prominent, well-acclaimed law school (preferably in the US or the UK)

• Qualified as an attorney-at-law in Greece

• 2 – 5 years of relevant prior experience

APPLICATION


To apply for this position, please send us your resume and a cover letter explaining why you want to join us and what you have to offer to: careers@potamitisvekris.com In the Subject Field of the e-mail please write NS_0223.

If you apply for any role within POTAMITISVEKRIS your personal data will be processed in accordance with our recruitment privacy notice.

Title: Senior Pharmacovigilance & Medical Information Officer
Skills: Health Care Professionals|MedDRA|Pharmaceuticals|Pharmacovigilance|
Job Description:
About the job

The position lies within the Pharmacovigilance Department led by the Pharmacovigilance Head.

The position implements daily operations of the Pharmacovigilance department, including the processes for collection, monitoring, processing, distribution and regulatory reporting of safety information, aggregates reporting and information queries for medicinal products, medical devices, cosmetics, and food supplements. Ensure timely and high-quality deliverables, as per clients’ contract terms, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and applicable Pharmacovigilance regulatory requirements.

Act as a Medical Information Officer providing up to date, accurate and relevant medical, pharmaceutical and technical information in response to internal and external medical information inquiries received.


Main Responsibilities

  • Support the Pharmacovigilance Manager in the performance of drug safety related duties
  • Records, screens and categorizes reports of adverse drug reactions in post marketing environment and clinical studies
  • Coordinates tracking and evaluation of adverse drug reaction reports
  • Compiles and submits reports on cases of suspected adverse drug reactions to authorities in accordance with applicable regulations
  • Manage case-related information including interpretation of medical conditions, lab results, and procedures as well as compile complete narrative summaries; and ensure proper coding (MedDRA) into the global safety database
  • Reports adverse events to internal sources and external regulatory authorities
  • Screens local and global literature for expediting safety reports
  • Generate documentation required for regulatory authorities
  • Respond to inquiries from health care professionals, consumers, and company personnel regarding safety issues with marketed products
  • Contribute to the preparation of periodic reports, aggregate safety reports, and safety analyses
  • Provide drug safety guidance and training to our clients’ employees
  • Ensure adherence to SOPs and other process documents
  • Participate in audits/inspections’ preparation and in CAPA development and implementation
  • Maintains and uses Pharmacovigilance Database and other relevant data collection tools
  • Ensure procedures in relation to safety monitoring are being adhered to regulatory requirements
  • Maintain knowledge of local and European pharmacovigilance regulations and keep abreast of regulatory and scientific developments
  • Provide approved responses to medical inquiries from external customers including healthcare professionals and patients.
  • Prepare responses to inquiries based on research in the literature
  • Review of all Medical Information enquiries for the presence of safety data which if identified is reported to the Pharmacovigilance Department in accordance Standard Operating Procedures
  • Build, review and maintain local medical information content (i.e. standard response letters, literature comparisons, slide decks).
  • Maintaining medical records, which may include collecting data on patient symptoms, diagnoses, treatments, and outcomes

Requirements

  • University Degree in Health Science’s field (or medical background) is required
  • At least 2 years of relevant experience is required
  • Knowledge of Materiovigilance & Cosmetovigilance is desirable
  • Solid working knowledge of National and European safety regulatory requirements and guidelines
  • Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills in both English and Greek.
  • Able to search, understand and summarize scientific literature
  • Ability to manage multiple and varied tasks and prioritize workload with attention to detail
  • Strong customer service-oriented approach
  • Excellent computer skills (including word processing, spread sheet, and data base management applications)


What we offer

Creative Pharma & HR Services is offering a competitive remuneration package according to the Industry’s standards. Nonetheless, we are also proud at Creative Pharma & HR Services that we are an open and learning organization that fosters a collaborative, enthusiastic, fast paced working environment, and for that reason we invest in people’s potential and growth.

By sending your CV to us you accept our “Privacy Statement and Terms for submitting your Curriculum Vitae”.

Title: Civil Engineer
Skills: Building Codes|Civil Engineering|Construction|Construction Supervision|Corporate Management|Cost Effective|Engineering|English|Project Management|Renovation|
Job Description:
About the job

Join the team of I.T.G Group!! A successful real estate development company with over 300 completed projects, as a Project manager Supervisor . We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced civil engineer to supervise the construction of our real estate projects across Greece.


Responsibilities:

  • Manage the process of project budgeting
  • Communicate with Architects, contractors and suppliers to ensure timely and cost-effective completion of projects
  • Supervise the renovation process and check the implementation of construction plans in site.
  • Monitor and control the renovation Timeline
  • Provide monthly updates on the progress of renovation projects to company management.
  • Ensure compliance with local/state regulations and building codes
  • Collaborate with other departments to ensure timely and efficient processing of renovation projects
  • Issuing “Property ID” Documents.


Requirements:

  • Completed Bachelor's degree (AEI/TEI) in Civil Engineering, member of the Technical Chamber of Greece
  • 3+ years of experience in Construction supervision
  • Strong knowledge of building codes, regulations and laws
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a high level of English proficiency
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team


If you are passionate about the development of creative projects and have professional knowledge in the field of construction, we want to hear from you!

Title: Product Application Engineer
Skills: Communication|Interpersonal Communication|Offer Creation|Presentation Skills|
Job Description:
About the job

Our partner Schneider Electric is leading the Digital Transformation of Energy Management and Automation in Homes, Buildings, Data Centers, Infrastructure and Industries. With global presence in over 100 countries, Schneider is the indisputable leader in Power Management – Medium Voltage, Low Voltage and Secure Power, and in Automation Systems. They provide integrated efficiency solutions, combining energy, automation and software. In their global Ecosystem, they collaborate with the largest Partner, Integrator and Developer Community on their Open Platform to deliver real-time control and operational efficiency. They believe that great people and partners make Schneider a great company and that their commitment to Innovation, Diversity and Sustainability ensures that Life Is On everywhere, for everyone and at every moment.


www.schneider-electric.gr


Mission: As a Product Application Engineer, your role is to be the technical expert of the power systems in the sales team, enhancing the relationship with key customers and partners. Your passion for energy efficiency solutions, sustainability and customer service should drive your success in this role. You will consult and guide customers on new products and solutions, supporting their development while upskilling your own technical and commercial aptitude. Your electrical engineering background and technical sales expertise will make you the go-to person for all power product needs. To be successful you will need to find joy in working with electrical switchboards and love to collaborate with sales to materialize power solutions. You will love to join Schneider Electric Greece in their mission to make a difference in the industry, providing sustainable and efficient power solutions to the world.


You will be Responsible to:

  • Complement sales as a presales and aftersales technical expert.
  • Support the sales team by analyzing the customer requests and converting them into a technical proposal
  • Support the offer creation process in close cooperation with all sales teams (mainly for switchboard of the future, selectivity studies, energy efficiency applications, power products)
  • Complement the sales leads by providing added value-based solutions to the customers
  • Establish and develop the digital competencies and offer of our network of partners to deliver digital Schneider Solutions.
  • Cover ad hoc project needs (follow-up, provide any extra documentation needed)
  • Follow up on the entire sales process from demand generation until project completion
  • Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through increased availability/access, timely communication, placing accurate orders, and following up on accounts
  • Take pleasure in communicating directly with the customers. Be their technical guiding point and trainer of Schneider products


Candidate Profile

  • up to 3 years in similar position is a good start to capture the potetiality University or Technical Institute of Electrical or Automations Engineering Degree
  • Excellent oral and written command of the English and Greek language
  • Advanced PC Skills, especially regarding MS Office Suite
  • 1-3 years of Experience in a similar position will be considered a plus


Competences

  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills
  • Target-driven, with the ability to take initiative
  • Ability to challenge processes and implement improved working methods
  • Ability to influence, develop and manage partners
  • Presentation skills
  • Customer focused
  • Global mindset willing to adapt in a multi-cultural environment
  • Team player, ability to interact with colleagues at all levels


The Company Offers

  • A competitive remuneration package of stable base salary and bonus
  • Ticket Restaurant Card
  • Company Car (with the choice of a full electric car)
  • Private medical insurance
  • Pension Plan
  • But above all the opportunity to work with other like-minded individuals who have sustainability, energy efficiency and future generations first in mind


Please note this is not a sponsored job only EU citizens will be considered and only those who can also speak and write Greek

Title: Senior Software Engineer in Java
Skills: Angular|Databases|English|Java|NoSQL|Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)|SQL|Software Development|Spring Boot|Spring Framework|
Job Description:
About the job

Description

PRODYNA focuses on customer experience, by designing, implementing, and operating custom software applications for mid to large size enterprises. We are committed to offering our customers innovative and future-proof solutions, through digitalisation and cloud computing strategies. As a member of Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF), PRODYNA promotes speed, agility, and scalability in software development.

A few words about you working with us

We are about to expand our team in SKG!

We are looking for a skilled Senior Software Engineer to join our team, which consistently raises the bar on innovation, customer experience and technical services.

What you will be working on

You will be working mainly on external client projects. Take a look here: https://www.prodyna.com/en/customers

The tech stack will be Spring Boot, Java EE, React, Angular.

Your daily tasks

  • Develop software solutions based on Java and Open Source technologies (e.g. Spring Boot, Java EE, React, Angular)
  • Analyze and evaluate technical requirements
  • Work closely in cross-functional teams with agile methodologies
  • Preserve and optimize the quality of our applications while proactively ensure the highest level of quality standards in the solutions provided to our customers
  • Train and advise customers in technologies, methods, and processes

Schedule

This is a full time 40-hour per week role.

We expect you to be available on a daily basis, during operation hours (10:00 to 18:00)

Location

This job follows the hybrid model. Feel free to organize your weekly programme & choose your days in the office

You can work from our offices at SKG


Experience

We expect you to perform and take initiative based on your professional experience

Skills

  • Five (5) years of professional experience in software engineering in Java technologies and/or knowledge of OOP programming language
  • Professional knowledge of databases (both SQL and NoSQL)
  • You are self-motivated and self-managed. You can take initiative on what to work on a given day from a pool of available tasks with clear priorities. If you are blocked by an external issue, you communicate the situation and then work on the next available task
  • Strong communicative skills so you can clearly and professionally express your thoughts, concerns, and feedback both verbally and in writing (English/Greek). You can communicate both within the company and to external stakeholders, like clients or open-source contributors

Benefits

Compensation & Perks

  • Salary: We will settle on the exact compensation amount based on prior experience and skills.
  • Private health insurance & Life Insurance from day #1
  • Health management scheme (weekly sessions & monthly challenges)
  • 25 vacation days
  • Team events tech oriented and more
  • International network
  • Lunch in the office
  • Employee referral programme/ bonus

Dedicated budget for:

  • Employee education ~ 800€
  • Hardware selection (MacBook or Lenovo ThinkPad) with your own mobile ~ 3000€

Title: Sales Development Representative - German or Dutch Speaker (Hybrid)
Skills: Business-to-Business (B2B)|Coordinate Meetings|Dutch|E-Commerce|Inside Sales|Lead Generation|Lead Qualification|LinkedIn Sales Navigator|Sales Development|Skilled Multi-tasker|
Job Description:
About the job

Description

We are looking for talented and competitive Sales Development Representatives (German or Dutch speaking) that thrive in a quick sales cycle environment. An SDR will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable making calls, generating interest, qualifying prospects and arrange meetings with prospects.


Responsibilities

  • Build new leads and relationships through communication via email, cold-calls and social media (LinkedIn)
  • Identify and implement effective strategies to improve our outbound inside sales
  • Generate leads from outbound cold calls and emails
  • Lead sales pipeline generation through our CRM Software
  • Understand customer needs and requirements
  • Move and maintain leads through the sales pipeline and coordinate meetings with Sales Executives
  • Achieve quarterly quotas
  • Maintain and expand your database of prospects within your assigned territory


﻿Requirements

  • 1+ years of experience in a B2B Business/Sales Development role within Retail/E-Commerce Industry
  • Track record of over-achieving quota
  • Strong phone presence and experience dialing dozens of calls per day
  • Salesforce & LinkedIn Sales Navigator prior experience
  • Professional knowledge oral & written of German language for German speaking candidates
  • Professional knowledge oral & written of Dutch language for Dutch speaking candidates
  • Professional knowledge oral & written of English language for both German & Dutch speaking candidates
  • Excellent verbal and written communications skills
  • Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively


Benefits

  • Competitive Salary
  • Private health insurance plan
  • Performance bonuses according to achievable targets and KPIs
  • Work from home and from the office (hybrid model)
  • Birthday day-off
  • A modern office environment (when visited) with free snacks, coffee, and team lunches
  • Welcome kit with accessories and onboarding gifts
  • Excellent career growth opportunities
  • Company-sponsored social events & activities


About us﻿

TGNDATA is leading the Premium Price Intelligence Data & Analytics realm. Our platform is used mainly by Fortune 500 firms, recognized Retailers & powerful Brands like Wolt, Stanley Black & Decker, AS, LeroyMerlin, MediaMarktSaturn Retail Group, Douglas Parfumes Group, IKEA, Intersport, Philips, Deutsche Telekom, Samsung, Groupama, Dixons Carphone, Bol, Blokker, Signa Group and a few hundred more from 35 countries!

We currently monitor and analyze data from over 62mil products, in more than 53K online retailers in 10 sectors, from insurance market products to consumer electronics and from sports apparel to car parts. A growing team of 35 talented engineers, data specialists, sales & marketing, HR, and customer consultants have been recognized as one of the most performing scale-ups & our CEO is for the 3rd year in a row on the FORTUNE's 40u40 list!

Title: Bartender
Skills: Design|Garden|
Job Description:
About the job

Τα ξενοδοχεία COLORS, έχοντας ήδη παρουσία σε Θεσσαλονίκη και Αθήνα, προσφέρουν μία μοναδική εμπειρία σε όλους τους πελάτες τους, συνδυάζοντας σύγχρονο design και εξαιρετική φιλοξενία με προσωποποιημένη εξυπηρέτηση.


Στην Θεσσαλονίκη, το Garden Bar που λειτουργούμε έχει γνωρίσει μεγάλη επιτυχία και αποτελεί πλέον σημείο αναφοράς σαν ένα από τα καλύτερα Casual εστιατόρια της πόλης.Το μενού μας είναι brunch και στην συνέχεια μετατρέπεται σε ένα all-day Wine and Cocktails Restaurant.


Η θέση που προσφέρουμε είναι για full-time εργασία, 12 μήνες στην Θεσσαλονίκη. Πέρα από την μοναδική κουλτούρα των COLORS, οι εργαζόμενοι μας απολαμβάνουν:

  • Ξεκάθαρο περιβάλλον ανάπτυξης και καθοδήγησης
  • Συνεργασία με κορυφαίους managers και directors
  • Σταθερό περιβάλλον με ασφάλεια και μεγάλο χώρο για πρωτοβουλίες
  • Σταθερότητα σε πληρωμές και παροχές
  • Ευκαιρία για προσωπική ανάπτυξη εντός ενός αναγνωρισμένου ομίλου.
  • Εξαιρετικό κλίμα ομάδας
  • Σταθερή καθοδήγηση και εκπαίδευση


Bartender


• Αποδεδειγμένη εμπειρία στην ίδια θέση

• Υπεύθυνος/η για την ομαλή λειτουργία του bar

• Άριστη γνώση των classic cocktails, και δυνατότητα παρασκευής signature cocktails

• Καλή διαχείριση των αποθεμάτων

• Επικοινωνία με τους πελάτες / κάλυψη εξατομικευμένων αναγκών

• Διαχείριση παραπόνων και άμεση εξάλειψή τους

• Προσαρμοστικότητα, απόδοση υπό συνθήκες πίεσης

• Επαγγελματισμός, υπευθυνότητα

• Κριτική σκέψη και ικανότητα επίλυσης προβλημάτων

• Ηγετικές ικανότητες και πνεύμα ομαδικότητας

Title: Business Intelligence Analyst
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business Analytics|Business Intelligence (BI)|Data Analysis|Data Modeling|Finance|Microsoft Excel|
Job Description:
About the job

FAMAR is a European contract manufacturing and development partner for the pharmaceutical and health & beauty industry. Building on our 70 years’ expertise, we deliver flexible solutions, from development to production and distribution. Driven by our customer-care mindset, we offer services covering the majority of pharmaceutical forms, while providing a particularly strong expertise in Liquids, Ointments and Creams. Through the outstanding knowledge and commitment of our 1850 employees and with a network of 6 production sites, we supply a wide range of 1800 products in 125 international markets

We are currently looking for a dynamic and passionate professional to fill the position of Business Intelligence Analyst.



Business Intelligence Analyst

(BIA_4.2023)



The Business Intelligence Analyst will provide ongoing insights to the Commercial Department by gathering, analyzing and compiling data needed to identify trends and patterns and monitor results, for the purpose of supporting the Commercial and Sales Operations in meeting the set objectives.



Main Accountabilities / Responsibilities:


More specifically, the Business Intelligence Analyst is responsible for the following:


Market Intelligence

• Conduct data analysis, mapping and modeling of market intelligence, costing and target pricing information

• Prepare and deliver budget analysis reporting, segmentation, profiling analytics and KPIs

• Maintain, analyze and utilize IQVIA platform and other external intelligence tools

• Conduct data modeling for focus selling campaigns, campaign setup and reporting



Reporting

• Consolidate and report commercial sales data (i.e. new business agreements, quotation status)

• Report closing of the month, end of year, year-end results

• Monitor and report Business Development activity (Lead Management, Sales Effectiveness)

• Prepare data analytics for management reports and other ad-hoc analysis reports

• Administer, maintain and develop Commercial Operations’ Power BI reporting platform

• Liaise for CRM / ERP Master Data setup and maintenance of related business data



Support to Sales

• Provide reporting process and systems guidance to sales team



Candidate’s Profile:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Finance, Mathematics
  • Understanding of costing and price strategies
  • Knowledge of Power BI and DAX, experience with data modeling
  • Advance skills in Microsoft Excel, excellent command of MS Office
  • Ability to analyze large sets of data, identify patterns and trends and draw meaningful insights
  • Project management skills, ability to manage timelines and setting priorities
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills

Title: Guest Experience Agent - Concierge
Skills: Boutique|Complaint Management|Concierge Services|Email|Guest Service Management|Interpersonal Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Ψάχνεις εργασία στο χώρο του πολυτελούς τουρισμού; Σου αρέσει να δημιουργείς εμπειρίες, ενώ εξελίσσεσαι σε έναν αναγνωρισμένο όμιλο φιλοξενίας; Στείλε μας το βιογραφικό σου!


Τα Santo Collection Resorts & Villas στην Οία Σαντορίνης, του Metaxa Hospitality Group, αναζητά για το τμήμα Guest Experience, για τη σεζόν 2023:


Guest Experience Agent

Ενδεικτικές Αρμοδιότητες Θέσης:

  • Παροχή πληροφοριών για τις ανέσεις, την περιοχή και τους χώρους, καθώς και προώθηση υπηρεσιών
  • Αντιμετώπιση παραπόνων των πελατών και διαβίβαση τους στον αρμόδιο, εφόσον είναι απαραίτητο
  • Ενημέρωση πελατών για τις υπηρεσίες του ξενοδοχείου μας


Απαραίτητα προσόντα:

  • Αποδεδειγμένη εμπειρία τουλάχιστον 1 έτους σε θέση Guest Service ή Υποδοχή σε ξενοδοχειακή μονάδα 5*
  • Άριστη γνώση αγγλικών
  • Γνώση Windows


Επιθυμητά προσόντα

  • Πτυχίο ΑΕΙ/ΤΕΙ/ΙΕΚ Τουριστικών Επαγγελμάτων, Hospitality Management ή συναφούς κατεύθυνσης
  • Γνώση επιπλέον ξένων γλωσσών (Γαλλικά, Γερμανικά, Ιταλικά)
  • Γνώση Opera
  • Προϋπηρεσία στη Σαντορίνη


Προσφέρουμε

  • Διατροφή στο Staff Restaurant
  • Διαμονή στα εξοπλισμένα και άνετα Staff Houses (ένας συγκάτοικος maximum)
  • Μετακίνηση με τα σύγχρονα transfers συνεργαζόμενης εταιρείας
  • Εξαιρετικό κλίμα εργασίας με κέντρο τον άνθρωπο (εταιρικοί διαγωνισμοί και εταιρικές επιβραβεύσεις, ''Employee of the Month'' και ''Employee of the Year'')
  • Αποπληρωμή εισιτηρίου (τιμή ακτοπλοϊκού) για την άφιξη και την αναχώρηση στη Σαντορίνη
  • Bonus Τέκνου (εάν έχεις γίνει πρόσφατα γονιός) και Bonus Γάμου (εάν έχεις παντρευτεί πρόσφατα)
  • Bonus Ολοκλήρωσης της σαιζόν και Bonus Σύστασης νέου εργαζομένου
  • Δωρεάν πρόσβαση σε Εκπαιδεύσεις και προοπτικές επαγγελματικής εξέλιξης


Στείλε μας το βιογραφικό σου στο hr@metaxahospitality.gr


Βρες το επόμενο επαγγελματικό βήμα που θα σε βοηθήσει να ξεχωρίσεις στα Santo Collection Resorts & Villas.

Work with us – Dream with us – Grow with us

Title: Warehouse Team Leader
Skills: Team Leadership|WTL|
Job Description:
About the job

Θες να εργαστείς κι εσύ σε μία από τις πιο δυναμικές επιχειρήσεις στην Ελλάδα;


Στη ΦΟΥΡΝΑΡΑΚΗΣ Α.Ε. αναπτύσσουμε, εμπορευόμαστε και διακινούμε τα πιο δυνατά brands βιομηχανικών εργαλείων και μηχανημάτων. Τα τελευταία 40 χρόνια κατέχουμε ηγετική θέση στην ελληνική αγορά, ενώ βρισκόμαστε ανάμεσα στις 17 πιο δυναμικές επιχειρήσεις στην Ελλάδα (Growth Awards 2021). Παράλληλα η εταιρεία γνωρίζει μεγάλη ανάπτυξη σε 22 χώρες, με στόχο να γίνει ένας από τους βασικούς παίκτες στον τομέα των εργαλείων χειρός και ηλεκτρικών εργαλείων σε όλη την Ευρώπη. Επενδύουμε συνεχώς στην ανάπτυξη των δεξιοτήτων των ανθρώπων μας και στην ανάπτυξη τους σύμφωνα με τις δικές τους ικανότητες. Το μέλλον της εταιρείας μας εξαρτάται από τους ανθρώπους μας, επομένως η πρόσληψη νέων ταλέντων είναι πρωταρχικής σημασίας για εμάς, πέρα και επάνω από τις προκλήσεις που αντιμετωπίζουν οι εργοδότες στις μέρες μας. Η ανάγκη να έχουμε τους σωστούς ανθρώπους, με τις κατάλληλες δεξιότητες και νοοτροπία την κατάλληλη στιγμή είναι πιο επιτακτική από κάθε άλλη φορά, και αισθανόμαστε περήφανοι που αυξάνουμε το εργατικό δυναμικό μας κατά 20% κάθε χρόνο τα τελευταία χρόνια, επενδύοντας στην πρόσληψη νέων ανθρώπων.

Στο πλαίσιο λοιπόν της διαρκούς ανάπτυξής μας, αναζητούμε τον κατάλληλο υποψήφιο για τη θέση:


Warehouse Team Leader – Προϊστάμενο Τομέα


(Κωδ. Θέσης: WTL)


Αρμοδιότητες:


  • Συντονισμός μελών ομάδας εργασίας υπό την ευθύνη του
  • Έλεγχος διαδικασιών και διεκπεραίωση ενεργειών καθημερινής λειτουργίας της αποθήκης
  • Εκπαίδευση χρηστών
  • Κατανομή και διαχείριση των πόρων του προσωπικού σύμφωνα με τις μεταβαλλόμενες ανάγκες των εργασιών


Απαραίτητα προσόντα:


  • Προϋπηρεσία σε ανάλογη θέση τουλάχιστον 3 ετών
  • Εκπληρωμένες στρατιωτικές υποχρεώσεις
  • Καθαρό ποινικό μητρώο
  • Ευελιξία ωραρίου, εργασία σε βάρδιες
  • Επιθυμητή προϋπηρεσία σε μηχανογραφημένη αποθήκη
  • Ομαδικό πνεύμα, υπευθυνότητα, πρωτοβουλία, εργατικότητα

Title: Night Auditor
Skills: Check-in|Communication|Confidentiality|Microsoft Office|Tourism|
Job Description:
About the job

Nema Design Hotel & Spa, a 5 stars boutique property in Chersonissos, Crete, that offers an unparalleled experience of accommodation and services. An elegant adults-only facility with exceptional design elements and high standards of guest services. It is our main priority to invest in people, the core of our exceptional services. Working here is about creating memorable experiences for our mutual guests as well as an amazing future for yourself as a professional. We offer a supportive team environment and real opportunities to learn, grow and purchase the career of your dreams. Would you like to join us?


Department : Front Office

Reporting : Front Office Manager


Duties & Responsibilities :

  • Monitors all Front Office financial transactions, verifying rates / discounts. He makes corrective moves in cooperation with his boss before the end of the day.
  • Makes every check-in or check-out guests may need during the shift.
  • Controls daily arrivals and daily charges.
  • Supervises the good operation and safety of the hotel during the night shift, to ensure the satisfaction and safety of guests.
  • Prepares and distributes statistical and accounting reports.
  • It complies with the standards of the department and follows the SOPs to the fullest.
  • Answers the phones using the appropriate standards.
  • Assists other departments where necessary during the shift.


Requirements :

  • Degree in Higher Tourism School or similar High school
  • At least 3 years of previous experience in five-star hotels.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Well-presented and professional appearance.
  • Competency with Microsoft Office.
  • Excellent customer service skills.


Prerequisites :

  • The ideal candidate is a highly intelligent hotel professional with outstanding, management skills and extensive hands-on experience.
  • Available to work when needed, including weekends, holidays, and nights.


The company offers :

  • Competitive remuneration package.
  • Prospects of evolution within a challenging working environment.
  • Daily meal and accommodation


We handle all applications with absolute confidentiality.

Interested candidates are kindly requested to send their CV along with a recent photo

Title: Junior Sous Chef
Skills: Catering|Guest Service|Hospitality Industry|Luxury|Operations|Product Quality|Resorts|
Job Description:
About the job

JUNIOR SOUS CHEF

WHO WE ARE:

Domotel Hotels & Resorts is a greek hotel chain with a mix of properties, city hotels, resorts by the sea and mountain/ski resorts in the mainland of Greece. Domotel Agios Nikolaos is a hotel in the picturesque Syvota, in Thesprotia, combining a superb natural location on a private beach with captivating views of the Ionian Sea, luxury spacious accommodation, exceptional food and top-tier wellness experiences.

THE ROLE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:

We are looking for Junior Sous Chef for Domotel Agios Nikolaos. The objectives of this professional are to have the responsibility of managing the day-to-day operations of the kitchen, including purchasing ingredients and overseeing the work of line cooks, always ensuring that the quality standards are met. The ideal candidate should be reliable and hardworking, capable of handling multiple tasks and able to build and maintain excellent relationships with internal and external guests.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:


  • Apply hands on philosophy for the day-to-day operation of the kitchen.
  • Control preparation of and provide excellent quality food.
  • Institute and apply the required procedures and quality control checks to ensure the consistent production of quality guest service.
  • Responsible for the daily, weekly and monthly allocation of staff duties and shift planning for the restaurant kitchen.
  • Ensure that the daily stock records of the restaurant are maintained for the effective management of the restaurant kitchen.
  • Ensure the procedures and management standards laid down by the hotel are followed and instituted amongst the kitchen staff.
  • Ensure that all equipment and maintenance faults are reported and kept in line with manufacturers and company standards.
  • Ensure that all Food Safety standards are met – HACCP.
  • Assist in the mentoring and development of subordinates.
  • Assist with any other duties as required by the Executive Chef or another member of the management team.


REQUIRED SKILLS/ ABILITIES:


  • At least one year’s experience at a similar level.
  • Minimum 4 years’ experience in a restaurant or catering institution with recognized high standards.
  • Workplace training from within a high standard hotel environment.
  • Knowledge of catering operations and kitchen practices within the catering industry.
  • An understanding of the preparation, delivery and services associated with the highest standards of cuisine found in the international hospitality environment.
  • Experience in 5* hotel would be an advantage but not a requirement.


THE COMPANY OFFERS:


  • Excellent working environment with top professionals in their respective fields.
  • Career advancement in a dynamically growing company.
  • Professional development opportunities through quality training.
  • Attractive remuneration package.
  • Accommodation and meals.


APPLY NOW:


Send us your CV at hr@domotel.gr, demonstrating the above-mentioned skills. The short-listed candidates will be invited to attend an initial interview and will be informed about further steps. Please note that obtaining references might be part of the selection process.

Title: Υπεύθυνος λογιστηρίου
Skills: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)|ISO Standards|Infor Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)|
Job Description:
About the job

Η Naturals, μία από τις δυναμικότερες και γρήγορα αναπτυσσόμενες εταιρείες στην παραγωγή και εμπορία τροφίμων με έδρα την Ηλιούπολη (Ν. Αττικής), επιθυμεί να προσλάβει:


Αρμοδιότητες

Παρακολούθηση διαδικασίας ISO

Διαμόρφωση παραγγελιών προς τους προμηθευτές

Καταχώρηση παραστατικών, εγγράφων Γενικής Λογιστικής

Έλεγχος και συμφωνίες ισοζυγίων Γενικής Λογιστικής & Αποθηκών

Έλεγχος και υποβολή συμφωνητικών

Βοήθεια στη σύνταξη των μηνιαίων δηλωτικών υποχρεώσεων (ΦΠΑ, VIES κλπ)

Συμμετοχή στη σύνταξη των ετήσιων οικονομικών καταστάσεων

Λοιπές εργασίες λογιστηρίου


Προφίλ

Ικανότητα οργάνωσης με προσοχή στη λεπτομέρεια

Title: Senior Manager / Senior Consultant - Visa Consulting & Analytics
Skills: Business Analysis|Communication|Data Analysis|Data Analytics|Data Collection|Manufacturing Process Improvement|Presentations|Project Plans|Sales Processes|Spoken English|
Job Description:
About the job

Company Description


Visa is a world leader in digital payments, facilitating more than 215 billion payments transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses and economies to thrive.


When you join Visa, you join a culture of purpose and belonging – where your growth is priority, your identity is embraced, and the work you do matters. We believe that economies that include everyone everywhere, uplift everyone everywhere. Your work will have a direct impact on billions of people around the world – helping unlock financial access to enable the future of money movement.


Join Visa: A Network Working for Everyone.


Job Description


Visa Consulting and Analytics (VC&A) drives tangible, impactful and financial results for Visa’s clients, including both financial institutions and merchants.


The Consulting Practice within VC&A provides consulting and solution services for Visa’s issuer, acquirers and merchants in Southern Europe, focusing on Greece & Cyprus. We apply our deep expertise in the payments industry to provide solutions to assist clients with their key business priorities drive growth and improve profitability.


The team is looking for a Senior Manager to join our consulting practice and play a role developing high impact projects for Visa’s clients in Greece.


The Senior Manager will work towards the team’s goals and assist in the delivery of detailed data gathering, analysis, insight and practical recommendations to enable successful delivery of client projects.


Furthermore, the Senior Manager might be also responsible for delivering internal projects, analysis and reports for internal use.


What We Expect Of You, Day To Day


Manages key clients in the sales/delivery of consulting projects, ensuring the project achieves the required outcomes to a defined deadline.


Develops and maintains the project plan, content scope and final deliverables for larger projects namely:


Prepare presentations and reports


Conduct data analysis


Review relevant reports and information sources


Conduct benchmarking from different internal/external sources and desktop research


Effectively communicate and liaise project findings with internal and external stakeholders at various levels of seniority and function


Supports Head of Consultants to source new work and sell projects to assigned clients. Liaises with other parts of the Visa Europe business where appropriate for projects scoping and completion (e.g. AE and MSA sales team).


Serves as a day-to-day key client contact, regularly liaising with clients throughout the project lifecycle and managing-participating in project delivery and execution for our clients.


Manages teams wrapped around key clients and ensures timely and high quality execution of projects


Identifies process improvements including repeatable and scalable solutions and shares knowledge and expertise with team members as required.


Delivers reports and presentations communicating recommended approaches, often with the support of Consultants and Analysts in preparing these deliverables.


This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 set days a week (determined by leadership/site), with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs.


Qualifications


What we're after..


Previous consulting experience with client-facing experience in strategy or management consulting firms. Experience in the payments business and-or financial services (financial technology will be a plus)


Excellent Business Analysis Skills (research and analyse market and client information to tell a story). Business Analysis Skills (research and analyse market and client information to tell a story) Commercial Acumen – being able to spot an opportunity and drive value for Visa and the Client. Experience in Sales and sales processes


Ability to liaise with multiple stakeholders at various levels within the business


Excellent presentation and communication skills (written and verbal) including an ability to comprehend and convey complex technical information


Prior team management experience, resource training and development


Knowledge of Visa Products, services and transaction flows. Curiosity and willingness to learn and develop as a professional


Advanced data skills (ability to use Excel and manipulate data). Technology-Digitally-savvy and an understanding of consumer economics-behaviours


Fluent in written and spoken English. Willingness to travel as required


Additional Information


Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

Title: Cyber Security Engineer (Data Governance)
Skills: Cybersecurity|DLP|Data Classification|Data Governance|Encryption|Linux|Microsoft Operating Systems|Network Protocols|Network Security|Visio|
Job Description:
About the job

ADACOM S.A. is a leading Trust Services & Cyber Security Provider in EMEA.

For 20 years we deliver solutions for large Financial Institutions, Telecom companies, Utilities & Governmental Organizations and Multinationals in EMEA. You can review our corporate web site www.adacom.com


Within the context of our continuous growth, we are in the process of recruiting a Junior Cyber Security Engineer.


Qualifications related to the Job

  • Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Telecommunications or similar discipline is mandatory,
  • Minimum 1-2 years hands-on experience,
  • Hands-on experience in Information Security technologies, with a strong focus on data loss prevention, encryption and data classification,
  • Information Security Certifications in any of the aforementioned technology areas will be considered as a strong plus,
  • Understanding Cybersecurity trends, threats, procedures mitigation techniques, cybersecurity policy development and execution.
  • Proof of solid understanding of networking protocols and experience in security engineering,
  • Knowledge of Linux and Microsoft operating systems,
  • knowledge of networking technologies
  • Excellent command of MS Office, including Visio and Project,
  • Highly communicative, organized and professional in dealing with customers,
  • Excellent verbal and written skills (Greek & English)
  • Completed Military Obligations (where applicable).


Detailed Job description:

  • Participate in ADACOM’s security services offering to customers (planning, design, implementation and fine-tuning of Endpoint Security solutions),
  • Meet professional practice standards and demonstrate value and competence in core ADACOM service areas, in Data Loss Prevention, Email Security, Encryption, Data Classification & Data Governance tools
  • Document new installations, perform troubleshooting and resolution action,
  • Support of ADACOM existing and new customers,
  • Stays updated regarding new technology through industry news.


What we offer


  • Continuous education
  • Friendly environment with team spirit
  • Career development opportunities
  • Competitive salary & Goal achievement bonus
  • Hybrid work environment
  • Corporate Laptop and Mobile
  • Private Insurance Scheme
  • Pension Fund

About the job

We are looking for a Customer Service Representative who speaks both Swedish and English to join our Customer Support Team. You will be working for our client, one of the biggest online accommodation providers worldwide. If you have excellent Swedish and English language skills (verbal and written), strong communication and administration skills, customer-focused approach, attentiveness, positive attitude, and relevant permit to work in Greece then this job might be for you.

Title: C#.Net / Angular Software Developer
Skills: .NET Framework|Angular|Back-End Web Development|C (Programming Language)|C#|Computer Science|Docker Products|Kubernetes|Microservices|RabbitMQ|
Job Description:
About the job


At Grenzebach Hellas, we are providing innovative and efficient industrial automation software solutions. Our extensive experience in the field, combined with a team of skilled engineers, software developers and data scientists, allows us to offer a wide range of services and products designed to optimize industrial processes and enhance operational efficiency. Our software expertise includes shopfloor automation and vision and robotics applications.


For our team in Athens, we are looking for C#.Net / Angular Software Developer.

You can apply if you are trained as a full-stack developer or specialize in either front-end or back-end coding.


Your Tasks:

  • Develop software applications for the glass, automotive, intralogistics and other special technology industries
  • Design, write, and maintain C# / Angular coding for our ongoing and future projects
  • Contribute to the design and planning sessions as part of an international team collaborating from different locations


Your Profile:

  • BS/MS in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering (or similar degree)
  • 2+ years of development experience with C# .NET
  • Experience with RESTful API design
  • Experience with Message brokers like RabbitMQ
  • Experience with Entity Framework Core is a plus
  • Experience with Angular is a plus
  • Basic understanding of Docker and Kubernetes
  • Basic knowledge of microservice architecture
  • Experience of working with agile methodologies is a plus
  • Written and verbal fluency in English


What we offer:

At Grenzebach, 1,600+ employees from a wide range of business units worldwide share a common goal: to drive products that will move the world of tomorrow with passion and ambition. We are always interested in people who share our passion for technology and progress. In our globally active group of companies, and specifically in our company in Athens, you can drive innovations forward internationally.


  • Competitive salary package
  • A hybrid working model – entirely from the office, hybrid or remote working options.
  • Intensive onboarding phase
  • Pluralsight account and continuous training
  • Travelling to Grenzebach locations for training purposes
  • Clear career path and development feedback
  • Health and life insurance
  • Working in an international, dynamic family business with flat hierarchies
  • Short communication channels
  • International perspectives

Title: Senior Web Developer
Skills: JavaScript|MySQL|PHP|
Job Description:
About the job

Looking for an exciting opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and be a part of a dynamic and collaborative team-based environment? Look no further than Digital Winners, an online marketing and advertising company that specializes in Content Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, and SEO for the iGaming industry.


We are seeking a highly skilled Senior PHP Developer to join our Agile Development team and help us develop software for our sports fan engagement sites. As a member of our team, you will work with the latest technologies to find innovative solutions to technical challenges and contribute to the development of our award-winning Foxbet.gr and Bookmakers.bet portals, along with 50+ other sports betting and casino portals in our leading Greek & International network.


Responsibilities for this role include analyzing requirements from internal and external stakeholders, designing and developing new software products and components, and producing high-quality, tested, and maintainable code using best practices and state-of-the-art technologies. You will also be responsible for investigating and resolving issues reported by internal and external customers.


The ideal candidate will have deep, demonstrable knowledge of professional spoken and written English, performant and SEO-friendly sites, and proven PHP expertise. Hands-on experience in CodeIgniter PHP framework and MySQL/MariaDB databases is also highly desirable. Additionally, exposure to WordPress development is a plus.


If you possess the desirable skills in technologies such as Microservices, Domain-Driven Design, Messaging and communication technologies, TDD/BDD, and supporting technologies, front-end web technologies, database and caching technologies, DevOps engineering, cloud technologies, Docker containerization, CI/CD, Git repo, and logging and monitoring, then we want to hear from you!


In return for your hard work, we offer a fun and creative work environment, flexible working hours, and all the tech gear you need to work smart. We also provide an informal workplace, competitive salary based on experience, and opportunities for growth.


Join Digital Winners today and become a part of our innovative team that is driving success in the iGaming industry!

Title: Customer Analytics Manager for HP.com
Skills: Analytical Skills|Analytics|Communication|Market Research|Marketing Analytics|Marketing Strategy|Negotiation|Oral Communication|Statistics|Transmission Control Protocol (TCP)|
Job Description:
About the job

Unique mastery and recognized authority on relevant subject matter knowledge including technologies, theories and techniques. Contributes to the development of innovative principles and ideas. Successfully operates in the most complex disciplines, in which the company must operate to be successful. Provides highly innovative solutions. Leads large, cross-division functional teams or projects that affect the organization?s long-term goals and objectives. May participate in cross-division, multi-function teams. Provides mentoring and guidance to lower level employees. Routinely exercises independent judgment in developing methods, techniques and criteria for achieving objectives. Develops strategy and sets functional policy and direction. Acts as a functional manager within area of expertise but does not manage other employees as a primary job function. (TCP review board required in TCP families)

Responsibilities
  • Provide thought leadership in marketing analytics and technical innovation by working collaboratively with cross-functional teams to develop appropriate analytical models and identify incremental revenue margin/ productivity opportunities.
  • Provide senior leaders/owners actionable recommendations and strategic plan based on analytical research.
  • Design experiments on marketing topics to allow for a very deep understanding of highly complex modeling and analytics issues.
  • Drive marketing content development, budgeting process and best practices sharing.
  • Drive and own the execution of complex multimillion dollar marketing program and concept to ensure effective tasking/utilization of virtual operation team.
  • Manage multimillion dollar marketing programs or projects by leveraging and managing pan-HP resources.
  • Define and implement new processes, tools and technology requirements to drive continuous improvement of marketing performance management systems.
  • Be recognized as authority on marketing policies and resolving complex and private information.
  • Set and lead development of cross- region and complex marketing and sales policies across multiple product lines in compliance with regulatory requirements and ongoing governance.
  • Develop and provide training and guidance for marketing analytics and operations individuals.
Education And Experience Required
  • BA or BS in Marketing or related field; MBA preferred.
  • 10+ years marketing, market research, project management or operational experience.
  • Experience in MRM or CRM applications; statistics background a plus.
  • Advanced statistics background or equivalent for analytical positions (advanced degree in mathematics, statistics, econometrics, or related degree with deep research background).
Knowledge And Skills
  • Mastery knowledge of marketing principles, practices, tactics and tools.
  • Mastery knowledge of marketing activities, practices and procedures.
  • Superior knowledge of and/or experience in business and marketing strategies.
  • Excellent written/oral communications and analytical skills.
  • Excellent interpersonal and project management skills; ability to build, manage and influence virtual teams.
  • Excellent negotiating and change management skills.
  • Ability to interface effectively with senior executive management team and cross-functional disciplines.
  • Excellent influencing, consensus- building and conflict-resolution skills.
  • Excellent operational skills while maintaining strategic mindset.
About HP

You’re out to reimagine and reinvent what’s possible—in your career as well as the world around you.

So are we. We love taking on tough challenges, disrupting the status quo, and creating what’s next. We’re in search of talented people who are inspired by big challenges, driven to learn and grow, and dedicated to making a meaningful difference.

HP is a technology company that operates in more than 170 countries around the world united in creating technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere.

Our history: HP’s commitment to diversity, equity and inclusion – it's just who we are.

From the boardroom to factory floor, we create a culture where everyone is respected and where people can be themselves, while being a part of something bigger than themselves. We celebrate the notion that you can belong at HP and bring your authentic self to work each and every day. When you do that, you’re more innovative and that helps grow our bottom line. Come to HP and thrive!

Title: User acquisition manager / Performance marketeer
Skills: Advertising|AppsFlyer|Communication|Customer Acquisition|Data Manipulation|Managing Large Budgets|Marketing|Microsoft Excel|Pivot Tables|Tableau|
Job Description:
About the job

User acquisition manager / Performance marketeer


As a UA manager/ Performance marketeer, you will be responsible for designing and executing customer acquisition campaigns via a variety of mobile channels to grow our player user base across all games in our portfolio.


In this role, you will join a diverse, multi-national team and:



  • Scale and grow paid channels including Facebook, Google Ads, Apple Search Ads, Unity, AppLovin and many more
  • Manage ad creative process from development of concepts through testing
  • Focus on the customer: designing the campaign growth plans for acquiring the right players through focused, data-driven, and KPI based mobile user acquisition strategies across paid channels
  • Partner with marketing and product management to ensure campaign performance results informs the business strategy, and the campaigns are driven by the right KPIs
  • Drive ASO for assigned titles, including testing and optimization of icons, screenshots, app description, and app preview video
  • Analyze and report results to identify optimization opportunities to grow the business across multiple KPIs (installs, retention, and engagement)
  • Generate detailed weekly spend and performance reports for the product outlining trends and key metrics specific to goals and present to leadership
  • Innovate targeting and other tools of preferred partners to efficiently acquire users
  • Source, evaluate and test new user acquisition channels to grow and diversify our traffic sources


To be successful in this role, you must have:


  • 3+ years of relevant, hands-on experience in either user acquisition role for mobile games and apps or in a performance marketing role.
  • Solid experience in managing performance marketing campaigns across multiple platforms (Facebook, Google ads) with a budget of more than 50K Euros per month
  • Advanced Excel skills and a strong analytical background including data manipulation and pivot tables
  • Ability to compile and distill performance data into a clear business case for decision making
  • Ability to quickly understand, test, and adapt new marketing techniques and technologies into marketing plans
  • Experience managing, growing and optimizing mobile user acquisition campaigns and partnerships
  • Experience managing large budgets for product launches and ongoing live ops
  • Experience evaluating creative performance and delivering solid feedback to a creative services team
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Growth Mindset: ability to prioritize challenges, plan, develop strategies, and move tactics forward on time and on budget


Extra bonus for (make sure to mention any below that applies to you in your cover letter):


  • Experience with Appsflyer
  • Experience with Tableau

Location:


The position is open for the candidate to work either in Cyprus or Greece.


Our office is located in the beautiful southern sector of Athens right next to a Metro station with all the modern amenities where you will be based. Occasionally you might be required to travel to our offices in Limassol (Cyprus).


Our Limassol office is located in a modern building in the Old Port area, close to lovely cafes, restaurants and attractions. If you are based in Limassol you might occasionally be required to travel to our office in Athens.



About FM Games


FM GAMES has been providing the mobile gaming industry with classic and engaging card and board games since its establishment in 2015. Our team, composed of experienced entrepreneurs with a history of successful international digital business ventures, recognized the huge opportunity to bring these all-time favorites to a rapidly growing mobile audience. As we continue to grow and evolve, we are excited to introduce new types of games to our portfolio, such as word games and puzzle games, to keep up with the ever-changing gaming landscape.


At FM GAMES, we cultivate a culture of exploration, generosity, and creativity. We value individuals who are passionate about making a positive impact in their daily lives. Our team is empowered to take on challenging and rewarding projects, with a focus on innovation and progress. We take pride in our team's accomplishments and recognize that our employees are the cornerstone of our success.



Today, we manage a growing portfolio of 15+ games across all major mobile platforms, created and maintained by over 30 experts across all disciplines. Our games touch the lives of people and entertain gamers of all ages all around the world. They are played every day by hundreds of thousands of people, and have been downloaded to hundreds of millions of devices.

Title: DevOps Engineer
Skills: Amazon Web Services (AWS)|Cloud Infrastructure|Docker Products|Linux|SQL|
Job Description:
About the job

CommXP is looking for a talented and motivated DevOps Engineer to join its Athens team. In this role you will have the opportunity to substantially contribute in the development of exciting products for markets around the globe, employ a vast array of diverse technologies and collaborate with a highly motivated team in a dynamic environment.


CommXP designs and develops innovative products in the Fintech, Digital Marketing and Mobile Gaming & Betting industries. Our aim is to become the leader in the markets we operate. As a member of our team you will actively contribute to our projects' success through your ideas and implementation.


If you are interested in joining our team send an email our way (info@commxp.io) including this position's code OE-01-2023 in the subject.


What will you do?


  • Improve operational efficiency for projects and infrastructure.
  • Create and maintain our infrastructure, monitoring apparatus and integrations with our clients.
  • Analyze project requirements and propose solutions and ideas on how to best meet the projects’ goals from a networking, computational and day to day operational perspective.
  • Produce data reports requested by team members and clients.
  • Collect, maintain and prepare for analysis data and logs received by clients or produced by our own products.
  • Provide high quality documentation for your work.


Who are we looking for?


  • A motivated and creative individual.
  • Can-do attitude and willingness to get out of your comfort zone to learn new things.
  • Attention to detail and ability to think ahead creating outstanding products.
  • Willingness to operate as a team member. Share knowledge and provide constructive feedback.


What do you need to have?


  • Substantial Experience in Linux and its CLI (1+ years of experience).
  • Substantial experience in SQL and Database Design concepts. (preferably PostgreSQL) (1+ years of experience).
  • Experience in cloud infrastructure (preferably AWS).
  • Basic knowledge of networking concepts.


What would be nice to have?


  • Experience in Java and/or Python.
  • Experience in monitoring and testing tools (Prometheus, Nagios, JMeter).
  • Experience in Docker/Docker Swarm.


What do we offer?


  • A friendly and relaxed work environment
  • Competitive salary and incentives relevant to seniority
  • Private health insurance
  • Hybrid work model
  • Opportunities to develop your skills through training courses and a mentorship program
  • Great work/life balance
  • Gorgeous, bright offices in an accessible location close to metro station

Title: Full Stack Engineer
Skills: Django|GraphQL|Maintainability|OAuth|Scalability|Software Development|Stack|Testability|Web Framework|Web Standards|
Job Description:
About the job

Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.


Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people’s lives by building cutting-edge technologies.

We are looking for a full-stack engineer to develop and expand our internal tools and processing pipelines.

Intelligencia’s internal tools serve a team of +30 - soon to grow further - scientists, in their goal to interpret and provide the latest clinical development insights which are then used by our DS teams and Intelligencia users.

In this role, you will help build web applications and services using modern web technologies, coordinate with a cross-functional team of Engineers and domain experts to deploy new features, work with our Product team to materialize new ideas into value-adding functions, and make key decisions that will shape our application architecture.


Join us if you're excited to


  • Work with the Product team to develop new features for Intelligencia’s internal applications
  • Design and build performant micro-services and frontend-facing APIs
  • Build reusable code and libraries
  • Optimize application for speed, and scalability
  • Develop and ensure automated test coverage
  • Use latest data and cloud infrastructure (airflow, google cloud, kubernetes)
  • Work as part of a highly motivated team that believes in the product that they are building
  • Collaborate with other team members, including product managers, designers, biologists and senior stakeholders


What You’ll Bring To The Team


  • At least 3 years of experience in full-stack software development
  • Hands-on experience in the React ecosystem and application state management tools and libraries (preferably Redux)
  • Good understanding of web standards and protocols (incl. HTTP, REST, OAuth 2.0, GraphQL)
  • Programming in Python 3
  • Experience in at least 1 major Python web framework, Django preferred
  • Database modeling and query optimization, preferably using PostgreSQL
  • Experience with FE and BE testing frameworks
  • Experience in software engineering standard approaches for testability, maintainability and scalability
  • Familiarity with software development practices, e.g. code reviews, pair-programming


What's in it for you

  • A competitive salary
  • Private Health Insurance
  • Ability to participate in Intelligencia’s equity compensation plan/ future success of the company
  • Career Development Stipend
  • A great opportunity to grow and work with some of the most exceptional minds in the industry
  • Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals, autonomy, and mentoring, which creates unparalleled opportunities both for you and the team
  • You will be part of a mission to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to drug development


As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, Intelligencia is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, color, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

Title: Network System Engineer
Skills: Domain Name System (DNS)|Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP)|Internet Protocol Suite (TCP/IP)|LAN-WAN|Microsoft Servers|Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS)|Troubleshooting|VMware|Virtual Private Network (VPN)|Windows Server|
Job Description:
About the job

Who We Are

Brink’s is the global leader in security and logistics services, trusted by banks, financial institutions and businesses in both public and private sectors. We deliver the currency of the world to businesses in our communities. We do it because we’re needed. We do it because we’re trusted and valued. We do it because it makes us proud. Brink’s Proud.

Brink’s operates in Greece since 1983 and today employs more than 2.500 employees being a leading company in the highly competitive Cash Management and Security Services Industry.


Our Culture

At Brink’s , our values guide the way we work and are the cornerstone of our winning culture. They ensure that we work safely to protect ourselves and others, consider the customer first in all we do, display the highest standards of ethics, engage and empower employees, continually find new ways to improve the way we work, and foster a diverse and inclusive workplace.


In line with our ever-growing needs, we are currently looking for an aspiring Network System Engineer looking to commission, maintain and operate our Network Infrastructure and ensure that it continues to meet ongoing business objectives.


Key Responsibilities

  • Configure routers, switches, and other components.
  • Provide support in the following areas: WAN and LAN connectivity, routers, firewalls, security, internal systems, cloud and network infrastructure.
  • Investigate, test, install and upgrade new hardware/software.
  • Define specifications by analyzing workflows, access, information and security requirements in order to design system and network infrastructure.
  • Handle ad-hoc assignments and participate in projects to meet business needs.


Your profile

  • BSc/MSc Degree in Information Technology, Networking & Communication, or other relevant field
  • 3 years of relevant experience in a corporate environment
  • Problem solving, troubleshooting, analytical and conceptual skills
  • Good communication skills
  • Fluent in spoken and written Greek and English
  • Experience in implementation & support of data networking, routing and switching, subnetting and network segmentation
  • Exposure in network technologies (LAN/WAN, TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VPN, Wireless, MPLS, SDWAN)
  • Experience in Microsoft Windows Server architecture and VMWare technologies (ESX, vCenter)
  • Root cause analysis and troubleshooting for network and system issues/bottlenecks


It will be considered an asset if you have

  • Experience working collaboratively with system administrators
  • Network or Security Certifications


What’s in it for you

  • An opportunity to work in a global environment
  • Empowerment & Project Ownership
  • Opportunities for growth


Click 'Apply Now' to submit your CV and feel free to visit us on our website https://gr.brinks.com/

Title: Network Engineer
Skills: Attention to Detail|Documentation|EIGRP|English|Fortinet|Load Balancing|Network Administration|Network Engineering|Packet Switching|Problem Solving|
Job Description:
About the job

Sword Services Greece is seeking to recruit a high caliber, energetic individual to join our newly established Software Development team in Greece as Network Engineer. The successful candidate will work in a multinational environment on a multitude of tasks supporting our core business in large International Information Systems. The company is currently expanding its activities in Greece offering an optimum career advancement opportunity for the successful candidate who should combine a relevant educational and professional background, with enthusiasm and eagerness.

What You Will Do...

Network Monitoring
  • Monitor and maintain all network related equipment in all sites and respond to alerts and outages;
  • Design and implementation of new solutions and improving resilience of the current environment;
  • Establishing network environments by designing system configuration, directing system installation, defining, documenting and enforcing system standards;

Maintaining network areas
  • Maximizing network performance by monitoring performance, troubleshooting network problems and outages, scheduling upgrades and collaborating with network architects on network optimization;
  • Upgrading data and voice network equipment to the latest stable firmware releases;
  • The configuration of firewalling, routing, switching and load balancing devices.

Keeping updated documentation.
  • Implementing and co-ordinating housekeeping;
  • Updating network documents;
  • Updating network designs.

What Is Your Experience...
  • Networking (Cisco, Checkpoint, Fortinet, Paloalto, F5, Citrix...);
  • Server systems (IBM, HP, DELL, Cisco);
  • Current CCNA/CCNP level certification and relevant certifications from the network vendors listed above.;
  • OS (Windows, Linux);
  • Understanding of VMware;
  • Hands-on experience with monitoring, network diagnostic and network analytics tools.

Personal Characteristics…
  • Attention to detail and a strong sense of responsibility;
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills;
  • Proactively manage own tasks and projects to agreed deadlines;
  • Ability to work effectively & efficiently with various diverse work teams (Development, Testing, Business Analysis & Project Management).

What We Offer To You…
  • Competitive remuneration package;
  • Meal voucher card;
  • Private medical plan;
  • Private pension plan;
  • Shuttle bus;
  • Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies;
  • Training & Development plan;
  • Employee recognition plan;
  • Work in a certified “Diversity Charter” company;
  • Teambuilding events;
  • Social responsibility initiatives;

Applications must be in the English language
