  • You ensure compliance with safety regulations and building codes
  • You collaborate with subcontractors, engineers, and key team members of the project team


Qualifications:

  • You hold a Civil Engineering Degree
  • You have foundamental knowledge in design of civil, quality, H&S, environmental and technical norms and regulations
  • You are fluent in Greek and English, knowledge of other languages will be considered as a plus
  • You have good knowledge of Microsoft Office and Microsoft Project
  • Experience in High Voltage substations and in the Energy Sector will be considered as a plus

What we offer:

  • Interesting and diversified opportunities in the fast-growing energy sector
  • Interdisciplinary teamwork in a successful and dynamic company
  • Friendly working atmosphere

Title: Production Manager
Skills: Communication|Ergonomics|German|Manufacturing|Problem Solving|Production Planning|Production Processes|Production Schedules|Quality Control|Value Stream Mapping|
Job Description:
About the job

Company Description

OpenBet’s mission is to power growth and player engagement for operators through a global betting ecosystem that delivers at scale, at speed, at every great sports event. Our 1000 talented colleagues are the market's top team. We achieve billions of bets in a season; 60,000+ per second (more transactions than Amazon on Prime Day); 100% uptime (zero Superbowl crashes!) and we're built on 25 years of imaginative technology that is iterated daily.

You will work with like-minded individuals who strive to deliver quality products, from Product Owner peers, design teams through to development teams and internal & external stakeholders.

Working at OpenBet every day is an opportunity for you to create exciting betting entertainment for millions of sports fans across the globe.

Want to be part of our evolving future growth?

Job Description

As Product Owner at OpenBet you will be a subject matter expert who cares passionately about sports and betting. You will be responsible for sharing the sprint vision with Agile teams and ensuring that sprint goals are met.

As part of the Product Management team, you will be responsible for introducing or/ and transforming epics/ themes to stories that can fit in team sprints and deliver value to the final product.

What you will be working on:
  • Keep abreast of the sports betting industry, proactively monitoring the product to ensure the product suite provides a competitive offering.
  • Define user stories and prioritize the team backlog on sprint level ensuring that this is properly planned and all stories are fully elaborated with the help of Business Analysts.
  • Provide an active role in mitigating impediments impacting successful team completion of Release/Sprint Goals .
  • Helping the Scrum teams to plan and improve their ways of working through retrospectives.
  • Collaborating with developers and understanding the scope of technical enabling works.
  • Participating in the team demo and retrospectives and share findings with rest of stakeholders.
  • Attending daily Scrum meetings and ensuring the developers are working efficiently and on the right items.
  • Organizing Product Backlog Refinement sessions.
  • Responsible for representing the interests of the product with development team.

Qualifications

You are an experienced Product Owner who isn’t afraid to push boundaries, bring new ideas to internal and external stakeholders and deliver.

What You’ll Bring:
  • Experience within the Sports betting industry and a passion for Sports.
  • Solid knowledge of the Sports betting market (retail and digital), ideally including B2B supplier experience.
  • Understanding of the importance of Product metrics and data-driven decision making.
  • Ability to stand out in Customer related events and present the product features or assist customer on fleshing out needs and adaptations needed.

Additional Information

Why would you enjoy working with us at OpenBet?
  • Competitive benefits, including pension plan and private insurance for you and your family members as well as extra leave days for volunteering and other purposes.
  • The opportunity to work within a truly international Company, where you can expect the diversity and the opportunities of the world, mixed with a people friendly culture.
  • A wide palette of training opportunities and internal and external learning sources, from onboarding, to on-the-job training by our subject matter experts.
  • As a software house, we have a relaxed but highly professional environment with excellent facilities available, including on-site canteen & gym, showers, video, board and electronic sports games as well as lending library.
  • We love to get together and throw a number of group events, to celebrate new comers, enjoy some good meals together and show off our sport talents as part of company tournaments (basketball, table tennis and others!).

Title: Site Civil Engineer
Skills: Building Codes|Civil Engineering|Energy|Engineering|High-Voltage Engineering|On Site|Operations|Renewable Energy Systems|Substation|Wind Turbines|
Job Description:
About the job

Intracom Defense (IDE) is the leading defense company in Greece with significant international activity. IDE designs, develops and manufactures products and systems that incorporate advanced in-house developed technologies in the areas of Missile Electronics, Tactical Communication and Information Systems, Border and Area Security solutions, Hybrid Electric Power Systems and Unmanned Surface and Air platforms.


IDE is a registered NATO supplier and participates in international development and production programs, as well as in international collaborations for the production and export of defense equipment.


IDE is currently looking for a talented and ambitious Junior Software Development Engineer to join the Software Section of our Products Development Department.


Responsibilities

The ideal candidate will be responsible for:

  • software development of new features, coding, unit test, function test, integration, verification and documentation.
  • ensuring timely deliveries.
  • contributing to design/decision meetings (both functional and technical).
  • undertaking software problem solving/debugging.
  • coordinating and collaborating with other members of the software development team and technical experts.


Qualifications & Experience

Required:

  • Bachelor's/University’s Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or related discipline.
  • C/C++ with fair knowledge of the language specification and standard libraries and templates.
  • Excellent knowledge of object-oriented techniques, data structures & design patterns.
  • Good understanding of memory management in non-garbage collected environments.
  • Proficient understanding of Git.
  • Familiarity with multi-thread programming and synchronization.
  • Strong knowledge of TCP/IP and UDP network programming.
  • Fulfilled military obligations for male candidates.

Desired:

  • Post-graduate Degree (MSc, PhD) on SW design and development will be considered an asset.
  • Experience in Linux programming and its development ecosystem (scripting languages, toolchains) is essential.
  • Experience in human machine interface development using Geographical Information Systems (GIS) frameworks.
  • Knowledge of PostgreSQL / PostGIS or equivalent relational database technologies.
  • Good knowledge of Telecommunication networks and/or networking protocols.
  • Familiarity with Qt application framework.
  • Java programming.
  • Experience in web development (preferably JavaScript).


Personal Characteristics:

  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills, both in English and Greek.
  • Willingness to take initiative and motivation to drive results.
  • Very good planning and time-management skills.
  • High sense of accountability and great ability to work effectively both independently and within a team.


Benefits

INTRACOM DEFENSE offers:

  • fast-paced working environment.
  • opportunities for continuous learning of state-of-the-art technology and career development.
  • competitive remuneration package directly dependent on the candidate's qualifications and experience.
  • group private medical insurance.
  • company bus from metro stations.
  • onsite dining facilities.


All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.

Title: Product Owner
Skills: Analytical Skills|Backlog Management|Data-driven Decision Making|Product Management|Retrospectives|Sprints|User Stories|
Job Description:
About the job

MYTILINEOS, a leading industrial company with a strong international presence in two Business Units, Energy and Metallurgy, is currently seeking to hire a Digital Transformation Project Manager Assistant to join the Energy Business Innovation and Digital Transformation team.

The candidate will coordinate with different departments to ensure projects are completed on time. He/She will also be responsible for performing administrative tasks such as capturing meeting minutes and scheduling meetings as needed.

Ultimately, you will work with various teams and stakeholders to monitor project progress and provide oversight to ensure projects are completed promptly and within quality, time and budget constraints.

Main Responsibilities:
  • Supports the coordination and management of projects.
  • Communicates with stakeholders regarding project needs and goals.
  • Contributing to the planning and development of projects.
  • Performs administrative tasks such as capturing meeting minutes and schedule meetings.
  • Keep track of and report on project progress.
  • Complete any tasks assigned by the Project Manager in an efficient and timely manner.
  • Performs other duties assigned by the Project Manager orderly and efficiently.
  • Works with vendors and partners to prepare bid proposals (RFIs, RFPs and RFQs) and monitor the project delivery.

Requirements
  • University and/or Master’s degree in a related discipline will be considered an asset.
  • Relevant training and/or certifications as an Assistant Project Manager.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office and project management software.
  • Proven work experience as an Assistant Project Manager or similar role.
  • Experience with the Agile methodology is desirable.
  • Vendor Management and RFI/RFQ/RFP composing skills.
  • Highly organised and able to multitask and oversee several projects simultaneously.
  • Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • Excellent command of the Greek and English language.
  • Team player.
  • Keen interest in technology trends and ability to introduce new products and solutions accordingly is desirable.
  • Ability to travel occasionally.
  • Driving license.

Title: Junior Software Development Engineer
Skills: C++|Communication|Java|JavaScript|Linux Development|Network Programming|PostGIS|Qt|Software Development|User Datagram Protocol (UDP)|
Job Description:
About the job

With more than 20 years of proven experience, QUALCO is a leading Fintech solutions provider, offering a wide range of analytics-driven, highly scalable enterprise software solutions in over 35 countries worldwide. Our end-to-end technology solutions cover a wide range of needs for Banking, Financial Services, Utilities, Insurance, Retail organisations, and beyond.




We are looking for an experienced Project Manager to join our Project Management team in Athens. The successful candidate will take on the management of key clients' projects with the goal of delivering every project on time, within budget and within scope, while building positive long-term relationships with our clients.

Responsibilities

  • Manage complex projects and coordinate project teams, to deliver and ensure quality throughout the project;
  • Define scope and expected deliverables, align stakeholders and influence decision processes, determine success metrics, and track against milestones;
  • Manage changes to the project scope, schedule, and costs;
  • Monitor risks proactively, drive prioritization, balance business needs versus constraints. and take mitigation actions and contingency planning; and
  • Develop effective presentations and project update materials to communicate project status to key stakeholders (C level & Technical resources).


Requirements

  • A very good educational background, preferably in the fields of computer science or engineering;
  • 5+ years of experience in a Project Management role in software application projects, preferably in the Banking, or Finance sectors;
  • PMP or Prince II certification;
  • Excellent client facing, analytical and problem solving skills;
  • Solid organizational skills, attention to detail and multi-tasking skills;
  • Excellent teamwork skills to coordinate virtual teams;
  • Ability to work under tight deadlines while being flexible and responding to change;
  • Firm command of the English language and excellent verbal and written communication skills; and
  • Italian, Spanish and/ or French would be considered as a plus.


Benefits

On top of a challenging work environment, we are offering:

💸 Competitive compensation, ticket restaurant card, and annual bonus programs

💻 Cutting-edge IT equipment, mobile, and data plan

🏢 Modern facilities, free coffee and beverages, and indoor parking

👨‍⚕ Private health insurance, onsite occupational doctor, and workplace counselor

🏝️ Flexible working model

🤸‍♂️ Onsite gym, wellness facilities, and ping pong room

💡 Career and talent development tools

🎓 Mentoring, coaching, personalized annual learning and development plan

🌱 Employee referral bonus, regular wellbeing, ESG, and volunteering activities

Your race, gender identity, expression, age ethnicity, or disability make no difference in Qualco Group. We want to attract, develop, promote, and retain the best people based on their abilities and behavior.

Disclaimer: Qualco Group collects and processes personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are bound to use the information provided within your job application for recruitment purposes only and not to share these with any third parties. We will keep your resume in our database for any future consideration. In case you want to be deleted from our database, please contact us.

Title: Digital Transformation Project Manager Assistant
Skills: Attention to Detail|Communication|Digital Transformation|Greek|Management Software|Problem Solving|Project Management Software|Request for Information (RFI)|Request for Proposal (RFP)|Vendor Management|
Job Description:
About the job

Role Summary


We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join Global Digital Operations within Pfizer’s Digital DevOps Group.


Our team provides the capabilities needed to manage both day-to-day requirements, as well as full lifecycle management ensuring that our assets are always available to our clients. Additionally, we always strive to improve our process and optimize our workflow as we keep an eye on operational efficiency. Through our team of talented technologists, we provide solution and service delivery, technology platforms managements, and optimization and application support excellence.


The Operations Project Manager will be responsible Lead, coordinate & run projects, and initiatives as assigned.


This role will participate and contribute as a team member, collaborate with other support teams, drive continues improvement, and ensure our solutions are supported with the highest level of customer satisfaction.


ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES (With some oversight this role will):


  • Coordinate tasks and drive actions across teams within Pfizer and with external partners in a global environment.
  • Apply technical and project management skills to lead project to successful completion.
  • Oversee and govern application support activities performed by managed service providers and other vendor resources.
  • Communicate with business users and executive stakeholders, providing status updates on system issues and resolution plans.
  • Partner with Solution Delivery and Engineering leads to define and implement supportability requirements and manage transition of projects to long-term support through well-defined support plans.
  • Manage data collection efforts for periodic and ad hoc requests and provide analysis as needed.
  • Support compliance related activities including audits, inspections, and preparation.
  • Assist with support contract renewals and manage software licenses.
  • Participate in budgeting and forecasting.
  • Create, update and maintain project documentation.


Basic Qualifications


  • Bachelor’s degree required, preferably in a Computer Science or Business Management field.
  • 3+ years of experience in a corporate setting with an emphasis on application development and/or application support.
  • Excellent oral and written English communication skills.
  • Strong interpersonal, customer service, and relationship competencies.
  • Demonstrated knowledge or experience in IT support, Programming and/or Software Development Lifecycle management. Strong technical and troubleshooting skills.
  • Excellent organizational and time management capabilities. Ability to multi-task, plan, organize and effectively execute tasks and projects.
  • Curiosity and willingness to learn, and ability to quickly develop new technical and functional competencies.
  • Ability to work both independently and as a member of a team, earning the trust both of customers and teammates.
  • Good working knowledge of MS Office product suite, including MS Word and Excel.
  • Ability to adapt to new work assignments, flexibility, and willingness to work with a global team across regions and time zones.


Preferred Qualifications


  • Process-oriented with strong organization, project management and coordination skills.
  • Project Management: PMP, ITIL, or Agile certification.
  • Ability to adapt to changing working conditions and work assignments, to be open, and motivated to learn and adopt new ideas and concepts.
  • Experience with Drupal, AWS, Cloudflare, and Github Actions a plus
  • Knowledge of database, storage, hosting, cloud, application, analytics and services technologies.
  • Able to work remotely with a team spanning many timezones.


Non-standard Work Schedule, Travel Or Environment Requirements


  • May occasionally require travel, primarily to other Pfizer sites in the region and globally.
  • Working schedule 10.00 am-18.30pm


LI#PFE


Purpose


Breakthroughs that change patients' lives... At Pfizer we are a patient centric company, guided by our four values: courage, joy, equity and excellence. Our breakthrough culture lends itself to our dedication to transforming millions of lives.


Digital Transformation Strategy


One bold way we are achieving our purpose is through our company wide digital transformation strategy. We are leading the way in adopting new data, modelling and automated solutions to further digitize and accelerate drug discovery and development with the aim of enhancing health outcomes and the patient experience.


Flexibility


We aim to create a trusting, flexible workplace culture which encourages employees to achieve work life harmony, attracts talent and enables everyone to be their best working self. Let’s start the conversation!


Equal Employment Opportunity


We believe that a diverse and inclusive workforce is crucial to building a successful business. As an employer, Pfizer is committed to celebrating this, in all its forms – allowing for us to be as diverse as the patients and communities we serve. Together, we continue to build a culture that encourages, supports and empowers our employees.


Information & Business Tech

Title: Project Manager
Skills: Attention to Detail|Communication|Contingency Planning|English|PRINCE2|Presentations|Problem Solving|Project Coordination|Project Teams|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Software Engineer Full-stack | Full-time contract | Greece


We are looking for a highly motivated, flexible, organized, and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for building features. In this role, you will be a member of team responsible for designing, developing and testing in order to create software solutions aligned to the needs of the business and external customers.


Your daily work routine will include:

  • Develop testable features using the Angular development platform (version 9 and above) and the Java programming language (version 8 and above);
  • Implement algorithms to solve complex problems;
  • Support application delivery to multiple environments on a CI/CD fashion;
  • Draft technical documentation and implement proof-of-concepts to support design decisions;
  • Mentor and train team members;
  • Plan and execute technology upgrades.


Requirements

  • University degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or related field;
  • At least 7 years of proven professional experience in Java development, i.e. Java 8 or upper, Spring (Boot), etc.;
  • 3-5 years of proven professional experience in UI development using Angular;
  • Strong problem solving skills;
  • Excellent experience in RESTful webservices, JSON processing and ORM technologies;
  • Solid experience in relational databases ;
  • Solid experience in Jenkins and Git;
  • Familiarity with distributed messaging systems and JPA/PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch databases;
  • Familiarity with single sign-on technologies;
  • Ability to design and implement solutions with minimal supervision;
  • "Automate-everything" culture;
  • Understanding of Agile Software Development methodologies;
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English (B2 or higher);
  • Good team spirit and accountable for working in a multi-cultural and international environment.
  • Fulfilled military obligations, if applicable.


What is in it for you?

  • A permanent contract with a compensation package that includes private medical insurance, meal vouchers, mobile plan, etc.
  • Learning opportunities, in-house trainings, continuous coaching.
  • Fun, respectful and supportive work environment that promotes work-life balance.
  • Mobility opportunities to work abroad, in case of interest, as we have various job openings in our Group.


Why Trasys Greece?

  • Strong team spirit attitude.
  • Dynamic, intelligent, agile and talented teams.
  • Large-scale challenging international projects.
  • Allows you to take the ownership of your work from the beginning, having specific responsibilities.
  • Active and meaningfully present in various IT communities (MoT, Angular, JHUG, etc.).


Trasys Greece, part of NRB Group, is an equal opportunity employer who welcome applications from all sections of society and do not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

About the job

About Electrip

Zorlu Energy operates on various fields of the sector with its experience of 29 years. In our fields of operation, we are combining our well established experience with our corporate values and make a difference among other players of the sector in engineering, supply, construction, management, maintenance and repair.


We are utilizing our high capacity production power, qualified human resources, well balanced portfolio, diversity of sources and capability of creating innovative solutions to be a perpetual and leading part of the global energy transformation.


"Electrip Greece” has been established in Greece under 100% ownership of Zorlu Energy in order to pursue its activities and projects covering electrical vehicle charging station sales, installment and operation activities abroad with its subsidiaries.


We are looking for a "Senior Electrical Engineer" for our Electrip Greece team.


Responsibilities:

  • Planning and management of field operations for installation works
  • Follow-up of legal procedures and applications required for installation
  • Preparation of trainings for field teams
  • Establishment of field application standards and control of applications
  • Improvement of field application methods and processes
  • Updating the Punch list
  • Updating the Lessons Learned list
  • Supporting feasibility studies for new application types


Requirements:

  • Graduate of Electrical Engineering or related majors
  • Must have signature authorization for electrical projects
  • Fluent in English, both speaking and writing
  • Team management experience
  • 5-7 years of experience in LV systems and electrical infrastructure installation
  • Experienced in assembly and cable/termination works of LV systems
  • Experienced in panel design, assembly, and testing processes,
  • Preferably experienced in infrastructure and installation works of AC/DC Charging stations
  • Good command of Microsoft Office programs
  • Analytical thinking and strong communication skills
  • Open to learning and result oriented
  • No travel restrictions

As a candidate, all communication between you and our company is protected according to GDPR. You can click on the link "https://electripglobal.com/candidate-privacy-policy" for details.


Our company supports Gender Equality. Our company does not make any discrimination based on reasons such as gender, religion, language, race, ethnicity in all processes starting from recruitment.

Job Description:
About the job

Quality & Compliance Engineer - Motion Control and Robotic Systems

RoboteQ is an international company, a subsidiary of Nidec Motor Corporation, a renowned maker of Motor Controllers and Navigation Sensors for Mobile Robots, Industrial Automation, and Electrification of off-road Vehicles.

We are pleased to announce an opportunity for a Quality & Compliance Engineer based near Athens, Greece.

Summary of Role

In this role as Quality & Compliance Engineer, you will be working with a highly motivated team to bring to market innovative solutions for customers in the AGV, Robotics and Industrial Automation Markets. Key aspects for this role will be to work on analyzing and defining and executing the test cases based on the standards under which our products should conform.


Primary Responsibilities

  • Ensure current and future Quality Management System and Products are compliant to current and proposed regulatory requirements.
  • Assist in the creation of safety processes’ documentation.
  • Assist the team to follow safety processes for new products development.
  • Write and review product safety and compliance requirements and characteristics.
  • Perform internal audits.
  • Train and transfer knowledge between project teams
  • Support and ensure alignment of functional safety and compliance best practices between projects.
  • Continuous study of legislation and standard updates.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Computer Science.
  • Experience with Quality standards such as ISO 9001.
  • Experience with standards and regulations such as IEC 61508, ISO 13849, IEC 61800-5-2, and ISO 26262.
  • Previous experience with industrial or automotive manufacturing, product development or design will be considered a plus.
  • Experience with SISTEMA tool will be considered a plus.
  • English language: good speaking and writing level.
  • Good communication skills, positive attitude, and eagerness to learn.

Location:

  • Markopoulo, Attica, Greece, 19003


Reference:

  • RQ-QCE2301

About the job

We are searching for a highly creative Project Manager to implement our high executive part of our company and make an exceptional addition to our team. The position is best suited for an individual who has experience in project management and more specifically strong skills in project management requirements.


As a Project Manager in this project, your daily responsibilities will include:

To succeed in the role, you will need to have:

Senior Manual QA Tester – Cyprus, Greece or Remote

Title: Project Manager
Skills: Analytical Skills|Attention to Detail|Communication|Customer Relationship Management (CRM)|Interpersonal Skills|Project Control|Project Implementation|Project Management|Service Orientation (Social)|Time Management|
Job Description:
About the job

We are in the unique position to experience new and interesting situations that many companies have never seen before. We bake challenges by using agile methodologies, top of the line tools and of course always working with the best of teams.


This is a chance to be part of a rapidly growing team in a company that is changing the delivery landscape, and be able to influence, execute and see the impact of your work at the end of the day.


We are looking for a Senior Product Designer who will be accountable for defining product specifications and designing fully-functional features (web & mobile). If you have an eye for color and shape, and you are able to translate requirements into practical product features, then this might be the right opportunity for you!


Being part of a fast growing and ambitious environment, you will collaborate with multiple teams and iterate rapidly based on feedback. We strive to create an emotional, engaging, functional and fun experience for our users in our web & mobile apps.


What You'll Do


  • Create UX/UI designs for features and products.
  • Work closely, collaborate and communicate with the design team, product managers, engineers, data analysts, and cross-functional stakeholders to understand requirements and provide thoughtful solutions.
  • Integrate user feedback and business requirements into ongoing product experience updates.
  • Maintain and evolve the design system with the design team and keep consistency across platforms and brands.
  • Create user flows and wireframes to build user interface mockups, prototypes.


What You'll Have


  • At least 4 years of experience in Product Design
  • Fluent in current design tools (i.e. Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, etc.) (We currently use Sketch)
  • Excellent eye for detail and a self-motivated problem solver
  • Superior analytical skills and a strong sense of urgency and ownership in your work
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills (English is a must)


Nice To Have (optional)


  • Degree in Digital Design or Graphic Design or Computer Science or HCI psychology
  • Familiar working with agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban/XP)
  • Miro, Zeplin, Jira
  • Design Systems at Scale
  • Ability to understand programming


What We Offer


  • If you are happy, we are happy! That's why we offer an attractive remuneration package for what you bring in!
  • We share a passion for food, so you will certainly appreciate the ticket restaurant card 💳 to spend in restaurants and/or food supplies. We are efooders after all!
  • We take care of you with Private Medical & Life Insurance from day #1 to keep you healthy and happy!
  • We want you to grow with us 🚀 ! And to help you keep improving, we provide you access to our online training platform where you can study 📖 topics for your personal and professional growth!
  • Are you a cappuccino lover ☕? Do you desperately want a cookie? Our cafeteria got you covered!
  • If you want to stay in shape 🏋️ , our in-house gym awaits you fully equipped!


Life @efood:


At efood, no day is the same as the day before!


efooders know that working and having a good time aren't the opposite and that's why every day at efood is a new adventure!


We always aim higher and we thrive in finding solutions to push our limits further! We care about our customers, our employees, and our society.


We seize every opportunity to celebrate achievements and milestones, but we also celebrate small things (like Fridays!)


Every efooder is part of a fast-growing multinational company, with endless opportunities for professional growth and acquisition of new skills! We have an established, yet super creative and fun working environment, with talented and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace! [In 2021, we were honored with a 3rd place award from the Great Place to Work® Institute]


Hungry enough to join us?


Important note


Please bear in mind that it will be highly appreciated in your application to include your portfolio (link or file), highlighting the ability to synthesize real & doable design solutions for challenging concepts B2B or B2C. You can share it either via your own personal website (wix, squarespace etc) or via Behance, dribbble, lottie library etc.

Desired Skills and Experience

  • UI/UX
  • product designer
  • sketch

Title: Quality Assurance Engineer
Skills: API Testing|English|Front-End Development|Manual Testing|Quality Assurance|SQL|Software Deployment|Software Testing|Test Automation|iOS|
Job Description:
About the job

Η Krannich Solar με τη δυναμική της παρουσία από το 1995 στην παγκόσμια αγορά ηλιακής ενέργειας, συμβάλλει ενεργά στην προώθηση της φωτοβολταϊκής τεχνολογίας.


Η παροχή εξειδικευμένων λύσεων, η συνεργασία με διεθνώς αναγνωρισμένους κατασκευαστικούς οίκους που παρέχουν επώνυμα και αξιόπιστα προϊόντα και οι άριστα οργανωμένες αποθήκες, καθιστούν την Krannich Solar ως τον κορυφαίο προμηθευτή φωτοβολταϊκού εξοπλισμού σε παγκόσμιο επίπεδο.


Η ραγδαία ανάπτυξη της Krannich Solar οδήγησε σε σύντομο χρονικό διάστημα στην ίδρυση 29 υποκαταστημάτων σε 25 χώρες όπου σήμερα απασχολούνται περισσότερα από 1000 έμπειρα στελέχη.


Στο πλαίσιο της δυναμικής ανάπτυξης των δραστηριοτήτων της στην Ελληνική αγορά, η Krannich Solar αναζητά Sales Support Engineer για την έδρα της εταιρείας στην Θεσσαλονίκη


Βασικές Αρμοδιότητες:


Προετοιμασία οικονομοτεχνικών προσφορών

Τηλεφωνική και ηλεκτρονική επικοινωνία για αποτελεσματική διαχείριση αιτημάτων πελατών

Διατήρηση ισχυρών σχέσεων με τους πελάτες μέσω της άριστης εξυπηρέτησης και της άρτιας τεχνικής υποστήριξης

Στενή συνεργασία με το τμήμα πωλήσεων

Παρακολούθηση των παραγγελιών και αποθεμάτων ώστε να διασφαλίζονται οι ανάγκες των πελατών

Ειδίκευση στα προϊόντα και τις υπηρεσίες της εταιρείας

Συλλογή και τεκμηρίωση πληροφοριών σχετικά με τον ανταγωνισμό


Απαραίτητα προσόντα:


Πτυχίο Μηχανικού Π.Ε. / Τ.Ε. - κατά προτίμηση Ηλεκτρολόγου Μηχανικού

Προϋπηρεσία σε αντίστοιχη θέση αποτελεί πλεονέκτημα

Κατανόηση των αρχών πωλήσεων και των πρακτικών εξυπηρέτησης πελατών

Άριστη χρήση της Ελληνικής και Αγγλικής γλώσσας

Εξοικείωση με νέες τεχνολογίες, συστήματα CRM και MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)

Άριστες επικοινωνιακές και οργανωτικές δεξιότητες

Ικανότητα επίλυσης προβλημάτων, ιεράρχηση προτεραιοτήτων και διαπραγμάτευσης

Ευελιξία και προσαρμοστικότητα

Η Krannich Solar προσφέρει ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών, οργανωμένο και φιλικό περιβάλλον εργασίας, συνεχή εκπαίδευση και επιμόρφωση, προοπτικές εξέλιξης σε ένα δυναμικά αναπτυσσόμενο οργανισμό.

Title: Senior Product Designer

Job Description:
About the job

With more than 20 years of proven experience, QUALCO is a leading Fintech solutions provider, offering a wide range of analytics-driven, highly scalable enterprise software solutions in over 35 countries worldwide. Our end-to-end technology solutions cover a wide range of needs for Banking, Financial Services, Utilities, Insurance, Retail organisations, and beyond.

We are looking for a Senior Business Analyst to join our Factoring team in Athens. Our goal is to ensure the optimal delivery of our products, aiming to maximize the value that our clients get from our products and bring measurable improvements to their business performance.

Responsibilities:

  • Understand Qualco's SCF solution at detailed levels
  • Take part in the design of the evolutions of Qualco's SCF solution, along with analysis and specifications of Clients needs
  • Manage and refine demonstrations and facilitate workshops
  • Adjust/write detailed specification documents
  • Act as the interface with the client teams and the Qualco Business development teams
  • Update the Business development teams with the appropriate information
  • Participate in the solution testing phase
  • Follow-up of delivery of the ProximaPlus system
  • Follow-up during the implementation and maintenance phases
  • On-site assistance for clients
  • Progressive take-over of some customer relationship management responsibilities


Requirements

  • Experience in doing business/system analysis in the Banking sector
  • Experience in a Factoring/SCF software package context would be considered as a plus
  • 7 - 10 years' experience in commercial finance/factoring
  • Fluent in English (other languages will be a plus)
  • Willingness to learn our platform in depth
  • Ability to work autonomously, self-starter and pro-active
  • Very good communication and presentation skills
  • Ability to travel


Benefits

On top of challenging work environment, we are offering:

💸 Competitive compensation, ticket restaurant card, and annual bonus programs
💻 Cutting-edge IT equipment, mobile and data plan
🏢 Modern facilities, free coffee and beverages, indoor parking, and company bus
👨‍⚕ Private health insurance, onsite occupational doctor, and workplace counselor
🏝️ Flexible working model, hybrid/remote benefits & home equipment benefits
🤸‍♂️ Onsite gym, wellness facilities, and ping pong room
💡 Career and talent development tools
🎓 Mentoring, coaching, personalized annual learning and development plan
🌱 Employee referral bonus, regular wellbeing, ESG and volunteering activities

Your race, gender identity and expression, age ethnicity or disability make no difference in Qualco. We want to attract, develop, promote, and retain the best people based only on their ability and behavior.

Disclaimer: Qualco collects and processes personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are bound to use the information provided within your job application for recruitment purposes only and not to share these with any third parties. We will keep your resume in our database for any future consideration. In case you want to be deleted from our database you can contact us at people@qualco.eu.

Title: Sales Support Engineer
Skills: Albanian|Customer Relationship Management (CRM)|Microsoft Excel|Microsoft PowerPoint|Microsoft Word|Sales|Sales Operations|Solar Energy|
Job Description:
About the job

PAL (www.pal.gr) is a leading Greek manufacturing company founded in 1947, currently active in two business sectors: Cookware and Food Packaging materials. Our products are present in all major Supermarket chains and retailers in Greece, and we export to more than 30 countries. With growth rate of 20% YoY we are looking for a dynamic and passionate individual to join us as Business Analyst based in Kifissia, Athens, Greece. We are seeking driven and trustworthy candidates who work efficiently without sacrificing accuracy. You should have an excellent understanding of accounting and financial aspects and regulations and excellent computer and verbal and written communication skills as well as IT understanding.


Purpose and Responsibilities

· Collaborate in the processes for financial forecasting and budgets, and the preparation of all financial reporting

· Help management team make informed decisions and monitor progress by providing financial information and analysis through meaningful and informative reports and dashboards and uncover areas for improvement.

· Design/develop and run reports as well as dashboards in ERP and excel.

· Produce both weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual analysis as well as ad-hoc analysis/modeling for projects

· In close collaboration with various departments define:

o reporting requirements

o develop KPIs

o monitor KPIs

· Develop visual presentations to assist stakeholders in understanding data

· Collect data from departments to develop budget projections and forecasts

· Monitor company’s financial obligations and ensure accurate projections in management reports and cashflow projection

· Ensure accuracy of financial records by ensuring all departments comply with processes and coordinate with IT and other departments to ensure accuracy and quality of data necessary for reports

· Remain up-to-date on the new process and IT developments to automate upgrade systems and current financial and accounting legislation

· Conduct meetings and presentations to findings and effectively communicating your insights.

· Assist the reviewing of all formal finance, HR and IT related procedures


Candidate Profile:

· BSc and/or MSc in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, Accounting or any relevant field.

· Computer Science and IT considered a strong asset

· At least 2-3 years of experience in a large Greek or Multinational company preferably in the Manufacturing industry. Experience in similar role will be considered a strong asset.

· Excellent communication skills

· Ability to work as part of a team

· Demonstrated analytical skills and experience in financial modelling.

· Excellent proficiency in Greek and English language, both written and spoken.

· Excellent knowledge of Microsoft Office Tools (Excel, Word, Access, Outlook, PowerPoint), excellent IT proficiency.

• Ability to translate business requirements to activities and reports

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Skills: Business Analysis|Business Intelligence (BI)|Business Relationship Management|Business Requirements|Commercial Finance|Communication|Factoring|Presentation Skills|Presentations|Systems Analysis|
Job Description:
About the job

Company Description

SGS is the world’s leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company. SGS is recognized as the global benchmark for quality and integrity. With more than 96,000 employees, SGS operates a network of over 2,400 offices and laboratories around the world.

Job Description

The Operation Coordinator will oversee and maintain back-office activities and key operational functions of the respective business sector in full accordance with SGS Group Policies and Procedures. You will promote the activities and operation of the respective business sector and associated sectors within Greece.
  • Ensure all tasks are completed and delivered in a timely manner to meet customer expectations and compliance requirements.
  • Delegation and coordination of inspection orders to SGS field staff and subcontractors.
  • Utilization of Order to Invoice System of SGS (BOSS).
  • Complete accurate reports in a timely manner to ensure all information reported is delivered as per customer time frame.
  • Communicate with customers to initiate or carry out their requirements to maintain optimum customer satisfaction.
  • Carry out all activities in a safety-conscious manner to ensure compliance of all SGS, customer and OH&S requirements are met.

Title: Business Analyst

Job Description:
About the job

Company Description


About Netcompany-Intrasoft


We are Netcompany-Intrasoft, a leading European IT Solutions and Services Group with strong international presence and expertise, offering innovative and added-value solutions of the highest quality to a wide range of international and national public and private organizations. More than 500 organizations in over 70 countries worldwide have chosen the company's services and solutions to fulfill their business needs.


For more information regarding our company, current projects, and openings around Europe, please consult our website: www.netcompany-intrasoft.com.

A day in the life of a Business Analyst / Systems Analyst


As a Business Analyst / Systems Analyst, you will be part of a highly skilled team who design, develop, deploy, customize and support technologies for large EU agencies. The job holder will have the opportunity to be exposed to a wide variety of services and cutting-edge technologies in order to develop a solid background in the field of application development.


Your main duties will be to:


  • Involve with the requirements elicitation

  • Day-to-day support the project team and the customer/business users
  • Prepare and deliver demos & trainings
  • Involve with incident & change management
  • Support the IT Project Manager to follow-up on deadlines


By joining Netcompany - Intrasoft, a leading IT company, you will be part of a hub of 1.700+ tech enthusiasts in Greece. You will work using cutting-edge technologies that contribute to the design and delivery of solutions and products for challenging, large-scale IT projects, that affect the lives of millions of citizens around the globe.


Qualifications


If you have


  • University Degree in Computer Science or another relevant field
  • At least 9 years of working experience in ICT sector
  • 6+ years of working experience as a System/Business Analyst
  • Technical expertise in use cases/user stories, business process flows & HTML mockups
  • In-depth knowledge of UML & BPMN
  • Proven experience in stakeholder management & customer-facing
  • Proven experience in software development methodologies Agile (e.g., RUP, Agile)
  • Good knowledge of data analysis and data modeling
  • Good understanding of SOA/XML/XSD/WSDL/JSON, and Java technologies is an asset
  • Experience with collaborative tools, such as JIRA, Confluence, Figma/Zeplin, etc.
  • Certification in Business Analysis (e.g. Certified Business Analyst Professional)
  • Excellent command of the English language (verbal & written)
  • Excellent presentation skills


…then this position is suitable for you!


It would also be a plus if you had


  • Experience in business domains of European Institutions
  • Fluency in French or Spanish
  • Do-er & learning enthusiasm
  • High self-motivation and attention to detail
  • Strong communication skills with the ability to interface effectively and negotiate features with a variety of stakeholders
  • Ability to integrate and cope with fast-paced international environments & demanding customers
  • Ability to balance quantity with quality
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team
  • Problem-solving skills
  • Innovative thinking skills
  • Availability for short-term business traveling


This position comes with


  • Competitive compensation packages
  • Continuous learning (with the most modern methods - unlimited access to Udemy for Business), and fast career growth
  • Interesting and challenging tasks within large-scale projects
  • An international dynamic within a fast-paced working environment
  • The opportunity to work in a diverse environment with talented colleagues


Additional Information


We ensure equal opportunities, treatment, and consideration to all candidates. Discrimination based on sex, racial or ethnic origin, religion or belief, disability, age, sexual orientation or marital status, physical or mental disability, or any other factor protected by applicable laws and regulations is prohibited. At Netcompany-Intrasoft we respect human rights as part of our culture, and we focus on creating a positive workplace in which all employees are valued and where diversity and inclusivity are welcomed.


The safety and well-being of our employees remain our top priority. Please note that Netcompany-Intrasoft’s recruitment process is being conducted virtually due to preventive measures against the Covid-19 pandemic.

Our people are the most important element of our success. Our work life is well defined by our set of fundamental Values: https://bit.ly/3SSbBzU

Job Description:
About the job

At Alpha Bank, we are shaping the future of banking in Greece.


Through our large-scale Transformation Program, we are changing the way we operate, the way we deliver results and the way we service our Customers.


· We understand our Customers’ needs and design experiences around them.

If you are a change enthusiast who sets ambitious goals and works with a sense of purpose, we want to get to know you!


Join our team and #be_part_of_tomorrow

#AlphaBank #TheAlphaBlueprint #Tomorrow



Job description


The Business Intelligence Software Developer will be placed in Business Intelligence team of Alpha Bank IT Digital Services and Data Analytics Division and will be responsible for designing, developing and supporting business intelligence ETL solutions. The position will also assist with data analysis, constructing technical designs, developing ETL applications, communicating with team members and business stakeholders, and supporting existing ETL applications. This position will also supervise and coordinate the work activities of external ETL development and support resources.

He/she should be self-motivated with strong problem solving, analytical and communication skills, and the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and work both independently and in a team environment.


What you will be doing


  • Develop software applications (online and batch frameworks) in a large computer system environment.
  • Cooperate with developers, designers and testers to implement effective technical solutions through the iterative approach reducing the delivery time.
  • Develop programs and services, utilizing the provided methodology, approach and technology.
  • Identify and resolve issues that arise from the production environment.
  • Close cooperation with IT operation team.


What you need to have


  • A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field required.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in Greek and English.
  • At least one (1) to three (3) years of relevant experience working as Software Developer (BI).
  • At least one (1) to three (3) years of relevant experience working directly with software development teams.
  • RDBMS Data Modelling, RDBMS Best Practices.
  • Knowledge of T-SQL, PL-SQL, SSIS, SSAS.
  • End2End Design, ETL & BI Designer Tools, TeamFS, Azure DevOps.
  • Knowledge of IBM InfoSphere DataStage, InfoSphere Analyzer, InfoSphere Metadata Workbench.
  • SAP Business Objects, QlikSense, PowerBI.
  • Programming languages C#, .Net, Python.


What will be considered an asset


  • Experience in the following mentioned tools will be highly appreciated: Informatica, IBM Netezza RDBMS.
  • Experience with or exposure to IBM SPSS or SAS would be preferred.


What we offer


It’s all about our people. At Alpha Bank, you will enjoy:


  • A friendly and collaborative working environment that supports taking initiative and action.
  • A culture that centers around learning and continuous development and encourages everyone to bring their best self to work.
  • The opportunity to challenge your thinking through your participation in complex tasks and transformation projects.
  • Being part of a large organization with a leading role in the Greek economy and a strong presence in the community.
  • Flexible working options.
  • A competitive salary and benefits.


All applications will be acknowledged and treated in utmost confidence.

Title: Software Developer – Business Intelligence
Skills: Business Intelligence (BI)|C#|Computer Science|Data Modeling|DataStage|Netezza|Qlik Sense|SAP BusinessObjects|SQL|SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)|
Job Description:
About the job

Job Summary

Our clinical operations activities are growing rapidly and we are currently seeking a full-time experienced Contract Manager to join our Site Activation and Maintenance team, within Clinical Operations.

Medpace specialises in supporting mid-sized biopharma companies giving you the opportunity to work on complex and challenging trials, often involving new technologies and novel therapies. If you want an exciting role where you use your previous expertise and can develop and grow your career even further, then this is the opportunity for you!

Responsibilities
  • Responsible for managing contract & budget negotiations for assigned projects;
  • Play a key role in managing timelines;
  • Responsible for reporting contract & budget negotiation progress to internal and external project teams; and
  • Serve as primary point of contact for internal and external project teams.

Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree;
  • 4 years of contract management experience preferably in a clinical research or similar industry setting;
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and leadership skills; and
  • Fluent in English and Greek.

Medpace Overview

Medpace is a full-service clinical contract research organization (CRO). We provide Phase I-IV clinical development services to the biotechnology, pharmaceutical and medical device industries. Our mission is to accelerate the global development of safe and effective medical therapeutics through its scientific and disciplined approach. We leverage local regulatory and therapeutic expertise across all major areas including oncology, cardiology, metabolic disease, endocrinology, central nervous system, anti-viral and anti-infective. Headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, employing more than 5,000 people across 40+ countries.

Why Medpace?

When you join Medpace, you become part of a team dedicated to supporting the development of ground-breaking drugs and devices. Our employees provide hope for those living with debilitating diseases. We invite you to be a part of something that is impacting millions of people around the globe while enjoying a competitive total compensation and benefits package and internal growth opportunities.

Awards:
  • Medpace historically named a Top Cincinnati Workplace by the Cincinnati Enquirer
  • Recognized by Forbes as one of America's Best Mid-size Companies in 2021
  • Medpace ranks amongst top CROs for site ratings across all 10 important attributes including CRA training, preparation & organization, accessibility of staff, open communication, and ensuring timely drug availability
  • Continually recognized with CRO Leadership Awards from Life Science Leader magazine based on expertise, quality, capabilities, reliability, and compatibility
  • Ranked in the top 10 on the 2021 LinkedIn Top Companies list in Cincinnati

What to Expect Next:

A member of our recruitment team will review your qualifications and, if interested, you will be contacted for an interview.

Title: Laboratory Assistant
Skills: Analytics|Communication|Documentation|Greek|Laboratory Safety|Laboratory Skills|Microbiology|Quality Control|Research Skills|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Description


Who We Are:


Persado provides the only Motivation AI platform that generates personalized communications at scale, inspiring each individual to engage and act. Many of the world’s largest brands, including Ally Bank, Dropbox, JPMorgan Chase, Marks & Spencer, and Verizon, rely on Persado to generate hyper-personalized communications. Persado’s generative AI is trained on more than 100 billion digital business language impressions across industries, enabling marketers to motivate customers and drive significant business value.


As an employer, Persado is committed to creating a place where everyone’s unique perspective is valued. We understand that our team members and our inclusive culture are what make Persado special. Persado is proud to be named on Fast Company’s World’s Most Innovative Companies list in 2020, Built In’s Best Places To Work in 2021 & 2022, and Comparably's Best HR Team in 2022.


What We Are Looking For


Persado is looking for a Software Engineer in Test (QA Automation Engineer) to join our talented team of engineers! This role is ideal for an individual with experience in preparation and execution of procedures for software quality assurance, according to outlined industry standards.


As a Software Engineer in Test (QA Automation Engineer) you will develop and execute functional manual, exploratory and automated tests, and non-functional tests. You will ensure that quality issues and defects are appropriately identified, documented, tracked, and resolved in Persado’s defect tracking system. You will estimate, plan, and coordinate testing activities for your projects.


What You Will Work On


  • Review requirements specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
  • Communicate with internal teams (e.g. developers and business analysts) to help identify missing requirements.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured Test Plans and Test Cases.
  • Record, document thoroughly and track defect life cycle.
  • Implement automated Test Cases based on automation frameworks built in-house.
  • Perform thorough automated regression testing, analyze results.
  • Be up to date with new testing tools and testing strategies.


What You Bring


  • 2-3 years of working experience in Software Testing with automation testing experience.
  • University degree in Engineering / Computer Science.
  • Knowledge of OO programming languages like Java or Groovy or any other language.
  • Knowledge of Selenium / WebDriver automation framework.
  • Knowledge of basic SQL queries.
  • Knowledge of Spring Java Enterprise Framework would be considered a plus.
  • Knowledge of tools like: Jira, Postman would be considered a plus.
  • Knowledge of testing frameworks like testNG, Junit, Spock and Serenity would be considered a plus.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD tools like Jenkins, TeamCity, Travis or GitLab CI would be considered a plus.
  • ISTQB certification foundation level would be a plus.
  • Willing to innovate, learn and share knowledge.
  • Solid analytical thinker and problem solver.
  • Self-driven, responsible, taking ownership.
  • Comfortable working in a flat company structure without close supervision and with a proactive goal-oriented attitude.


What We Offer


Achieve your life goals and work goals at Persado.


  • Persado’s hybrid working model empowers both remote and in-office work equitably!
  • Competitive and equitable compensation.
  • Generous benefits packages globally.
  • 401k matching (USA); Pension Scheme (Certain EU locations) to prepare for your future.
  • We encourage professional growth through our dedicated enablement and training teams, as well as on demand tools and resources.
  • Employee Enrichment Fund to pursue a passion or upgrade your home office!
  • Structured onboarding program to ensure a confident start and long-term success for new hires!
  • Strong emphasis on career development and mobility, continuous feedback loops and performance management.
  • Flexible time off to support work-life harmony (including Summer Fridays).
  • #PersadoCares! 2 paid Volunteer days per year and a charitable donation match.
  • Robust Diversity, Inclusion and Belonging initiatives; culture month celebrations, monthly diverse speaker series, commitment to bias-free recruitment, ERGs (#culture, #mindsmatter, #parents, #women, #green, #pride and growing)!
  • Recognition, Rewards and Ideas to Action programs to recognize the contributions and impact of Persadoans across the globe!


Valuing diversity at Persado means recognizing and respecting human differences and similarities. Persado is committed to diversity with respect to all aspects of employment. All decisions regarding recruitment, hiring, promotion, compensation, employee training and development, and all other terms and conditions of employment, will be made without regard to race, religious beliefs, color, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, physical and mental disability, age, ancestry, or place of origin.

J


YOUR CONTRACT


We’re looking for people who will help us ensure that packages go on the right journey. You’ll work in our facility in Koropi City (Athens, Greece) from 06.00am to 11.00 am from Monday to Friday.

Title: Software Engineer in Test (QA Automation Engineer)
Skills: Defect Life Cycle|Design Documents|Problem Solving|Regression Testing|Software Development|Software Testing|Technical Design|Test Automation|Test Cases|Test Planning|
Job Description:
About the job

Main Purpose:As a Bulk Cargo Operator you will be responsible for the end-to-end execution of physical bulk shipments, identifying the safest and most efficient way to transport commodities from point of origin to point of destination. In this role, you will be involved in a broad range of activities that include but are not limited to logistics, contract execution, risk management, manage relationships with Suppliers, Clients and Contractors.Our Bulk Operators are passionate about logistics and supply chain, outstanding problem solvers who are able to think analytically even under pressure, dedicated and upbeat professionals able to adapt to constantly evolving conditions with their great organization skills and attention to detail.Knowledge Skills and Abilities, Key Responsibilities:
  • Bachelor or Master degree in Shipping / Supply Chain / Engineering / International Trade or other related subject.
  • 1–3 years of experience in the Bulk/logistics industry preferred. Specific knowledge related to Bulk Logistics (Multi-modal transport, blending, qualities, Incoterms, contractual terms and documentation requirements) are highly desirable.
  • Strong communication skills required as daily contact with international partners internal and external is required to conduct daily operations.
  • Fluent English is crucial, however proficiency in a second language will be welcomed
  • Solid analytical capabilities, including the ability to summarize complex logistical issues and detailed analysis with clarity and brevity in written or oral form.
  • Accurate and efficient working style with strong attention to detail
  • Ability to work well in fast-paced environment and maintain flexible working hours in the event of deadlines
  • Open personality with energy and drive
  • IT skills: Excel, Word, Outlook, with the ability to quickly learn and adapt to new computer systems and cross system interdependencies

Key Responsibilities

  • Written and verbal daily contacts with suppliers, receivers and service providers (Agents, Inspection Companies, Customs Brokers, Barge Lines, Rail Providers etc.)
  • Stockpile management and reconciliation
  • Coordinating shipments schedules with our customers
  • Preparation, verification, and handling of all shipping documents
  • Invoicing while observing and maintaining payments terms (Holding Certificates, CAD, Letters of Credit, Bank collections, Open Account etc)
  • Exposure Management
  • Arranging for inspection, sampling, assaying and umpires of cargoes as per contractual terms.
  • Organization and coordination of shipments through direct contact with various Trafigura offices
  • Upkeep and maintenance of Trafigura’s in house Trading and Risk Management system
  • Maintenance of multiple reports including Credit Exposure reports and Logistics reports.

Key Relationships and Department Overview:

The team has daily communication with:

  • Traders
  • Trade Finance Department,
  • Accounting Department
  • Treasury Department
  • Risk management Department
  • Suppliers, Clients, Contractors

Title: Package Operations Sorter/Loader Athens, Greece
Skills: Communication|English|Sorting|
Job Description:
About the job

About us
 This is your opportunity to join an internationally awarded service design and digital transformation agency. At Linakis.digital, we are committed to our ongoing evolution, with the dynamic foundation of our business growth being our dedicated and skilled people. We are proud of our friendly work culture, and we continually aim to create an optimal employee experience that embraces a healthy work life balance.

Job Overview
 The overall quality in every aspect of the services we provide has always been one of our core concerns and characteristics. This is especially true for the front-end and back-end code artifacts that we create. Our code is used in the most complex and demanding transactional projects in Greece and abroad. It is therefore imperative that it is fast, secure, reusable, and bug-free. We are seeking to strengthen our team with a Testing Engineer to take a lead on our Testing processes and procedures.

As a TE, you will work alongside our front-end and back-end software development teams to develop customized testing procedures for the company’s projects. You will also oversee the complete testing of these projects, from initial design of test cases, through to thorough testing, and final delivery. You are a high-energy individual with analytical skills and able to identify small problems within complex software systems. You are finally adept at processing information through coding, calculating, and verifying data.

Key Responsibilities
  • Design test plans, procedures, scenarios, and scripts to accurately assess newly developed projects according to customer and project requirements.
  • Develop testing protocol for various aspects, such as usability, performance, error and bug finding, regression testing, and implementation scenarios.
  • Define testing methodology and procedures to ensure continuous improvement to software quality assurance standards.
  • Identify, analyze and create detailed records of problems that appear during testing, such as software defects, bugs, functionality issues, and output errors, and work directly with software developers to find solutions and develop re-testing procedures.
  • Track problems, resolutions, and bug fixes throughout testing, and create a comprehensive database of defects and successful mitigation techniques.
  • Create detailed, step-by-step documentation of test procedures for each phase our projects to ensure replicability, compliance with standards, and growth of company knowledge base.
  • Communicate clearly and effectively with front-end and back-end developers to facilitate quick resolution of problems and accurate documentation of successes.
  • Become efficient in the use and parameterization of specilized testing tools for front-end and back-end code, for websites and mobile apps.

Skills and Attributes to Succeed
  • Bachelor’s degree in engineering, information technology, computer science, or similar field.
  • Excellent time-management skills and commitment to meet deadlines.
  • Knowledge of the principles and concepts of programming languages (e.g. C#, Javascript, HTML, etc).
  • Very good knowledge of the English language. Ability to express well orally and in written in English.
  • Manage multiple independent projects, delivering results within time and budget.
  • Be diligent in identifying and executing testing and reporting processes.
  • Comply to corporate processes and procedures.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving and rigorous attention to detail.
  • Ability to operate normally under pressure, a team player and a good communicator, are mandatory to succeed in your role.
  • Quick learner to adopt new technologies and methodologies.
Will be considered a plus:
  • Concepts and methodologies of Software Testing.
  • Well-rounded experience with multiple operating systems, virtualization technologies, and test environments.
  • Prior experience in an equivalent position, i.e. testing Web Applications frontend and backend.
  • Experience with QA best practices and methodologies.

Benefits of working with us
  • Competitive salary and Private Medical-Life Insurance.
  • An individual and well-structured introduction and training when you onboard.
  • Training budget for personal & professional development.
  • Friendly and highly motivated colleagues.
  • Hybrid working model.
  • Career progression opportunities.
  • Continuous competencies development.
  • A spacious workplace that promotes co-creation, collaboration, and improvement.
  • Flexible working hours.

Title: Bulk Cargo Operator
Skills: Attention to Detail|Communication|Daily Operations|English|Incoterms|
Job Description:
About the job

Mayoral is the leader in the children´s apparel industry throughout Spain, and one of Europe´s leading groups. The company is dedicated to the design, manufacturing, commercialization, and distribution of children´s apparel in more than 100 countries, through a network of 20 foreign commercial companies, 250 sales agents, 245 Mayoral stores, and more than 10.000 clients worldwide.


Among the wide range of products, Mayoral offers clothing, footwear and accessories designed for children aged 0-16 years.


Mayoral is looking for:

Backoffice Administrator based in Athens.


The role includes the following responsibilities among others:

Communicating with and supporting the wholesale sales network, telephone customer service and problem solving for wholesale and retail customers, invoicing via ERP System, monitoring and reporting sales and deposits, liaising with the company's headquarters in Malaga Spain, Spanish text translations etc.


Minimum Requirements:

  • T.E.I. or I.E.K. degree (preferably in management, business administration or marketing)
  • Very good knowledge of Spanish (B2 level or higher).
  • Excellent knowledge of the Internet and excellent use of Excel
  • Fluency in written communication
  • Cooperation with all departments of the company
  • Pleasant and dynamic personality, effective communication, organizational skills, multitasking and speed in performing tasks
  • Experience in a similar position is not mandatory


Mayoral offers:

  • Modern and friendly environment of a multinational company
  • Five-day office week
  • Salary depending on qualifications
  • Opportunities for development


At Mayoral we are committed to equal employment opportunities regardless of gender, sexual orientation, skin colour, age, religion or any other non-professional consideration and we guarantee this principle in all selection processes.



ΥΠΑΛΛΗΛΟΣ ΓΡΑΦΕΙΟΥ


Η Mayoral είναι ηγετική μάρκα στη παιδική ένδυση και μια από τις πιο σημαντικές εταιρείες παιδικής μόδας στην Ευρώπη. Ασχολείται με το σχεδιασμό, τη παραγωγή, το marketing και τη διανομή παιδικής μόδας σε πάνω από 100 χώρες μέσω ενός δικτύου πωλήσεων που αποτελείται από 20 θυγατρικές εταιρείες, 200 εμπορικούς αντιπροσώπους, 330 καταστήματα Mayoral και πάνω από 10.000 σημεία πώλησης ανά τον κόσμο.

Μέσα στη μεγάλη γκάμα προϊόντων που προσφέρει η Mayoral βρίσκουμε ενδύματα, υποδήματα και αξεσουάρ σχεδιασμένα για παιδιά ηλικίας από 0-16 ετών.


Η Mayoral αναζητά:

Διοικητικό/ή υπάλληλο με έδρα στην Αθήνα


Ο ρόλος περιλαμβάνει τις εξής αρμοδιότητες μεταξύ άλλων:

Επικοινωνία με το δίκτυο πωλητών χονδρικής και την υποστήριξή τους, τηλεφωνική εξυπηρέτηση και επίλυση προβλημάτων πελατών χονδρικής και λιανικής, τιμολόγηση μέσω ERP, παρακολούθηση και reporting πωλήσεων και εισπράξεων, επικοινωνία με τα κεντρικά γραφεία της μητρικής εταιρείας στη Μάλαγα Ισπανίας, μεταφράσεις κειμένων κ.α.


Ο/Η ιδανικός/η υποψήφιος/α πρέπει να διαθέτει:

  • Πτυχίο Α.Ε.Ι. ή Τ.Ε.Ι. ή Ι.Ε.Κ. (κατά προτίμηση διοικητικής κατεύθυνσης, διοίκησης επιχειρήσεων ή marketing)
  • Πολύ καλή γνώση Ισπανικής γλώσσας (πτυχίο Β2 και ανώτερο)
  • Άριστη γνώση χειρισμού Η/Υ και εφαρμογών MS Office
  • Άριστες επικοινωνιακές δεξιότητες
  • Ομαδικό πνεύμα
  • Ευχάριστη και δυναμική προσωπικότητα, οργανωτικές δεξιότητες, multitasking και ταχύτητα στην εκτέλεση των καθηκόντων
  • Δεν είναι απαραίτητη εμπειρία σε ανάλογη θέση


Η Mayoral προσφέρει:

  • Σύγχρονο και φιλικό περιβάλλον πολυεθνικής εταιρίας
  • Πενθήμερη εργασία γραφείου
  • Μισθό αναλόγως προσόντων
  • Πλήρης εκπαίδευση
  • Δυνατότητα εξέλιξης


Στη Mayoral δεσμευόμαστε για ίσες ευκαιρίες απασχόλησης ανεξαρτήτως φύλου, σεξουαλικού προσανατολισμού, χρώματος δέρματος, ηλικίας, θρησκείας ή οποιουδήποτε άλλου μη επαγγελματικού κριτηρίου και εγγυόμαστε αυτή την αρχή σε όλες τις διαδικασίες επιλογής.

Title: Testing Engineer
Skills: Business Process Management|
Job Description:
About the job

Public Group strategically invests to create an ecosystem of innovative scaleups around its Omnichannel Retail business, with the objective to provide exciting customer experiences and foster Entrepreneurship in Greece. We bring together technology, talent & entrepreneurship to create value in the Greek market. Our role is to help our subsidiaries or investee companies grow and their founders to succeed through capital and creative synergies. Our investment portfolio includes Public-MediaMarkt, iRepair, Douleutaras.gr, PublicNEXT, Venture Friends.

PublicNEXT leads the digital transformation of retail, with solutions to reimagine processes, integrate technologies and introduce innovative services or platforms that transform employee and customer experience. We develop and unleash the best technology solutions that shape the future of retail. Our team of software developers, engineers, digital and IT experts combine strong technical skills and entrepreneurial thinking to help organizations stay ahead.

As future-ready innovators, we engage in multiple projects and create growth opportunities for everyone to find what they are looking for. Together we can reimagine retail and unleash the best technology platforms to create new capabilities for people and inspire them to enjoy life. We grow by continuously developing on each other’s ideas.


Let’s grow together.


#LI-Hybrid


Responsibilities:

  • Research new products and evaluate their functions with the aim of developing new products for the organization.
  • Redesign existing products based on new technologies and approaches to enhance software performance, functionality, user experience or reduce cost from organization.
  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code ensuring its quality and performance through testing and debugging.
  • Collaborate with other engineers to develop detailed software designs, requirements, specifications, and documentation.
  • Continuously learn new technologies, and tools to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in software development.
  • Overseeing the engineering of product to resolve any issues or identify areas for improvement.
  • Analyze project requirements, design solutions and create specification sheets that outline the details and specifications of the desired product or system
  • Evaluate prototype products to ensure they meet the desired functionality, are user-friendly, and have a long lifespan
  • Present product solutions to management and stakeholders.


Requirements:

  • 3+ years' experience as a software engineer.
  • Excellent knowledge of software development best practices, hands on development experience in Python and familiarity with other programming languages and technologies such as SQL, NoSQL, Hadoop, Spark, Java, JavaScript
  • Experience in software design and architecture, as well as software project management.
  • Experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks
  • Familiarity with cloud technologies and container platforms


Nice to have:

  • Advanced analytical and mathematical skills.
  • Ability to understand business processes from a customer perspective
  • Ability to work in a team environment, effectively interacting with others
  • Time management skills and the ability to adjust priorities


Benefits:

  • Being part of an amazing new team with the mission to “Unleash Tech”
  • Competitive compensation & benefits package
  • Dynamic work environment
  • Exciting opportunity to grow with the role
  • Great experience in a well-known and respected growing business
  • Ongoing training and development
  • Hybrid way of working

About the job

Zorlu Energy operates on various fields of the sector with its experience of 29 years. In our fields of operation, we are combining our well established experience with our corporate values and make a difference among other players of the sector in engineering, supply, construction, management, maintenance and repair.


We are utilizing our high capacity production power, qualified human resources, well balanced portfolio, diversity of sources and capability of creating innovative solutions to be a perpetual and leading part of the global energy transformation.


"Electrip Greece” has been established in Greece under 100% ownership of Zorlu Energy in order to pursue its activities and projects covering electrical vehicle charging station sales, installment and operation activities abroad with its subsidiaries.
