Title: Customer Service Agent
Skills: Active Listening|Communication|Customer Service|English|Greek|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Job description

iGlass is looking for a suitable candidate to become its hands on Production Director.


General Purpose

To plan, organize and control the production in iGlass's industrial premises, located in the industrial area of Thessaloniki, Sindos, Greece, and to ensure that all goods are produced efficiently, on time, within budget and to standard.


As production manager, you will work closely with supervisors, maintenance technicians, buyers, suppliers, quality control, HR (training), and health and safety supervisors.

Your work would cover the three main areas of the production process:

  • planning – preparing orders, setting quality standards and estimating timescales and costs
  • control – monitoring production schedules and adjusting them if problems occur
  • supervision – managing supervisors, organizing staff and making sure targets are met


You'll also put together production reports for factory managers and clients.


Job Location

iGlass’s industrial premises, located in the industrial area of Thessaloniki, Sindos, Greece.


Main Job Tasks and Responsibilities

  • Plan a production schedule for the job
  • Implement and control the production schedule
  • Review and adjust the schedule where needed
  • Determine the human resources required
  • Determine the material resources required
  • Manage human and material resources to meet production targets
  • Make decisions about equipment use, maintenance, modification and procurement
  • Work out and implement standard operating procedures for production operations
  • Ensure that standard operating procedures are adhered to
  • Ensure implementation and adherence to health and safety procedures
  • Set product quality standards
  • Monitor quality standards of products
  • Implement and enforce quality control and tracking programs to meet quality objectives
  • Analyse production and quality control to detect and correct problems
  • Determine and implement improvements to the production process
  • Prepare and maintain production reports
  • Monitor and review the performance of staff and organize necessary interventions for improvement
  • Estimate production costs
  • Set production budgets
  • Manage production budgets
  • Implement cost control programs
  • Ensure efficient collaboration and co-ordination between relevant departments including procurement, distribution and management


Education and Experience

  • A degree from a higher institution (University or Technological Institution) in business administration, engineering, industrial technology
  • At least 10year work experience in a similar position, in a related industry
  • Knowledge and experience in production and manufacturing processes and techniques
  • Knowledge of raw materials
  • Knowledge of quality systems and standards
  • Knowledge of health and safety standards and compliance
  • Knowledge of process improvement techniques
  • Knowledge of business, finance and management principles
  • Knowledge of human resource principles and practices
  • Knowledge of machines and tools
  • Knowledge of engineering and technology principles and practices
  • Solid computer skills
  • A Greek native speaker and good knowledge of at least one foreign language, preferably English


Key Competencies

  • Critical thinking and problem solving skills
  • Planning and organizing
  • Co-ordination and control
  • Time management
  • Attention to detail
  • Decision-making
  • Communication skills
  • Persuasiveness
  • Negotiation skills
  • Influencing and leading
  • Delegation
  • Team work
  • Conflict management
  • Adaptability
  • Stress tolerance

Compensation and Benefits Package

  • Competitive Salary
  • Corporate Cellphone

Title: Senior Electrical Engineer
Skills: AC/DC|Analytical Skills|Communication|Electrical Engineering|English|Feasibility Studies|Legal Procedures|Microsoft Office|Panel Design|Team Management|
Job Description:
About the job

Quality & Compliance Engineer - Motion Control and Robotic Systems

RoboteQ is an international company, a subsidiary of Nidec Motor Corporation, a renowned maker of Motor Controllers and Navigation Sensors for Mobile Robots, Industrial Automation, and Electrification of off-road Vehicles.

We are pleased to announce an opportunity for a Quality & Compliance Engineer based near Athens, Greece.

Summary of Role

In this role as Quality & Compliance Engineer, you will be working with a highly motivated team to bring to market innovative solutions for customers in the AGV, Robotics and Industrial Automation Markets. Key aspects for this role will be to work on analyzing and defining and executing the test cases based on the standards under which our products should conform.


Primary Responsibilities

  • Ensure current and future Quality Management System and Products are compliant to current and proposed regulatory requirements.
  • Assist in the creation of safety processes’ documentation.
  • Assist the team to follow safety processes for new products development.
  • Write and review product safety and compliance requirements and characteristics.
  • Perform internal audits.
  • Train and transfer knowledge between project teams
  • Support and ensure alignment of functional safety and compliance best practices between projects.
  • Continuous study of legislation and standard updates.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Computer Science.
  • Experience with Quality standards such as ISO 9001.
  • Experience with standards and regulations such as IEC 61508, ISO 13849, IEC 61800-5-2, and ISO 26262.
  • Previous experience with industrial or automotive manufacturing, product development or design will be considered a plus.
  • Experience with SISTEMA tool will be considered a plus.
  • English language: good speaking and writing level.
  • Good communication skills, positive attitude, and eagerness to learn.

Location:

  • Markopoulo, Attica, Greece, 19003


Reference:

  • RQ-QCE2301

Title: Production Director
Skills: Attention to Detail|Business Administration|Compensation|Employee Benefits|Manufacturing Process Improvement|Organization Skills|Production Management|Production Operations|Production Schedules|Stress Tolerance|
Job Description:
About the job

Η Krannich Solar με τη δυναμική της παρουσία από το 1995 στην παγκόσμια αγορά ηλιακής ενέργειας, συμβάλλει ενεργά στην προώθηση της φωτοβολταϊκής τεχνολογίας.


Η παροχή εξειδικευμένων λύσεων, η συνεργασία με διεθνώς αναγνωρισμένους κατασκευαστικούς οίκους που παρέχουν επώνυμα και αξιόπιστα προϊόντα και οι άριστα οργανωμένες αποθήκες, καθιστούν την Krannich Solar ως τον κορυφαίο προμηθευτή φωτοβολταϊκού εξοπλισμού σε παγκόσμιο επίπεδο.


Η ραγδαία ανάπτυξη της Krannich Solar οδήγησε σε σύντομο χρονικό διάστημα στην ίδρυση 29 υποκαταστημάτων σε 25 χώρες όπου σήμερα απασχολούνται περισσότερα από 1000 έμπειρα στελέχη.


Στο πλαίσιο της δυναμικής ανάπτυξης των δραστηριοτήτων της στην Ελληνική αγορά, η Krannich Solar αναζητά Sales Support Engineer για την έδρα της εταιρείας στην Θεσσαλονίκη


Βασικές Αρμοδιότητες:


Προετοιμασία οικονομοτεχνικών προσφορών

Τηλεφωνική και ηλεκτρονική επικοινωνία για αποτελεσματική διαχείριση αιτημάτων πελατών

Διατήρηση ισχυρών σχέσεων με τους πελάτες μέσω της άριστης εξυπηρέτησης και της άρτιας τεχνικής υποστήριξης

Στενή συνεργασία με το τμήμα πωλήσεων

Παρακολούθηση των παραγγελιών και αποθεμάτων ώστε να διασφαλίζονται οι ανάγκες των πελατών

Ειδίκευση στα προϊόντα και τις υπηρεσίες της εταιρείας

Συλλογή και τεκμηρίωση πληροφοριών σχετικά με τον ανταγωνισμό


Απαραίτητα προσόντα:


Πτυχίο Μηχανικού Π.Ε. / Τ.Ε. - κατά προτίμηση Ηλεκτρολόγου Μηχανικού

Προϋπηρεσία σε αντίστοιχη θέση αποτελεί πλεονέκτημα

Κατανόηση των αρχών πωλήσεων και των πρακτικών εξυπηρέτησης πελατών

Άριστη χρήση της Ελληνικής και Αγγλικής γλώσσας

Εξοικείωση με νέες τεχνολογίες, συστήματα CRM και MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)

Άριστες επικοινωνιακές και οργανωτικές δεξιότητες

Ικανότητα επίλυσης προβλημάτων, ιεράρχηση προτεραιοτήτων και διαπραγμάτευσης

Ευελιξία και προσαρμοστικότητα

Η Krannich Solar προσφέρει ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών, οργανωμένο και φιλικό περιβάλλον εργασίας, συνεχή εκπαίδευση και επιμόρφωση, προοπτικές εξέλιξης σε ένα δυναμικά αναπτυσσόμενο οργανισμό.

Title: Quality & Compliance Engineer
Skills: EtherCAT|Functional Safety|IEC 61508|ISO 13849|ISO 26262|ISO 9001|Industrial Automation|Motion Control|Motors|Robotics|
Job Description:
About the job

H ΤΕΡΝΑ Α.Ε., εταιρεία του Ομίλου ΓΕΚ ΤΕΡΝΑ, αναζητά:

Project Planner

για μεγάλο κτιριακό έργο

Αρμοδιότητες θέσης:
  • Συντάσσει και διαμορφώνει εξαρχής αναλυτικά χρονοδιαγράμματα των επιμέρους και του συνολικού έργου, με τη χρήση του λογισμικού Primavera
  • Εφαρμόζει τις τρέχουσες μεθοδολογίες προγραμματισμού και παρακολούθησης χρονοδιαγραμμάτων (resource & cost loading, curves, KPI’s, EAV methodology etc.)
  • Μελετά τις συμβάσεις των έργων και ενημερώνει τα ενδιαφερόμενα μέρη για τις προθεσμίες
  • Ενημερώνει το χρονοδιάγραμμα σε μόνιμη βάση, οργανώνει και διατηρεί τα δεδομένα και τις πληροφορίες βάσει των απαιτήσεων του εκάστοτε έργου
  • Παρέχει τις απαιτούμενες πληροφορίες προς τη διεύθυνση του έργου
  • Συντάσσει και παρουσιάζει τις εκθέσεις παρακολούθησης προόδου των έργων σε τακτικά χρονικά διαστήματα στη διεύθυνση του έργου, παρέχοντας έγκαιρη ενημέρωση για την εξέλιξη των εργασιών
  • Συνεργάζεται με όλα τα τμήματα, διευκολύνοντας την απαραίτητη επικοινωνία σε κάθε στάδιο υλοποίησης του εκάστοτε έργου

Απαιτούμενα Προσόντα:
  • Πτυχίο ΑΕΙ Πολιτικού Μηχανικού με πολυετή εμπειρία σε κτιριακά έργα
  • Εξειδίκευση σε Project Management
  • Τυχόν πρόσθετες σπουδές στο αντικείμενο του χρονικού προγραμματισμού θα εκτιμηθούν
  • 10 έτη ελάχιστη εμπειρία σε χρονοδιαγράμματα κτιριακών έργων στην Ελλάδα και στο εξωτερικό
  • Εμπειρία στην κατασκευή θα εκτιμηθεί
  • Άριστη γνώση λογισμικών MS Project και Primavera
  • Καλή γνώση Αγγλικής γλώσσας (προφορικά & γραπτά)
  • Πολύ καλή γνώση χειρισμού εφαρμογών MS Office

Δεξιότητες:
  • Αποτελεσματική επικοινωνία και συνεργασία σε όλα τα επίπεδα
  • Ικανότητα τήρησης χρονοδιαγραμμάτων και συντονισμού πολλαπλών εργασιών
  • Προθυμία για συνεχή μάθηση και εξέλιξη του αντικειμένου

Παροχές Εταιρείας:
  • Προοπτικές εξέλιξης και ανάπτυξης σε έναν ισχυρό Όμιλο εταιρειών
  • Συμμετοχή σε Ομαδικό Ασφαλιστήριο Συμβόλαιο

Title: Sales Support Engineer

Job Description:
About the job

As part of our continuous development, our company is looking for a talented candidate for the position of Validation Engineer . The position reports to the Validation Supervisor.




  • Create system validation deliverables (user requirements, risk analysis, test protocols (IQ/OQ/PQ), validation reports).
  • Execute qualification protocols prior to commissioning (FAT/SAT).
  • Prepare of standard operating procedures.
  • Ensure projects are managed in conjunction with all regulatory requirements (FDA, Part 11).

  • Perform a risk analysis.
  • Track and report on the validation testing.
  • Ensure the validation status of equipment and systems are always following cGMPs.
  • Execute calibration on instruments (for example temperature, humidity, pressure, and conductivity sensors).


Requirements

  • BSC degree in Mechanical, Electrical or Automation Engineering. MSC degree would be considered a plus.
  • At least 1 year of relevant work experience in industrial production. Relevant experience in Validation of pharmaceutical production equipment is preferred.
  • Working experience in computer system validation (CSV) is preferred.
  • Good understanding of FDA, Part 11 regulations and pharmaceutical industry standards.
  • Very good knowledge or MS Office.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication in Greek and English.
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and set priorities.
  • Critical thinking and problem-solving skills
  • Flexibility and adaptability.


Benefits

The company offers competitive salary and benefits, continuous specialized training, career development and a friendly working environment.

Title: Project Planner (Mega Projects)
Skills: Analytical Skills|English|Marketing|Microsoft Project|Procurement|Project Control|Project Planning|Research Skills|Teamwork|
Job Description:
About the job

PAL (www.pal.gr) is a leading Greek manufacturing company founded in 1947, currently active in two business sectors: Cookware and Food Packaging materials. Our products are present in all major Supermarket chains and retailers in Greece, and we export to more than 30 countries. With growth rate of 20% YoY we are looking for a dynamic and passionate individual to join us as Business Analyst based in Kifissia, Athens, Greece. We are seeking driven and trustworthy candidates who work efficiently without sacrificing accuracy. You should have an excellent understanding of accounting and financial aspects and regulations and excellent computer and verbal and written communication skills as well as IT understanding.


Purpose and Responsibilities

· Collaborate in the processes for financial forecasting and budgets, and the preparation of all financial reporting

· Help management team make informed decisions and monitor progress by providing financial information and analysis through meaningful and informative reports and dashboards and uncover areas for improvement.

· Design/develop and run reports as well as dashboards in ERP and excel.

· Produce both weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual analysis as well as ad-hoc analysis/modeling for projects

· In close collaboration with various departments define:

o reporting requirements

o develop KPIs

o monitor KPIs

· Develop visual presentations to assist stakeholders in understanding data

· Collect data from departments to develop budget projections and forecasts

· Monitor company’s financial obligations and ensure accurate projections in management reports and cashflow projection

· Ensure accuracy of financial records by ensuring all departments comply with processes and coordinate with IT and other departments to ensure accuracy and quality of data necessary for reports

· Remain up-to-date on the new process and IT developments to automate upgrade systems and current financial and accounting legislation

· Conduct meetings and presentations to findings and effectively communicating your insights.

· Assist the reviewing of all formal finance, HR and IT related procedures


Candidate Profile:

· BSc and/or MSc in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, Accounting or any relevant field.

· Computer Science and IT considered a strong asset

· At least 2-3 years of experience in a large Greek or Multinational company preferably in the Manufacturing industry. Experience in similar role will be considered a strong asset.

· Excellent communication skills

· Ability to work as part of a team

· Demonstrated analytical skills and experience in financial modelling.

· Excellent proficiency in Greek and English language, both written and spoken.

· Excellent knowledge of Microsoft Office Tools (Excel, Word, Access, Outlook, PowerPoint), excellent IT proficiency.

• Ability to translate business requirements to activities and reports

Title: Validation Engineer
Skills: Communication|Computer System Validation|Problem Solving|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

EmDoT is a company at the forefront of developing IoT value-added solutions. Investing in cutting-edge technologies and in our team is at the core of our future growth. In order to meet our ever-increasing needs, we are currently looking for a Technical Support Team Leader to join us.

SCOPE:

﻿Technical Support Team Leaders ensure customers are always satisfied before, during, and after a sale or support issue. They supervise and manage a customer support team and train staff members to provide high-quality customer support while ensuring that company policies are followed.


MAIN DUTIES:

  • Lead a team of front-line customer support agents responsible for clients’ issues handling
  • Provide Customer Support services (Trainings/Support/Consulting)
  • Writing of technical documentation
  • Maintain an efficient and productive daily operation of the Customer Support Team
  • Manage support issues and set priorities.
  • Establish and implement key strategies for the customer support center
  • Understand and follow all company standard practice and policies
  • Attend team meetings. Provide peer coaching for team following best practices
  • Serve as a liaison to other areas of the business
  • Act as the liaison between management and customer support team
  • Observe and correct all unsafe conditions that could cause low quality service or unhandled customers’ issues.
  • Assist with ensuring all compliance to all customer contracts
  • Achieve business goals while fostering an environment that produces high levels of customer satisfaction.
  • Manage quality assurance program through CMS and other metrics
  • Provide feedback and annual performance reviews as well as formal corrective actions
  • Maintain a neat and organized work area


QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Bachelor's Degree in computer science or information technology or equivalent experience
  • Customer Service experience in a supervisory role in Technical / Computer science / Telecommunications sector


SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES:

  • Outstanding collaboration and communication
  • Problem solver
  • Critical Thinking
  • Leadership (coaching, training, motivating)
  • Time Management
  • Positive

Title: Business Analyst
Skills: Accounting|Budgeting|Computer Science|Data Analysis|Finance|Presentation Skills|
Job Description:
About the job

Ο Plant Manager θα είναι υπεύθυνος για την συνολική οργάνωση και την επίβλεψη, την ομαλή ροή και την ποιότητα της γραμμής παραγωγής. Ο στόχος είναι να διασφαλιστεί μια αποδοτική, παραγωγική διαδικασία που θα καλύπτει τις απαιτούμενες ποιοτικές προδιαγραφές και πρότυπα, και τους απαραίτητους πόρους.


Αρμοδιότητες

Ο Plant Manager θα έχει τις παρακάτω αρμοδιότητες:

  • Οργάνωση, διαχείριση και επίβλεψη της παραγωγής και επίλυση προβλημάτων
  • Δημιουργία και επίβλεψη πρωτοκόλλων Υγιεινής και Ασφάλειας σε όλα τα στάδια παραγωγής.
  • Δημιουργία και επίβλεψη χρονοδιαγράμματος παραγωγής
  • Ανάπτυξη στρατηγικής για τη μεγιστοποίηση της παραγωγής καθώς και τη μείωση κόστους
  • Συντονισμός και καθοδήγηση ανθρώπινου δυναμικού.
  • Ανάλυση δεδομένων παραγωγικότητας και δημιουργία αναφορών και παρουσιάσεων σε διοικητικό επίπεδο
  • Προετοιμασία και εκτίμηση προϋπολογισμού


Προσόντα & Απαιτήσεις θέσης

  • Προϋπηρεσία τουλάχιστον 5 έτών σε αντίστοιχη θέση Plant Manager
  • Επαρκής γνώση επιχειρησιακών και διοικητικών αρχών (προϋπολογισμός, στρατηγικός σχεδιασμός, κατανομή πόρων και ανθρωπίνων πόρων)
  • Πιστοποιήσεις και εμπειρία σε διαδικασίες και θέματα ασφάλειας (Health & Safety)
  • Γνώσεις σε θέματα ποιότητας, παραγωγικότητας, και οργάνωση απαιτήσεων (προγραμματικσμός, procurement κλπ), όπως και διαδικασιών απογραφής και διαχείρισης
  • Εξοικείωση με το βιομηχανικό εξοπλισμό και τεχνική
  • Πολύ καλή φυσική κατάσταση λόγω της φύσης της εργασίας
  • Οργανωτικότητα, μεθοδικότητα και προσοχή στη λεπτομέρεια
  • Ταχύτητα και δυνατότητα επίλυσης προβλημάτων
  • Ικανότητά συνεργασίας σε όλα τα επίπεδα


Παροχές

Η εταιρεία προσφέρει ελκυστικό πακέτο αποδοχών και ευκαιρίες επαγγελματικής εξέλιξης.

Title: Technical Support Team Leader
Skills: Computer Science|Customer Experience|Customer Service|Customer Support|Information Technology|Internet of Things (IoT)|Investing|Supervisory Skills|Support Services|Team Leadership|
Job Description:
About the job

At Alpha Bank, we are shaping the future of banking in Greece.


Through our large-scale Transformation Program, we are changing the way we operate, the way we deliver results and the way we service our Customers.


· We understand our Customers’ needs and design experiences around them.

· We work in partnership and invite diversity of skills and perspectives.

· We are forward-thinking and drive continuous improvement.

· We make things happen; we execute quickly and focus on what is essential.


If you are a change enthusiast who sets ambitious goals and works with a sense of purpose, we want to get to know you!


Join our team and #be_part_of_tomorrow

#AlphaBank #TheAlphaBlueprint #Tomorrow



Job description


The Business Intelligence Software Developer will be placed in Business Intelligence team of Alpha Bank IT Digital Services and Data Analytics Division and will be responsible for designing, developing and supporting business intelligence ETL solutions. The position will also assist with data analysis, constructing technical designs, developing ETL applications, communicating with team members and business stakeholders, and supporting existing ETL applications. This position will also supervise and coordinate the work activities of external ETL development and support resources.

He/she should be self-motivated with strong problem solving, analytical and communication skills, and the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and work both independently and in a team environment.


What you will be doing


  • Develop software applications (online and batch frameworks) in a large computer system environment.
  • Cooperate with developers, designers and testers to implement effective technical solutions through the iterative approach reducing the delivery time.
  • Develop programs and services, utilizing the provided methodology, approach and technology.
  • Identify and resolve issues that arise from the production environment.
  • Close cooperation with IT operation team.


What you need to have


  • A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field required.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in Greek and English.
  • At least one (1) to three (3) years of relevant experience working as Software Developer (BI).
  • At least one (1) to three (3) years of relevant experience working directly with software development teams.
  • RDBMS Data Modelling, RDBMS Best Practices.
  • Knowledge of T-SQL, PL-SQL, SSIS, SSAS.
  • End2End Design, ETL & BI Designer Tools, TeamFS, Azure DevOps.
  • Knowledge of IBM InfoSphere DataStage, InfoSphere Analyzer, InfoSphere Metadata Workbench.
  • SAP Business Objects, QlikSense, PowerBI.
  • Programming languages C#, .Net, Python.


What will be considered an asset


  • Experience in the following mentioned tools will be highly appreciated: Informatica, IBM Netezza RDBMS.
  • Experience with or exposure to IBM SPSS or SAS would be preferred.


What we offer


It’s all about our people. At Alpha Bank, you will enjoy:


  • A friendly and collaborative working environment that supports taking initiative and action.
  • A culture that centers around learning and continuous development and encourages everyone to bring their best self to work.
  • The opportunity to challenge your thinking through your participation in complex tasks and transformation projects.
  • Being part of a large organization with a leading role in the Greek economy and a strong presence in the community.
  • Flexible working options.
  • A competitive salary and benefits.


All applications will be acknowledged and treated in utmost confidence.

Title: Plant Manager
Skills: Health & Safety|Procurement|
Job Description:
About the job

Employment Type: Full-time & Permanent

Location: Dubai, UAE (Visa sponsorship & relocation assistance provided)

Salary: Competitive, DOE + performance-based bonus - 0% tax environment + Equity participation.

About Cobblestone Energy

Cobblestone Energy is an energy trading company, specializing in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading. Our advanced data analytics and extensive research drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.

At Cobblestone Energy, we value diversity and believe in hiring extraordinary talent from around the world. Our flat organizational structure fosters a culture of innovation, giving team members complete ownership of their work and ensuring that ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people, along with constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways.

Cobblestone Values
  • Lifelong learning with continuous reflection
  • Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas
  • The team is more important than the individual.
  • Being the best in any market we enter
  • Hiring and keeping only the most effective people
  • Others must benefit from our existence.

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced Intraday-Power Trader with expertise in any European market to join our trading team. Your main responsibility will be to assist in developing and implementing trading strategies. You'll receive support from our Analytics and Tech teams, as well as other areas of the business. Our goal is to become a leader in this field, and this role provides an excellent opportunity for a skilled and ambitious individual who desires more ownership in their work.

What We Offer In This Role
  • A full-time position on our Commercial team
  • Committed and remarkably talented colleagues
  • Highly competitive compensation dependent on your experience and what you bring to the role
  • An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career
  • An opportunity to work on new projects from scratch and make independent decisions.
  • Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term.

Responsibilities
  • Trade European power either within market or across borders and generate consistent, positive P&L
  • Conduct, evaluate, and act on market and fundamental analyses to drive profitable trading decisions
  • Train, and mentor traders with varying levels of experience

Requirements
  • Demonstrable contribution to business growth with consistent track record of returns, trading in at least one European power market for at least 1-3 years
  • Experience with trading strategy development and/or improvement
  • Experience in training/mentoring traders is preferred
  • Appreciation and understanding of available technologies for advancing our trading edge
  • Programming (e.g. Python, Java, C++) skills are desirable, but not mandatory
  • Resilience and determination to succeed
  • Independent thinking with a growth mindset
  • Very strong numerical, logical reasoning, and analytical skills.
  • Experience in Algorithmic/Automated Trading is desirable but not mandatory

Title: Software Developer – Business Intelligence
Skills: Business Intelligence (BI)|C#|Computer Science|Data Modeling|DataStage|Netezza|Qlik Sense|SAP BusinessObjects|SQL|SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)|
Job Description:
About the job

Description


Bazaraki.com is the biggest marketplace in Cyprus and the leader in Real Estate, Cars and General Classifieds. Every month more than 750,000 unique users view more than 45 million ad pages on Bazaraki.com. Our mission is to connect thousands of buyers with sellers around the country at our marketplace, at a secure and user-friendly platform that offers up-to-date, technologically and commercially services.

People are the key driving force of the business and we strive daily to build a powerful team with people sharing the same enthusiasm for eCommerce and Technology.


What We Are Looking For:


We are looking for a professional with years of experience in a similar role to ensure operational excellence across the organisation. An enthusiastic individual, with strong organisational and leadership skills to inspire, motivate and build functional teams. The ideal candidate must increase the organisation’s productivity, efficiency and profitability, as well as manage various teams. This is an excellent role for a person who has previous, proven experience in both customer experience, systems, operational processes and procedures, managing people successfully, is technologically savvy and is capable of building processes that contribute to change, and move the business forward.

This job requires relocation to Cyprus and you must be willing to relocate.


Responsibilities


  • Establish a collaborative working relationship and culture with all stakeholders across the organisation
  • Work with the Management team to build the organisation to be more agile, more responsive and successful in its main purpose (connect buyers with sellers)
  • Ensure the organisation’s operational function and success
  • Define the way, the means, the tools and the internal policies to implement a continuous improvement process for all of your responsible parts
  • Work closely with the Head of Commercial Operations to see how the market responds to the new services and products. Fail fast and learn fast
  • Use technology to accomplish Bazaraki’s mission (e.g. check and suggest technical changes and features, communicate with the development team for new features, etc.)
  • Review international trends of classifiers to check the latest international developments.
  • Discuss with the CEO to see what the strategic demands are.
  • Oversee the work of teams and employees that are under the Operations department, e.g. Customer Success, Moderation, Product Owner, Marketeer, etc.
  • Cooperate with the Financial Associates to have an oversight of all the financial matters and make things progress
  • Work with the Legal Associates for the open issues and follow up on progress on all legal matters
  • Cooperate closely with the CEO to drive the business forward


Requirements


  • University Degree preferably in Engineering or Information Technology or Marketing or Business Administration
  • 3+ years of previous proven professional experience in a similar role, preferably in a digital organisation
  • Technical background and/or experience in working with technology on digital platforms
  • Fair level of experience in strategic customer service and marketing
  • Experience in leading a company’s digital transformation involving major people, process and cultural changes
  • Excellent use of Greek and English language, both written and oral
  • Strategic but practical, hands-on mindset. You should be experienced in putting the strategy into practice
  • Outstanding organisational, multi-tasking and problem-solving skills
  • Excellent leadership and people management skills and experience in managing teams: expert in selecting people, in analysing needs and more importantly, building and empowering teams.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills to communicate effectively with all levels across the organisation
  • Capability to be an active representative of the company.
  • Team player who is able to build excellent working relationships
  • Proactive, goal-oriented and results-driven mentality
  • Be an advocate of the follow up mentality and applied creativity. Capable to translate even vague ideas of the team into robust operations
  • Be meticulous in your communications. You should be capable to communicate relatively complex subjects in a concise and clear way even to people who are not the experts in your field
  • Relocation to Cyprus is a mandatory requirement


Benefits


  • Very attractive and competitive remuneration package, subject to person's experience
  • Attractive bonus scheme
  • Relocation package for candidates willing to relocate to Cyprus
  • Work-related equipment (laptop, phone, etc.)
  • Company car
  • Private family medical insurance
  • High speed Internet connection
  • Permanent full-time position
  • 21 days paid annual leave


This is a permanent full-time position. It is a remote-based job. Extended working hours will be sometimes required according to business needs. We want to be able to attract the best and make sure you keep getting better.


Bazaraki.com is an equal opportunity employer. We want applicants of diverse backgrounds and hire without regard to color, gender, religion, national origin, citizenship, disability, age, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by law. If you feel you have the skills and experience then don't miss out on this exciting opportunity!

Title: INTRADAY POWER TRADER - Dubai, UAE
Skills: Automated Trading|Business Growth|Growth Strategies|Hedging|Independent Thinking|Logical Reasoning|Logics|PJM|Proprietary Trading|Reasoning Skills|
Job Description:
About the job

Overview


Η PepsiCo Hellas φιλοξενεί μερικά από τα πιο αγαπημένα προϊόντα τροφίμων και αναψυκτικών στον κόσμο όπως τα καθημερινά αγαπημένα σας Lay's, Quaker, Pepsi, Doritos και τους χυμούς Ήβη, για να αναφέρουμε μερικά. Έχουμε μια εκπληκτική φήμη για την ανάπτυξη και την κυκλοφορία προϊόντων που αγαπούν οι καταναλωτές μας. Είμαστε περήφανοι που είμαστε ένα εξαιρετικό μέρος για εργασία και κερδίσαμε πρόσφατα το βραβείο του Καλύτερου Εργοδότη για την Ελλάδα!


Σε μεγαλύτερη κλίμακα, η PepsiCo παράγει το μεγαλύτερο χαρτοφυλάκιο τροφίμων και αναψυκτικών δισεκατομμυρίων δολαρίων στον κόσμο, συμπεριλαμβανομένων 22 σειρών προϊόντων που κάθε μία παράγει περισσότερα από δισεκατομμύριο σε ετήσιες λιανικές πωλήσεις.


Responsibilities


Ζητάμε να καλύψουμε τη θέση του/της:MERCHANDISER


Για την πώληση των προϊόντων της στα Super Markets στο κέντρο της Αθήνας


ΠΕΡΙΓΡΑΦΗ ΘΕΣΗΣ:


  • Εφαρμογή Πλανογράμματος
  • Merchandising ραφιών και αποθήκης στα Super Market
  • Καθημερινή επικοινωνία με τους υπεύθυνους καταστήματος για την επίλυση θεμάτων που προκύπτουν


Qualifications


ΑΠΑΡΑΙΤΗΤΑ ΠΡΟΣΟΝΤΑ:


  • Απόφοιτος Ανώτερης Εκπαίδευσης (επιθυμητό)
  • Ανεπτυγμένη ικανότητα επικοινωνίας & διαπραγμάτευσης, εργατικότητα, συνέπεια, επαγγελματισμό
  • Δίπλωμα οδήγησης αυτοκινήτου περισσότερο απο 12 μήνες με ταχύτητες
  • Ολοκληρωμένες στρατιωτικές υποχρεώσεις

Title: Chief Operating Officer
Skills: Continuous Improvement|Customer Experience|Digital Transformation|Greek|Legal Matters|Operational Excellence|Operations|Problem Solving|Relocation|Team Management|
Job Description:
About the job

This position is responsible for supervising the security staff during ship gangway operations as well as deterring and/or effectively responding to shipboard incidents involving violations of the Guest Conduct Policy or other shipboard incidents as required by the Master.


Hiring Requirements:

The following outlines the minimum hiring, language and physical requirements to perform the job of Security Officer.

  • A Security Officer is expected to be a skilled manager with security experience in the following areas:
  1. Armed Forces
  2. Maritime Security
  3. Aviation Security
  4. Private Security Contracting
  5. Law Enforcement
  6. Hotel/Hospitality security
  • The Security Officer should possess excellent leadership ability, organizational and communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • A high level of English communication skills and experience/training in crowd management and customer relations, principally relying on non-aggressive, non-lethal forms of conflict resolution and crowd control
  • Ability to patrol in a none-routine manner, maintaining a high level of visibility and effectively dealing with escalating issues. When necessary, utilize defensive tactics and hand-to-hand skills to control or escort hostile persons. Recognize, preserve and properly document evidence.
  • Ability to diplomatically or, if necessary, physically deal with guests in tense, adversarial or confrontational situations.
  • A level of physical fitness which permits the use of physical control and restraint techniques if needed.
  • A well-groomed, physical appearance and demeanor that establishes a presence that serves as an incident-deterrent as well as a reassurance to guests.
  • Knowledge of relevant equipment, processes and strategies to promote effective security.
  • Ability to work effectively with other in a multicultural environment.
  • Managerial and organizational skills combined with literacy and knowledge of computers is very important for this position.

Title: Merchandiser(outsourced) Κέντρο Αθήνας
Job Description:
About the job

Main Purpose:As a Bulk Cargo Operator you will be responsible for the end-to-end execution of physical bulk shipments, identifying the safest and most efficient way to transport commodities from point of origin to point of destination. In this role, you will be involved in a broad range of activities that include but are not limited to logistics, contract execution, risk management, manage relationships with Suppliers, Clients and Contractors.Our Bulk Operators are passionate about logistics and supply chain, outstanding problem solvers who are able to think analytically even under pressure, dedicated and upbeat professionals able to adapt to constantly evolving conditions with their great organization skills and attention to detail.Knowledge Skills and Abilities, Key Responsibilities:
  • Bachelor or Master degree in Shipping / Supply Chain / Engineering / International Trade or other related subject.
  • 1–3 years of experience in the Bulk/logistics industry preferred. Specific knowledge related to Bulk Logistics (Multi-modal transport, blending, qualities, Incoterms, contractual terms and documentation requirements) are highly desirable.
  • Strong communication skills required as daily contact with international partners internal and external is required to conduct daily operations.
  • Fluent English is crucial, however proficiency in a second language will be welcomed
  • Solid analytical capabilities, including the ability to summarize complex logistical issues and detailed analysis with clarity and brevity in written or oral form.
  • Accurate and efficient working style with strong attention to detail
  • Ability to work well in fast-paced environment and maintain flexible working hours in the event of deadlines
  • Open personality with energy and drive
  • IT skills: Excel, Word, Outlook, with the ability to quickly learn and adapt to new computer systems and cross system interdependencies

Key Responsibilities

  • Written and verbal daily contacts with suppliers, receivers and service providers (Agents, Inspection Companies, Customs Brokers, Barge Lines, Rail Providers etc.)
  • Stockpile management and reconciliation
  • Coordinating shipments schedules with our customers
  • Preparation, verification, and handling of all shipping documents
  • Invoicing while observing and maintaining payments terms (Holding Certificates, CAD, Letters of Credit, Bank collections, Open Account etc)
  • Exposure Management
  • Arranging for inspection, sampling, assaying and umpires of cargoes as per contractual terms.
  • Organization and coordination of shipments through direct contact with various Trafigura offices
  • Upkeep and maintenance of Trafigura’s in house Trading and Risk Management system
  • Maintenance of multiple reports including Credit Exposure reports and Logistics reports.

Key Relationships and Department Overview:

The team has daily communication with:

  • Traders
  • Trade Finance Department,
  • Accounting Department
  • Treasury Department
  • Risk management Department
  • Suppliers, Clients, Contractors

Title: Security Officer
Skills: Communication|Conflict Resolution|Crowd Control|Defensive Tactics|English|Leadership|Maritime Security|Patrol|Physical Security|Tactics|
Job Description:
About the job

Job Overview

The Business Analyst ensures the liaison between the business side and the IT side of an IT project. The Business Analyst is knowledgeable in the business and in the applications of his area and bridges both. The Business Analyst is responsible for the analysis and all related documentation for his allocated IT projects. The Business Analyst defines how the scope of the IT project will be implemented within the existing applications, working closely with the software development team. His role includes establishing and maintaining strong regional relations for knowledge sharing and activities to achieve synergy with other BAs in the region, as well as with business units and regional/group teams.


How can You help us?

If you have expertise in the following areas, then apply!


Project Management


You...

  • ensure successful delivery of projects keeping timelines and costs within the project-endorsed targets
  • lead major development and deployment projects, ensuring documentation in place
  • define projects scope and timeline and provides a regular update on the project progress, and raise an alert in case of issues
  • leading project steering committee
  • ensure communication between project team members
  • update project documentations


Business requirement management


You...

  • bridge business and IT solutions manage business relations with stakeholders (including key users, lab managers, and business unit managers) on IT initiatives to ensure successful implementation
  • manage and track the status of requirements throughout the project lifecycle
  • prepare specifications and documentation
  • ensure quality and timely delivery of the solutions
  • provide regular updates on assigned requirements


Technical tasks

You...

  • define requirements, user stories, and test cases
  • prepare changes for Change Advisory Board
  • execute test plans on the delivered solution
  • participate in the release process by doing manual testing of the release packages on the User Acceptance environment
  • support master data migration during projects and system configuration
  • provide training to users on its application scope and post-go-live support of any new solution deployed
  • prepare training materials, technical and end-user documentation



Qualifications

Ideally, you would be educated in the fields of Chemistry, Microbiology, or Information Systems.


Experience

  • Proven experience with business and technical requirements analysis, elicitation, modeling, verification, and methodology development
  • Experience aligning IT with business initiatives and in project coordination
  • Experience with ERP-like deployment projects in a mid-size organization and specifying requirements for business applications


Additional Information

You should have outstanding analytical and creative problem-solving skills and should be a logical and efficient person with keen attention to detail. We are looking for a self-organized person, who is able to exercise independent judgment and take action on it.

If you have strong customer orientation, and excellent listening skills, furthermore your communications skills are excellent and you are a team player, then you are the expert whom we are looking for.

B2-level English and Greek are a must.


What can we do for you?

We offer a competitive compensation package with a hybrid work environment. You will be provided with a personal development plan and medical insurance. A stable workplace and calming work environment are guaranteed.

Are you ready to use your expertise to find new ways to grow your career? Apply now!


Company Description


Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company that provides a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries. The Group believes it is the world leader in food, environment, and pharmaceutical product testing and in agroscience CRO services. It is also one of the global independent market leaders in certain testing and laboratory services for genomics, discovery pharmacology, forensics, advanced material sciences, and supporting clinical studies. In addition, Eurofins is one of the key emerging players in specialty clinical diagnostic testing in Europe and the USA.

Group's key figures are approx. 4.56 billion Euros turnover, over 900 laboratories across 50 countries, and about 55,000 staff.

Title: Bulk Cargo Operator
Skills: Attention to Detail|Communication|Daily Operations|English|Incoterms|
Job Description:
About the job

At Janssen, we are dedicated to addressing and solving some of the most important unmet medical needs of our time in oncology, immunology, neuroscience, infectious diseases and vaccines, and cardiovascular and metabolic diseases. Driven by our commitment to patients, we bring innovative products, services and solutions to people throughout the world.


Tasks & Responsibilities


As a Business Insights Analyst, your main tasks and responsibilities include but are not limited to:


  • Use primary research methodologies and secondary data sources to develop and recommend business strategies that drive growth
  • Maintain an overview of the market research projects and budget within the Therapeutic Area (TA)
  • Interpret research results and assist in generating recommendations
  • Coordinate the Competitive Intelligence collection process within the TA
  • Analyze market intelligence on competitors, customers, strategy, and product offerings

Proficiencies And Skills

  • Capacity to work under strict timelines, combined with flexibility when emergency situations require this

Title: IT Business Analyst
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business|Business Analysis|Information Technology|
Job Description:
About the job

efood is a constantly evolving environment, and we strive to innovate and raise the bar on customer experience in the last mile and delivery industry! We focus on continuous innovation and introduction of pioneering new services and as our operations are expanding in new areas, our business is enriched with complexity and diversification.


We are currently in search for an experienced Senior Business Analyst who will work closely with our Executive Team and our Business Leaders across divisions. This role will focus on analyzing and interpreting data and information, and providing valuable insights and recommendations to our Top Management.


What you’ll do:

  • Collaborate with Senior Management across divisions to collect valuable insights and information

What you’ll need:

  • Broad knowledge of the many facets and diverse areas of business and market forces
  • 4+ years of experience as a Business Consultant, Business Analyst, or similar role in Consulting firms - Big 4 experience will be considered an asset
  • Excellent analytic skills and knowledge of reporting tools and business analysis models to effectively present actionable insights at various levels throughout the organization
  • Ability to synthesize data and problem-solving skills in order to provide solutions and recommendations that will increase profitability and efficiency
  • High operational and strategic acumen; logical and quick thinking, with the ability to take into consideration multiple dependencies
  • Strong interpersonal, negotiation and presentation skills
  • BSc in Business Administration, Engineering or similar; MSc/MA/MBA will be an advantage
  • Excellent verbal and written communication in Greek and English


What we offer:

  • Are you a cappuccino lover ☕? Do you desperately want a cookie? Our inhouse cafeteria got you covered!
  • If you want to stay in shape 🏋️ , our in-house gym awaits you fully equipped!


Life @efood

At efood, no day is the same as the one before!


efooders know that working and having a good time aren't the opposite and that’s why every day at efood is a new adventure!


We always aim higher and we thrive in finding solutions to push our limits further! We care about our customers, our employees, our society.

We seize every opportunity to celebrate achievements and milestones, but we also celebrate small things (like Fridays!)


Every efooder is part of a fast-growing multinational company, with endless opportunities for professional growth and acquisition of new skills! We have an established, yet super creative and fun working environment, with talented and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace! [In 2021, we were honored with a 3rd place award from the Great Place to Work® Institute]


Hungry enough to join us?

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business Administration|Business Analysis|Consulting|Interpreting Data|Presentation Skills|Problem Solving|Reporting & Analysis|Strategy|
Job Description:
About the job

At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.


The opportunity


We are currently seeking highly motivated people for our Consulting practice, which is a leading provider of services to financial industry and large corporate clients of all industries. Being part of our Data & Analytics Center of Excellence, you will work with multi-disciplinary teams across the entire EMEIA region to support global clients.


Your Key Responsibilities


You will identify appropriate modeling techniques to answer the most critical business questions and use your analysis to infer well substantiated business insights in support of your clients’ decision making.


You will also resort to various data management and visualization techniques to provide insight into the data. Your portfolio of skills covers a wide range of advanced statistical and machine learning techniques for classification, prediction, recommendation, clustering, forecasting, as well as data management, data visualization, and optimization, applied in a commercial context. You will contribute to presentations of modeling results and project proposals.


Skills And Attributes For Success


  • Strong communication, presentation, client service and technical writing skills in English for both technical and business audiences.
  • Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
  • Ability to work under tight timelines for multiple project deliveries.
  • Ability/flexibility to travel and work abroad for international projects.


To qualify for the role you must have
  • Excellent academic background, including at a minimum a bachelor or a master degree in data science, Business Analytics, Statistics, Mathematics, Econometrics, Engineering, Operational Research, Computer Science, or other related field with strong quantitative focus.
  • 2-7 years of working or related research experience (evidenced by PhD and/or relevant publications, awards, or completed project credentials) with preferably at least 2 years in a commercial/industrial context and particular focus on the following:
    • Data modeling and Management, integration and manipulation of large disparate datasets (i.e. structured, semi-structured or unstructured)
    • Predictive modeling and optimization
    • Strong skills in databases, statistical packages for data manipulation and in development of predictive and prescriptive models (i.e. R, Python, SAS, SPSS, SQL).
    • Experience in designing, building, testing and validating models using a large number of statistical and other quantitative techniques.


Ideally, you’ll also have


  • Software development experiences in Java and/or C/C++ as well as advanced databases.
  • Experience with Big Data/In Memory technologies, such as Hadoop (Hortonworks, Cloudera etc.), SAP HANA, IBM BigInsights, Oracle Exalytics.
  • Experience with scalable big data based advanced analytics software, such as Apache Mahout or 0xdata H2O.
  • Experience in Advanced Data Visualization tools, such as Tableau, Spotfire, Qlikview and others for integration between disparate data sources, design and implementation of KPIs and generation of automatic and scalable visualizations that will facilitate extraction of business insights.


What We Look For


What’s most important is that you’re dedicated to working with your colleagues as part of a high-performing team. You’ll need to demonstrate enthusiasm, high motivation and passion to develop fast in a multinational working environment. You’ll need to thrive in picking up new skills and talents as you go, so natural curiosity, a lot of questions and the confidence to speak up when you see something that could be improved are essential. If you’ve got the right combination of technical knowledge and communication skills, this role is for you.


What We Offer


We offer a competitive compensation package where you’ll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. Plus, we offer:


  • Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
  • Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
  • Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
  • Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.


If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.


The Exceptional EY Experience. It’s Yours To Build.


EY | Building a better working world


EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.


Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.


Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

The Lending Products Digital Channels Specialist will be placed in the Cards Division, which is responsible for the promotion and support of card payment products across all available channels. The jobholder will act as a liaison between the cards/loans Units Product Managers, Segments and the Digital and IT Units in order to support the optimum utilization of digital channels as well as to promote and commercialize the value proposition of the Bank’s cards and loans products.


The ideal candidate should be familiar with the development and promotion of payment and lending products, while having a thorough understanding of the Bank’s relevant operations and of the mechanics of digital channels. He/She should be methodical with strong analytical and communication skills and able to deliver within agreed deadlines.


What you will be doing

  • Provide product expertise and participate in the coordination of digital sales campaigns for card/loans products.

What you need to have

  • A postgraduate degree in any of the abovementioned fields will be considered an asset.
  • Α minimum of three (3) years of experience in both payment cards/loans value propositions and digital channels.
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.

  • Presentation skills and ability to promote products effectively.

What we offer

  • The opportunity to challenge your thinking through your participation in complex tasks and transformation projects.
  • Being part of a large organization with a leading role in the Greek economy and a strong presence in the community.
  • A competitive salary and benefits.


Alpha Bank offers a remote interview process and a work-from-home scheme.


All applications will be acknowledged and treated in utmost confidence.

About the job

Spanos Luxury Cars, is Official Jaguar Land Rover Retailer in Greece. With a strong presence in the field of automotive industry, the company is constantly evolving in search of innovation and perfection of its services.

Philosophy & Vision

• Respect to our customers and our employees

• Quality in every aspect of our business activities

• Responsibility is the road map that ensures our credibility

• Honesty is the cornerstone of our behavior

Company’s Goals

Responsibilities of the role:

- Coordinating with lenders and banks to secure financing for customers

- Maintaining customer files and records

- Managing inventory and tracking vehicle sales

- Conducting vehicle title transfers and registrations

- Good knowledge of Microsoft Office (word, excel)

All applications will be treated with discretion and absolute confidentiality.

Spanos Luxury Cars is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against employees or applicants for employment on the basis of a person's race, color, religion, sex, nationality, ancestry, age, marital status, appearance or any other status protected by applicable law.

About the job

Job Description


Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?


Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.


You take pride in your work and will drive toward a culture of zero incidents and an optimum environmental footprint. HSE programs will be well implemented and meet the relevant standards and regulations in the Plant. That means you will ensure that facilities provided are well maintained, regulation/procedure are in place and implemented, hazards/aspects assessments are conducted, the accident both caused by unsafe acts and conditions are reduced and energy and waste are driven down.


How You Will Contribute


You will:


  • Be responsible for coordinating the fleet of commercial organization through leasing companies
  • Follow policies, applicable laws, and regulations to provide a compliant, comprehensive and user focused service for the Greek Organization
  • Maintain records of vehicles, location and drivers
  • Review, code, and facilitate payment of monthly vehicle invoices
  • Forecast vehicle requirements and place orders as required in compliance with the vehicle policy
  • Renew vehicle insurance cards and coordinate renewal of specific vehicles and fleet
  • Be responsible for coordinating and overseeing implementation of all Health & Safety programs and processes
  • Follow up on non-conformances and develops the systems to resolve them based on root cause analysis
  • Maintain an up-to-date incident reporting system, assist with investigating incidents in conjunction with the HSE Pillar team/safety committee and drive the completion of corrective actions to eliminate root causes/reoccurrence


What You Will Bring


A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career. You will bring experience and knowledge in:


  • Experience in Car fleet Coordination
  • Experience in Environmental Health and Safety will be considered a plus
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills and ability to work with individuals at all levels
  • English knowledge and technology savvy are a must


The responsibilities of this position are performed within the framework of a regional business model that is defined and managed by Mondelēz Europe GmbH, Switzerland .


No Relocation support available


Business Unit Summary


At Mondelez Europe, we are proud, not only of the iconic brands we make, but also of the people who make them. Our delicious products are created in 52 plants across Europe by more than 28,000 passionate people. We are the top maker of chocolate and biscuits and a leading maker of gum and candy. We make sure our powerful global brands and local jewels like Cadbury, Milka and Alpen Gold chocolates, Oreo, belVita, LU and Tuc biscuits, and Stimorol and Dirol gums get safely into our customers hands—and mouths. Great people and great brands. That’s who we are. Join us on our journey to continue leading the future of snacking around the world by offering the right snack, for the right moment, made the right way.


Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Regular

Job Description:
About the job

Who we are

A coaching and learning ecosystem for talented and passionate tech professionals where you can find your next career goal in a diverse and multidisciplinary environment. At Agile Actors, you will experience continuous growth and development through coaching, learning and practice! An innovative self-paced personal development and rewarding model will support your advancement and along with the necessary tools, appropriate learning material, and real projects from organisations that are leaders of the industry (both domestic and international), such as RedHat, Blueground, GFK, Austrian Post, etc, cultivate a continuous growth mindset!

Be part of both the customer's and the Agile Actor's team, providing high-quality deliverables for the former and contributing to the cultivation of an inclusive and developmental culture in the latter!

Who we are looking for


We are looking for passionate, multi-talented Data Engineers across levels ( i.e. Juniors, Mids and Seniors). The successful candidates will be part of a highly motivated blended team that provides Data Management and Business Intelligence services, including Data Warehousing, Data Marts, Database Integration Applications, Streaming Data Ingestion, and Streaming Analytics on Microsoft Azure Cloud.



Requirements

  • At least 1 year of related working experience for the junior level
  • Good knowledge of OLTP, Data Warehouse relational and Multi-Dimensional databases design and implementation ( Normal Forms, Star Schemas), ideally working experience on Azure Synapse or Azure SQL DW
  • Experience with T-SQL programming (Store procedures, functions, joins, analytics functions, CTEs )
  • Understanding of Database optimization techniques (indexes, partitioning )
  • Understanding ETL process design and experience with an ETL tool used in the industry (eg SSIS, Azure Data Factory, Databricks)
  • Some experience with Apache Spark
  • Understanding of Azure Data Lake Storage
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent subject
  • Understanding of fundamental computer science knowledge (data structures, algorithms etc)
  • Strong problem-solving skills and analytical thinking along with a desire to keep learning, growing & teaching


Benefits




Why join us?

Join us if you enjoy being part of a people-centered culture that empowers you to work on the most important product; yourself! Continuously grow with the support of tech experts and maintain a matching skill set to market needs.




  • Personal Development Plan crafted with your dedicated coach
  • 360° continuous feedback model; drive your developmental pace
  • Unlimited personal training/learning budget to cover all your career developmental needs
  • Chapters (internal communities)-share knowledge, create training material, help others grow and shape our technological future
  • Vast roster of customers/accounts, providing more opportunities for growth and development within the AA ecosystem
  • Onboarding Buddy-Continuous support from day 1! A dedicated buddy to help you navigate through the first few weeks
  • Tailored remuneration package according to your level and expertise
  • Private Health Care insurance for physical wellbeing
  • Professional helpline for our professionals and their families for mental wellbeing
  • Flexible working conditions (fully remote work according to assigned account)

Desired Skills and Experience

  • Azure
  • DataLake
  • Databricks
  • SQL
  • SQL Server
  • SSAS
  • SSIS
  • SSRS
  • Spark
  • Synapse

Title: HSE & Fleet Management Coordinator
Skills: Corrective Actions|Environment, Health, and Safety (EHS)|Health and Safety Executive (HSE)|Incident Reporting|Occupational Health|Quality, Health, Safety, and Environment (QHSE)|Root Cause|Safety Committee|Safety Programs|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Job description

VODA.ai is an American company with its headquarters in Boston, USA. This is a remote working position anywhere in Greece, full-time (40 hours per week).


Role Overview:

VODA.ai is seeking an experienced Full-stack Web developer to join us in our mission to save water using Artificial Intelligence technologies. You will be at the forefront of creating best-in-class web-based tools used by water utilities worldwide.

We are looking for a talented and passionate individual who is not afraid to challenge themselves by working on new initiatives and new technologies. This is a highly entrepreneurial role, working alongside the co-founders and other key founding members.


Who we are:

VODA.ai uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) techniques to predict the probability of city water pipes bursting. The models that are being developed are useful for regional governments and city planners as well as utility companies (there are 240,000 water main breaks per year) and society at large (to conserve water from such breaks).


Who you are:

A software engineer with experience in developing and maintaining web applications (APIs, Web servers, etc) end-to-end. You have a passion for building applications and maintaining IT infrastructure that delivers great customer experience and enjoy writing code.

You are comfortable working in a startup environment where you will be collaborating closely with other members of a software product team. You want your role to have a big impact and a strong voice within a fast-paced and growing company.


Requirements:

  • Hands-on experience with front-end and back-end Web technologies
  • BSc degree in Computer Science or related field
  • Solid knowledge of JavaScript (or Typescript) and at least another high-level programming language (e.g. Golang, Python, Java)
  • Comfortable with integrating 3rd party libraries and backend REST API's
  • Experience with modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks (Expressjs, React, Node, Redux etc)
  • Strong experience with relational databases (e.g. PostgreSQL) and/or non-relational databases (MongoDB)
  • Experience with git
  • Knowledge of web application security practices and data privacy
  • Basic unix knowledge
  • Familiarity with cloud infrastructure technologies (AWS, Serverless etc)
  • Ability to troubleshoot and debug web applications
  • Fluent in written and spoken English


Nice to have:

  • Knowledge of Golang
  • Experience with automation testing frameworks (e.g. Cypress)
  • Advanced Unix knowledge, bash scripting
  • Comfortable with Docker and containers


What’s in it for you:

  • Competitive salary, depending on experience
  • Flexible working hours, fully remote
  • Working in small, autonomous teams of passionate people, in a friendly and collaborative environment
  • Unlimited time-off

About the job

( 7518 )

At One&Only, we exist to create joy for our guests through anticipation, creativity, precision, empathy and warmth. We tailor every aspect of our guests’ stay to bring their dreams and desires to life. With an atmosphere that’s chic but wonderfully unstuffy™, and a team who are meticulous but warm, we seek to exceed our guests’ expectations at every possible turn.

Amidst fragrant pines and glistening peaks, One&Only Moonlight Basin is a glamorous return to simplicity. Fill days cascading down cool waters, unearthing the magic of Yellowstone National park, skiing on world renowned slopes and retreating to floating evergreen spaces. With abundant knowledge and generosity, we anticipate our guest’s every need and surpass expectations. Whether we are designing the perfect family day out or arranging a romantic private dinner, we approach everything with imagination to spark a sense of playfulness, discovery and adventure. This is not simply our job, it’s our passion.

About The Role

Under the general supervision of the Director, Engineering, deals with the management of all administrative works of the Technical / Engineering Department.

Key Duties and Responsibilities
  • Prepares reports as required.
  • Does all administration works.
  • Is responsible for proper filing system, especially for the Director, Engineering.
  • Constantly suggest new creative ideas for constant improvement of the Engineering Department.
  • Follows up on all the correspondences for the Director, Engineering.
  • Is willing to perform any other tasks/functions in Engineering Department and works as a team with other colleagues.
  • Performs any additional duties and/or special projects, as may be requested by the Director, Engineering.
  • To be fully aware about all health and safety, fire and emergency procedures
  • Ensures all activities are carried out honestly, ethically and within the parameters of the Greek Law.
Skills, Experience & Educational Requirements
  • Bachelor’s Degree
  • Fluent in written and spoken English, other languages is a distinctive advantage
  • 2 year experience in a similar capacity
  • Computer literate (Microsoft office, Micros)
  • To be able work well under pressure
  • Strong organization skills
  • Should be positive and flexible to different duties.
  • Knowledge of Fusion & Opera is an advantage
Our brand is expanding faster than ever before. We are investing in the growth of our company, and that means we are committed to investing in you. Join a team that is open-hearted, intuitive, generous, and spontaneous in spirit. We believe in making our guests happy beyond anything they have ever imagined. We wow them at every turn and create memories that will last a lifetime. You will be at the heart of this vision, to constantly innovate to deliver Amazing Experiences and Everlasting Memories.
