Title: Coordinator, Facilities, One&Only Aesthesis, Athens
Skills: Computer Literacy|Correspondences|Customer Satisfaction|Deals|Emergency Procedures|Facilities Operations|Greek|Office Administration|Organization Skills|Problem Solving|
Job Description:
About the job

ForestView, a TDG (ThinkDigital Group) Company, is a multi-awarded Marketing & Commerce Agency, helping brands and retailers achieve commercial uplift by creating unique digital experiences across the entire consumer journey through the use of creativity, technology and data.

In our day-to-day we develop marketing strategies, design data-driven consumer journeys, produce digital content, design and execute creative campaigns across multiple media, enable commerce across e-shops, e-retailers and Amazon and optimize the end-to-end consumer experience by collecting and analyzing data.


Wherever you’re based, however you feel at your most productive you will join a modern hybrid workplace environment with the added excitement of collaborating with a multinational, talented and dynamic team. We believe that the future of work is defined by flexibility, location independence and should be built around the new needs of our clients, our teams and our people.


The Impact

As a Social Media Content Creator, you will play a crucial role in developing creative ideas and crafting high-quality copy for various types of content, such as social media posts, blog posts, online articles, and ad campaigns.

Working closely with our Client Partnership team and reporting to the Executive Creative Director, you will ensure that all content is delivered on time and meets the client's expectations. Your ability to produce engaging content that resonates with our audience will be key to the success of our campaigns.

As a member of our dynamic and innovative team, you will have the opportunity to showcase your creativity and writing skills while collaborating with a team of passionate professionals. You will also have access to cutting-edge tools and resources to help you stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving world of social media.


The successful candidate will be based in the TDG Headquarters in Athens.


Key Responsibilities

  • Manage social media pages and channels, including devising social media calendars.
  • Write and create various types of content such as social media posts, blog posts, and online articles, as well as contribute original ideas and concepts for ad campaigns.
  • Be an active part of our creative team, contribute to brainstorming, and propose creative ideas for ad campaigns.
  • Collaborate with internal teams as well as client teams when necessary.
  • Recognize trends, tribes, and influencers in the communities and the industry.
  • Stay up-to-date on new formats and trends on all the popular social media platforms.
  • Meet deadlines and adhere to them.
  • Understand social media platforms, social metrics, social reports and analytics, community management, and broader digital insights.
  • Possess crisis prevention and management skills in social media.


We’re looking for someone who

  • Has 3+ years of experience in social media management.
  • Is a collaborative team player with an open-minded character.
  • Is relentlessly curious about ideas, people, technology, brands, and design.
  • Demonstrates excellent writing skills with a strong command of the English language and grammar.
  • Is highly creative, with a passion for conceptualizing, communicating, and evaluating excellent creative concepts.
  • Has a strategic-minded thinker being able to see the forest for the tree.
  • Has a strong editorial eye and pays attention to detail.
  • Can multitask and work on several projects simultaneously.
  • Has excellent presentation skills in both Greek and English.
  • Works well under pressure and can meet tight deadlines.
  • Has experience in an agency environment, which would be a plus.



Benefits and Perks

ForestView is part of TDG, recognized as a Best Workplaces™ for 2022. We are on a mission to boldly lead our people to where no one has gone before. Our people enjoy benefits that make them able to develop their careers and professional skills. We challenge ourselves to work with the best and most talented professionals and we want to offer a great place to work and thrive. We are offering:

  • A competitive salary based on experience and skills.
  • A budgeted training and professional development plan.
  • A modern workplace environment, and the excitement of working closely with a successful, highly motivated, dynamic, and talented team.
  • Heart Long Weekends! A paid-time-off throughout the year to enjoy life outside of work.
  • Access to TDG’s Library for professional development.


ForestView offers a hybrid working model. Team members all over the EMEA region currently can meet in person every other week.

Title: 3rd Shift Feed Mill Supervisor
Skills: Arithmetic|Business English|Cash Handling|English|Hygiene|Industrial Maintenance|Punctuation|Security Protocols|Spelling|Supervisory Skills|
Job Description:
About the job

At Alpha Bank, we are shaping the future of banking in Greece.


Through our large-scale Transformation Program, we are changing the way we operate, the way we deliver results and the way we service our Customers.


  • We understand our Customers’ needs and design experiences around them.
  • We work in partnership and invite diversity of skills and perspectives.
  • We are forward-thinking and drive continuous improvement.
  • We make things happen; we execute quickly and focus on what is essential.


If you are a change enthusiast who sets ambitious goals and works with a sense of purpose, we want to get to know you!


Join our team and #be_part_of_tomorrow


The Lending Products Digital Channels Specialist will be placed in the Cards Division, which is responsible for the promotion and support of card payment products across all available channels. The jobholder will act as a liaison between the cards/loans Units Product Managers, Segments and the Digital and IT Units in order to support the optimum utilization of digital channels as well as to promote and commercialize the value proposition of the Bank’s cards and loans products.


The ideal candidate should be familiar with the development and promotion of payment and lending products, while having a thorough understanding of the Bank’s relevant operations and of the mechanics of digital channels. He/She should be methodical with strong analytical and communication skills and able to deliver within agreed deadlines.


What you will be doing


  • Liaise with cards/loans product Heads, Segments, Digital and IT teams, integrating the product value proposition into the digital sales roadmap.
  • Provide product expertise and participate in the coordination of digital sales campaigns for card/loans products.
  • Act as a point of reference to mobilize resources for developing digital services for the cards/loans products.
  • Liaise with the competent divisions for ongoing enhancements and link digital assets to the overall cards/loans product value proposition (e.g. functionality, pricing, targeting).


What you need to have



  • A Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Economics, Marketing or in any other related discipline.
  • A postgraduate degree in any of the abovementioned fields will be considered an asset.
  • Α minimum of three (3) years of experience in both payment cards/loans value propositions and digital channels.
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.
  • Creative thinking with emphasis on the search for new ideas and solutions for the best Customer Experience.
  • Presentation skills and ability to promote products effectively.
  • Excellent use of the Windows environment and knowledge of MS Office applications (Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint).
  • Critical thinking and organizational skills.
  • Teamwork skills and dedication to achieving the desired result.


What we offer


It’s all about our people. At Alpha Bank, you will enjoy:


  • A friendly and collaborative work environment that supports taking initiative and action.
  • A culture that centers around learning and continuous development and encourages everyone to bring their best self to work.
  • The opportunity to challenge your thinking through your participation in complex tasks and transformation projects.
  • Being part of a large organization with a leading role in the Greek economy and a strong presence in the community.
  • A competitive salary and benefits.


Alpha Bank offers a remote interview process and a work-from-home scheme.


All applications will be acknowledged and treated in utmost confidence.

Title: Social Media Content Creator
Job Description:
About the job

We are a cloud based fully integrated ERP system for the shipping industry. Our goal is to allow shipping companies to improve productivity, efficiency and safety levels, while reducing costs.


Qualification

5+ years of experience in product-related roles, building customer facing B2B SaaS products.

Proven experience overseeing all elements of the product development life cycle

Ability to translate complex business requirements into detailed technical specification documents and flow-charts


Requirements

Excellent communication and public speaking skills; ability to present complex ideas to internal & external stakeholders and to influence and inspire people

Degree in CS, IT, Finance, Business management or Marine Engineering

Drive the execution of all product lifecycle processes for our products, including product research, market research, competitive analysis, planning, positioning, roadmap development, requirements development, and product launch

Translate product strategy into detailed requirements for prototype construction and final product development by engineering teams.

Create product strategy documents that describe business cases, high-level use cases, technical requirements, and other relevant artifacts.

Collaborate closely with software engineering, product marketing, and sales teams on the development, QA, and release of products and balance of resources to ensure success for the entire organization.

Become an expert of your designated modules and serve as a knowledge source, including best practices and regulatory requirements.

Establish a shared vision by building alignment on priorities leading to product execution.

Leverage user research, usability studies, market research, experiments and data analysis and translate them into requirements that solve real problems for a large set of users.

Ensure that product decisions are based on strong logical, rigor and in-depth analysis, and value data over opinions.

Expected to develop a deep understanding of our users: their problems, and their needs.

Title: Lending Products Digital Channels Specialist
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business Administration|Communication|English|Loans|Microsoft Excel|Microsoft Office|Presentation Skills|Teamwork|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

Do you have an eye for niche talent?


Are you a natural communicator and love to build relationships with people in the tech industry?


Sounds like you? Let's talk!


As talent experts we share our passion in seeking and spotting top talents, and we are currently in search of a new teammate who will join us in our journey to expand efood's team by identifying and engaging top tech talent!


Our Tech & Product teams bring efood's app to life! As a Tech Talent Acquisition Specialist, you are charged with the task to spot and hire top tech talent who can bring a mindset of continuous improvement.


You will own and drive the full life-cycle recruitment process, from initial role qualification through to hiring the best tech talent on the market, whilst ensuring efood's outstanding candidate experience. You will build strong relationships both with candidates and internal stakeholders (i.e. Hiring Managers, HRBP) and act as an ambassador for efood. In addition, you will be responsible to develop a talent network of candidates and share your industry knowledge with our business leaders by providing feedback on market conditions and best practices. As we are constantly evolving, you will also have the chance to participate in various recruitment projects whenever needed.


What You'll Need


To thrive in this role, you ideally have successfully helped scale a team as a full-cycle technical recruiter in a fast-paced environment. You have proven your ability to attract passive candidates and build diverse pipelines; you have a passion for building teams and delivering exceptional candidate experience. You also have a combination of the following:


  • Passion about building and championing inclusive and equitable hiring practices; you have experience coaching interviewers and hiring managers about best practices
  • 2+ years of previous work experience as Technical Recruiter, and/or Sourcer
  • BSc Degree in Business Administration or relevant field
  • Experience and proficiency using applicant tracking systems, Google Suite, Slack, LinkedIn or other current tech tools
  • Great communication skills (Greek & English) with experience in interfacing with all levels of an organization, and building influential relationships with candidates
  • "Make it happen approach" by finding creative solutions, trying new things and recovering quickly from difficulties
  • Eagerness to learn - you are constantly looking for opportunities to improve your craft and are receptive to feedback
  • Strong follow-up and follow-through skills - you take ownership and you strive to deliver results with high quality
  • Proven track record juggling and prioritizing multiple time-sensitive tasks
  • Focus on data - you keep track of hiring goals and KPIs by providing accurate, clear, and regularly cadenced reporting on the technical recruiting pipeline


What We Offer


  • If you are happy, we are happy! That's why we offer an attractive remuneration package for what you bring in!
  • We share a passion for food, so you will certainly appreciate the ticket restaurant card 💳 to spend in restaurants and/or food supplies. We are efooders after all!
  • We take care of you with Private Medical & Life Insurance from day #1 to keep you healthy and happy!
  • We want you to grow with us 🚀 ! And to help you keep improving, we provide you access to our online training platform where you can study 📖 topics for your personal and professional growth!
  • Are you a cappuccino lover ☕? Do you desperately want a cookie? Our cafeteria got you covered!
  • If you want to stay in shape 🏋️ , our in-house gym awaits you fully equipped!


Life @efood:


At efood, no day is the same as the day before!


efooders know that working and having a good time aren't the opposite and that's why every day at efood is a new adventure!


We always aim higher and we thrive in finding solutions to push our limits further! We care about our customers, our employees, and our society.


We seize every opportunity to celebrate achievements and milestones, but we also celebrate small things (like Fridays!)


Every efooder is part of a fast-growing multinational company, with endless opportunities for professional growth and acquisition of new skills! We have an established, yet super creative and fun working environment, with talented and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace! [In 2021, we were honored with a 3rd place award from the Great Place to Work® Institute]


Hungry enough to join us?

Title: Senior Product Manager
Skills: Business Case Preparation|Business Management|Business Requirements|Competitive Analysis|Product Development|Product Management|Software as a Service (SaaS)|Usability|Use Cases|User Research|
Job Description:
About the job

Tenders Semi-Senior

About Us

V Group of Companies is a highly reputable and successful Organization that operates in the

fields of Port Reception Facilities, Waste Management, Renewable Energy, Technology and

Financial Investments. The Group has established a strong presence and has consistently

demonstrated impressive growth over the years while strictly adhering to the highest

standards of ethics and sustainability.

The role

V Group of companies is looking for a Tender Semi Senior. This executive will be responsible for

leading the tendering process for the company, managing the end-to-end process from

identification of new tender opportunities through to contract negotiations and post-tender

debriefs.

He/she will work closely with cross-functional teams including sales, legal, technical, and

finance to ensure that all tenders are submitted on time and meet client requirements. The

successful candidate will have a proven track record in managing large-scale, complex tenders

and will be able to work collaboratively across the organization to deliver results.

In addition, he/she will have experience of – at least – 5 years in local online tender GR

platforms (ESIDIS). Extra knowledge of EU tender platforms is an asset.

Key Responsibilities

•Identify new tender opportunities

•Analyze tender documents and develop a deep understanding of client requirements and evaluation criteria

•Manage the tender submission process, ensuring all documents are completed accurately and on time

•Conduct post-tender debriefs to capture feedback and drive continuous improvement in the tendering process

•Develop and maintain a database of all tenders submitted and won, and provide regular reports on tender performance to the senior management team

Requirements

•5+ years of experience in managing large-scale, complex tenders in a B2B environment

•Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to write compelling proposals and negotiate effectively with clients

•Knowledge of relevant regulations and legislation governing tendering processes

•Strong analytical skills and attention to detail

•Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office, particularly Excel and PowerPoint

•Excellent English Language Skills (writing , speaking)

Benefits

•Private Medical Insurance

•Remuneration package based on qualifications and related experience

•Continuous training

Overall

The successful candidate will be highly motivated, results-driven, and able to work under pressure. They will be an excellent communicator and team player, with the ability to build strong relationships with clients and internal stakeholders. They will also have a passion for continuous improvement and driving excellence in the tendering process.

Please be advised that we will only contact for an interview the candidates who meet the requirements of the job. All applications are considered strictly confidential.

Title: Tech Talent Acquisition Specialist
Skills: Build Strong Relationships|Communication|Creative Problem Solving|Greek|Hiring Practices|Human Resources (HR)|Recruiting|Technical Recruiting|Tracking Systems|Workload Prioritization|
Job Description:
About the job

About The Yacht


34m private motor yacht, Eu flag, 5 crew, based in Greece.


The project


We are looking for a Stewardess for a 34m private motor yacht currently in Greece for 2 month in July and August.


This is a family style boat, so the family is looking for a nice and reliable lady who will take care of the morning service and breakfast preparation, housekeeping and laundry. They are happy to give a chance for a beginner stewardess who is happy to engage herself for these 2 months.


The boat will stay in the area and mostly navigate around Greek Islands.


Desired profile


  • English speaking, with some experience in service or housekeeping


Salary: around 2500 - 3000 euros/month, negotiable depending on profile

Title: Tenders Semi-Senior
Job Description:
About the job

ICAP CRIF (previously ICAP S.A. group of companies), with 59 years of successful presence in Greece, Romania, Bulgaria and Cyprus, is the market leader in Credit Risk & Business Information Solutions in Southeastern Europe.


As of December 23rd, 2021, ICAP CRIF is a wholly owned company of CRIF. It is an important regional hub within CRIF Group and is organized and operates as a single entity under one common Management Team.


Ιt provides innovative solutions to a wide range of business challenges, which are grouped into 5 categories: Business Information & Credit Risk Solutions, Ratings & Analytics Services, Marketing & Sales Solutions, Technology Solutions & Advanced Analytics and Consulting Services.


ICAP CRIF S.A., is the only company in Greece that has been recognized as an External Credit Assessment Institution (ECAI) by the Bank of Greece, as well as, certified as a Credit Rating Agency (CRA), by the European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA).


As part of the further development of the ICAP CRIF Local Competence Center (LCC3), we are looking for a Consultant to join the Business Consulting & Analytics business unit. The Consultant will be responsible for providing consulting services to small, medium and large enterprises, as well as developing and supporting business proposals based on market needs.


Responsibilities:

  • Developing new sales opportunities expanding the existing portfolio.
  • Generating detailed business and marketing plans.
  • Conducting studies on functional and operational redesign.
  • Attracting and integrating small and medium sized businesses in funding programs.
  • Participating in market research and analysis.
  • Analyzing and elaborating data for related studies.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Business Administration, Engineering or Marketing.
  • Master’s Degree or related certifications will be considered an asset.
  • 2 years of proven working experience in a related field
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Critical and analytical thinking
  • Teamwork and strong interpersonal skills
  • Innovation, business acumen and persistence
  • Fluency in English.
  • Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).


The Company offers:

  • Competitive remuneration package including annual performance bonus
  • Private insurance scheme
  • Flexibility to work from home some days per week
  • A modern, dynamic and innovation-driven working environment
  • Opportunities to cooperate and exchange ideas with all countries of the CRIF world
  • Continuous personal development opportunities with personalized in class and on the job trainings
  • Great career prospects in a fast-growing multi-national organization


All information received will be treated with strict confidentiality.

About the job

Η ΤΕΡΝΑ ΑΕ, εταιρεία του Ομίλου ΓΕΚ ΤΕΡΝΑ, αναζητά:

Γραμματέα Τεχνικής Διεύθυνσης

Αρμοδιότητες:
  • Παρέχει υποστήριξη και διασφαλίζει την έγκαιρη διεκπεραίωση των εργασιών της Τεχνικής Διεύθυνσης
  • Διαχειρίζεται τις εισερχόμενες κλήσεις και μηνύματα, υπενθυμίσεις, επιβεβαίωση ανταπόκρισης κ.λπ.
  • Οργανώνει συναντήσεις και τηλεδιασκέψεις
  • Συνεργάζεται και επικοινωνεί με άλλες Δ/νσεις, τμήματα, εργοτάξια της εταιρείας και με εξωτερικούς φορείς για την οργάνωση των εργασιών
  • Επικοινωνεί με δημόσιες υπηρεσίες και φορείς και διεκπεραιώνει και τις απαιτούμενες εξωτερικές εργασίες σε αυτές
  • Προετοιμάζει και συντάσσει αναφορές, διαχειρίζεται τα εταιρικά έγγραφα, τη συλλογή των υπογραφών / εσωτερικών εγκρίσεων σύμφωνα με τα Πρότυπα και τις διαδικασίες της εταιρείας
  • Συλλέγει τα Τιμολόγια και τα Δελτία αποστολής και βρίσκεται σε άμεση επικοινωνία & συνεννόηση με το λογιστήριο
  • Παραλαμβάνει, αποστέλλει και τηρεί την εισερχόμενη – εξερχόμενη αλληλογραφία
  • Ταξινομεί και αρχειοθετεί εισερχόμενα και εξερχόμενα έγγραφα (φυσικό & ηλεκτρονικό αρχείο)

Απαιτούμενα Προσόντα:
  • Πτυχίο ΙΕΚ / ΤΕΙ / ΑΕΙ σχολών Διοίκησης Επιχειρήσεων, Λογιστικής, Πληροφορικής, Τεχνολόγων Μηχανικών ή αντίστοιχων ειδικοτήτων
  • 3 έτη κατ’ ελάχιστο εμπειρία
  • Επιθυμητή η εμπειρία σε θέση γραμματειακής υποστήριξης Τεχνικής Δ/νσης, Δ/ντή Έργου, Εργοταξίου κ.λπ.
  • Πολύ καλή γνώση της Αγγλικής Γλώσσας (προφορικά και γραπτά)
  • Πολύ καλή γνώση των εφαρμογών MS Office και επιθυμητή γνώση εργασίας σε συστήματα ERP (όπως SAP)

Δεξιότητες:
  • Οργανωτικές δεξιότητες και μεθοδικότητα
  • Τήρηση διαδικασιών
  • Εξαιρετικές δεξιότητες επικοινωνίας
  • Ευελιξία & προσαρμοστικότητα
  • Προθυμία για συνεχή ανάπτυξη & βελτίωση

Παροχές Εταιρείας:
  • Προοπτικές εξέλιξης και ανάπτυξης σε έναν ισχυρό Όμιλο εταιρειών
  • Συμμετοχή σε Ομαδικό Ασφαλιστήριο Συμβόλαιο

Title: Temporary Stewardess • Private • Greece | 34m MY
Skills: Communication|Customer Support|Greek|Housekeeping|Interpersonal Skills|Spoken English|
Job Description:
About the job

Ενίσχυση του Γραφείου Αρωγής Χρηστών (Helpdesk) για την πρώτου επιπέδου υποστήριξη στους χρήστες των ψηφιακών υπηρεσιών που παρέχει η ΕΔΥΤΕ Α.Ε. στην Ερευνητική και Ακαδημαϊκή κοινότητα.

Description

Κύριες αρμοδιότητες της θέσης:
  • Παροχή υπηρεσιών εξυπηρέτησης χρηστών και τεχνικής υποστήριξης 1ου επιπέδου με χρήση σύγχρονων εργαλείων

(ticketing system, Call Center, κλπ).
  • Επιβεβαίωση ορθής λειτουργίας των εφαρμογών.
  • Συγγραφή εγχειριδίων χρήσης.

Requirements

Ο/Η κατάλληλος/η υποψήφιος/α για τη θέση θα πρέπει να διαθέτει τα παρακάτω προσόντα:
  • Φοιτητές ή απόφοιτοι σχολών Πληροφορικής Α.Ε.Ι·
  • Άριστος χειρισμός τόσο του γραπτού όσο και του προφορικού λόγου.

Προσωπικά Χαρακτηριστικά/Δεξιότητες

O/Η ιδανικός/ή υποψήφιός/α διαθέτει δυναμικό και υπεύθυνο χαρακτήρα με άριστες οργανωτικές και επικοινωνιακές δεξιότητες και με ενδιαφέρον για τη συνεχή ανάπτυξη των γνώσεων και ικανοτήτων του. Θα πρέπει να διακρίνεται από άριστη επαγγελματική συμπεριφορά, αναλυτική σκέψη, αποτελεσματικότητα υπό συνθήκες στενότητας χρόνου, και ομαδικό πνεύμα.

Benefits
  • Δυναμικό, ταχέως εξελισσόμενο περιβάλλον εργασίας

Η ΕΔΥΤΕ Α.Ε. είναι ένας εργοδότης ίσων ευκαιριών. Όλοι οι υποψήφιοι που πληρούν τις προϋποθέσεις, θα έχουν ίσες ευκαιρίες ανεξαρτήτου φυλής, χρώματος, θρησκείας, φύλου, σεξουαλικού προσανατολισμού, καταγωγής, αναπηρίας, ηλικίας ή οποιασδήποτε άλλης προστατευόμενης κατηγορίας σύμφωνα με την ισχύουσα νομοθεσία.

Όλες οι αιτήσεις θα αντιμετωπίζονται με αυστηρή εμπιστευτικότητα

Title: Business Consultant
Skills: Business Acumen|Business Development|Business Planning|Communication|Critical Thinking|Market Analysis|Market Research|Networking|New Business Opportunities|Sales Management|
Job Description:
About the job

Company's Profile:

APIVITA is a pioneering Greek company that has been producing innovative natural cosmetics since 1979. APIVITA products provide safe and effective care protection and natural beauty solutions for the face, body, and hair, derived from bee products and the powerful Greek flora. APIVITA since 2017 is a member company of the PUIG Group and has a worldwide distribution and a presence in more than 50 countries such as France, Taiwan, Russia, Hong Kong, Cyprus, Romania, Belgium, Portugal, Croatia, China, Thailand, South Africa, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Ireland, Malta, United Kingdom, Hungary, Italy, Norway, etc.

At APIVITA we share a vision for sustainable development, and we conduct our business with the utmost respect and love for nature and mankind. We, therefore, seek people with an outstanding ability to communicate the APIVITA brand philosophy and values and effectively promote and sell its products and services.

Title: Global Product Manager
Skills: Communication|Market Planning|Marketing Analytics|Oral Communication|Presentations|Product Development|Product Launch|Product Life Cycle|Product Marketing|Product Strategy|
Job Description:
About the job

Our mission at DRONAMICS is to democratize air freight and enable same day shipping for everyone, everywhere. To achieve this, we are developing a new type of cargo airplane, one that is small, remotely-piloted and extremely fuel efficient. It can transport up to 350 kg over 2,500 km for a cost that's 50% lower than other airplanes. It flies autonomously, can be monitored and managed remotely via satellite, and can land and take off anywhere with at least 400m of landstrip This is the kind of technology that can transform whole economies.


At first, it didn't sound possible, but we keep proving it is, which is why we've called it “The Black Swan”. It can land on short and unpaved runways, enabling on-demand point-to-point flights and speedy same-day delivery even to the most remote locations that would otherwise take days to reach over ground or sea.


We are starting with domestic air networks in Europe and Australia with fleets of the Black Swan, taking advantage of the multitude of small airfields that are often unused, training local personnel as drone and logistics operators, and partnering with local industry to provide a valuable lifeline of getting goods in and out of small, remote, mountainous and/or island communities within hours at a cost that is often below even that of road transportation.


We believe that rapid and reliable shipping has enormous socio-economic benefits, and our goal is to enable same-day deliveries for every single person on the planet at a cost that they can afford.


The Role


As the Aircraft Maintenance Engineer you would be responsible for performing and certifying maintenance activity on Dronamics aircraft and delivering the highest standards in terms of Safety and Quality. This role is critical to our successful operation of aircraft through provision of expert technical assistance, inspection, repair, refurbishment, modification and recovery, including advanced structural repair and aircraft and/or component modifications.


Duties And Responsibilities


  • Carry out the scheduled maintenance work
  • Ensure the work has been performed by approved maintenance data
  • Provide aircraft technical assistance and report to the flight crew in any abnormal situations
  • Coordinate with internal and external parties to promote prompt troubleshooting and to determine an estimated time of completion on all maintenance
  • Track the progression of all maintenance events on aircraft
  • Prioritize maintenance releases
  • Ensure compliance with regulatory & internal requirements
  • Support of Planning and Supply Chain Sections
  • Support Maintenance projects as defined by Engineering Management
  • Perform push-back and towing for aircraft


What We Offer


  • Dronamics will provide technical training, including initial on-job training at our R&D facilities in Sofia, Bulgaria.
  • A competitive compensation package for a Series A company
  • Lots of opportunities for personal and professional growth on a global level
  • Tons of work, zero office politics - we are here to impact the lives of millions of people around the world
  • A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to frame the future of how the world moves goods


Location


This role will be based in Greece. Due to the location of work we can only accept applications from EU passport holders.

Desired Skills and Experience

  • Minimum of 7 years of aircraft technical maintenance experience, within a Part 145 organization as Engineer, Mechanic or higher position
  • Hold a valid Maintenance License and EASA Part 66 Maintenance License (A) and/or FAA A&P License
  • Exposure and knowledge of EASA, FAA, and ICAO regulations and requirements
  • Aircraft technical and system troubleshooting experience
  • Must have working rights in EU

Job Description:
About the job

We are a new tech startup revolutionizing the on-demand retail industry in Greece 🚀

The next generation of e-commerce is all about speed. We are the first quick commerce platform in Greece that let’s people shop for their favourite products and get them delivered in under 15 MINUTES! How exactly do we do it? ... We are building an end-to-end infrastructure including a network of hyperlocal “dark stores”, an integrated supply chain and last-mile delivery operations. Our product range consists of thousands of grocery items including fresh products, daily essentials, convenience items and more - from the best global & local brands all at retail prices!

Our diverse and international team brings together industry experience from the best companies in Greece and around the world as well as serial entrepreneurs with knowledge in scaling businesses from the ground up. We are backed by global investors and are looking to build an amazing team of smart, driven and passionate people to join our journey in becoming one of the most loved consumer brands in Greece.

Job Overview

We are looking for a competent Customer Care Associate with exemplary communication skills, energetic and passionate about customer experience! The ideal candidate will have the chance to be one of the first team members of our Customer Care team and work in a fast paced and vibrant startup environment. Among other tasks you will be helping customers with questions or concerns regarding the company's product and services and you will be providing solutions to possible challenges with the goal of retaining our customers and raising their overall satisfaction. Speed is our promise to the customers therefore we expect you to act fast and provide remarkable answers to their questions!

Requirements

  • Customer centric personality and natural communicator with a solution-oriented mindset and hands-on mentality
  • Willingness to work in shifts based on a rotating schedule (evenings and weekends)
  • Native in Greek with outstanding written and spoken skills
  • Computer literacy is considered a must

Benefits

  • Be part of a young, dynamic and international environment where passion, drive and team spirit matter more than corporate hierarchies
  • Attractive company perks, discounts and allowances for groceries
  • Fun & exciting work culture and regular company events
  • Plus many more to come!

Job Description:
About the job

The Purpose of the BI/SQL Developer is to review business processes in order to gain a complete understanding of current procedures, identify improvements, document those processes, and connect business people to information technology groups in an organization, as well as to provide operational SQL development support to the organization.


Essential Responsibilities


Principal Accountabilities:


  • Designing and optimizing MS reporting and Analysis reports ensuring their stability, reliability, and performance.
  • Prepare documentations and specifications
  • Handle common database procedures such as upgrade, backup, recovery, migration, etc.
  • Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders


Contacts


Routine contact is required with IT managers at all organizational levels and with technology vendors. Within the business, periodic contact is required with executives in charge of the key business units using IT services.


Experience in the following topics will be considered a very strong asset


  • Strong experience in Database Administration in SQL Server (2014 & later versions)
  • Experience in troubleshooting and resolving database integrity issues, performance issues, blocking and deadlocking issues, replication issues, log shipping issues, connectivity issues, security issues, etc.
  • Experience in Performance Tuning, Query Optimization, using Performance Monitor, SQL Profiler and other related monitoring and troubleshooting tools.
  • SQL Development – ability to write and troubleshoot SQL Code and design (stored procedures, functions, tables, views, triggers, indexes, constraints)
  • Experience in BI Tools including (QlikView, QlikSense, etc.)


Position Requirements


  • Bachelor’s Degree in computer science preferred


Experience:
  • Has 3+ years of experience in database development and support in MS SQL Server environments
  • 3+ years of experience working as a Functional, Data or Business Analyst
  • 3+ years of experience as an Applications Systems Analyst


Skills/Knowledge:


Solid experience in report Development using tools such as MS Reporting services (2012 & later versions), MS Analysis services (2012 & later versions) and Cube handling, and/or Qlik View/Sense since this will be a major part of the day-to-day work
  • The ability to develop requirements and create functional and technical specs is an essential requirement

Job Description:


Brokers actively support the completion of customs clearance procedures of UPS of Greece Inc. on behalf of its customers, by providing professional service, in order UPS to be fully compliant with complex customs regulations and adequately to represent its customers at customs authority. Having knowledge of customs laws and regulations they support both businesses and individuals to successfully navigate importing and exporting procedures of customs clearance for goods received and shipped through the UPS of Greece Inc network. Brokers have specialization and practical experience in clearance entry procedures of many categories of goods under different customs regimes, their tariff classification, valuation and assessment of duty and applicable taxes rates for imported goods. They are in contact with customs authorities coordinating multiple parties including other regional organizations They assist importers and exporters for solving any problem arise during the customs clearance of goods ensuring that packages are cleared timely and error free.

Permanent

Education And Experience

  • Previous experience in customer services is an advantage
  • Working experience with ERGANI
  • Experience with EFKA procedures
  • Knowledge of current labor and insurance legislation

Job Description:
About the job

H ΤΕΡΝΑ Α.Ε., εταιρεία του Ομίλου ΓΕΚ ΤΕΡΝΑ, αναζητά:

Project Planner

για μεγάλο κτιριακό έργο

Αρμοδιότητες θέσης:
  • Συντάσσει και διαμορφώνει εξαρχής αναλυτικά χρονοδιαγράμματα των επιμέρους και του συνολικού έργου, με τη χρήση του λογισμικού Primavera
  • Εφαρμόζει τις τρέχουσες μεθοδολογίες προγραμματισμού και παρακολούθησης χρονοδιαγραμμάτων (resource & cost loading, curves, KPI’s, EAV methodology etc.)
  • Μελετά τις συμβάσεις των έργων και ενημερώνει τα ενδιαφερόμενα μέρη για τις προθεσμίες
  • Ενημερώνει το χρονοδιάγραμμα σε μόνιμη βάση, οργανώνει και διατηρεί τα δεδομένα και τις πληροφορίες βάσει των απαιτήσεων του εκάστοτε έργου
  • Παρέχει τις απαιτούμενες πληροφορίες προς τη διεύθυνση του έργου
  • Συντάσσει και παρουσιάζει τις εκθέσεις παρακολούθησης προόδου των έργων σε τακτικά χρονικά διαστήματα στη διεύθυνση του έργου, παρέχοντας έγκαιρη ενημέρωση για την εξέλιξη των εργασιών
  • Συνεργάζεται με όλα τα τμήματα, διευκολύνοντας την απαραίτητη επικοινωνία σε κάθε στάδιο υλοποίησης του εκάστοτε έργου

Απαιτούμενα Προσόντα:
  • Πτυχίο ΑΕΙ Πολιτικού Μηχανικού με πολυετή εμπειρία σε κτιριακά έργα
  • Εξειδίκευση σε Project Management
  • Τυχόν πρόσθετες σπουδές στο αντικείμενο του χρονικού προγραμματισμού θα εκτιμηθούν
  • 10 έτη ελάχιστη εμπειρία σε χρονοδιαγράμματα κτιριακών έργων στην Ελλάδα και στο εξωτερικό
  • Εμπειρία στην κατασκευή θα εκτιμηθεί
  • Άριστη γνώση λογισμικών MS Project και Primavera
  • Καλή γνώση Αγγλικής γλώσσας (προφορικά & γραπτά)
  • Πολύ καλή γνώση χειρισμού εφαρμογών MS Office

Δεξιότητες:
  • Αποτελεσματική επικοινωνία και συνεργασία σε όλα τα επίπεδα
  • Ικανότητα τήρησης χρονοδιαγραμμάτων και συντονισμού πολλαπλών εργασιών
  • Προθυμία για συνεχή μάθηση και εξέλιξη του αντικειμένου

Παροχές Εταιρείας:
  • Προοπτικές εξέλιξης και ανάπτυξης σε έναν ισχυρό Όμιλο εταιρειών
  • Συμμετοχή σε Ομαδικό Ασφαλιστήριο Συμβόλαιο

Title: Broker
Job Description:
About the job

We are looking for a talented Software Engineer for our Backend to join our Technology team and help us maintain and improve our systems and top service.

In this position you will:

  • Develop and improve platforms/services for our different verticals (insurancemarket.gr, energy-market.gr, money-market.gr).
  • Build solutions in technologies such as PHP, Go and Docker.
  • Utilize AWS services, Serverless functions, NoSQL DBs and streaming services.
  • Team up with our Product and DevOps engineers to deliver top class experiences.

Qualifications for this role include:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent topic.
  • Experience with Go.
  • Capability to understand how business needs are translated into technical implementations.
  • Experience in working with Agile Methodologies.
  • Good understanding of REST APIs and SOAP Web Services.
  • Experience in relational and non-relational databases (SQL and NoSQL).
  • Knowledge of git and git-flow.
  • Experience in designing, building, testing and maintaining modern software applications.
  • Experience in applying development best-practices and patterns in relation to security, scalability, and performance.
  • A keen eye on the future, whilst making sure we’re proactively but pragmatically tackling technical debt.
  • Good communication skills, with the ability to communicate issues to technical and non-technical people.
  • A good command of the Greek language.
  • Fulfilled military obligations (for male candidates).

It would be a plus to have:

  • Experience in contributing to technical decisions and direction in a collaborative team environment, including architecture, estimation, product planning, user story / requirement analysis.
  • Experience in Full Stack Development.
  • Experience in design and development across multiple layers of an application.
  • Experience of mentoring junior team members.
  • Experience of debugging and troubleshooting live applications.

We know you are in high demand, here is why we are different and why you will love working for us:

  • Competitive remuneration scheme.
  • Private Health Coverage on the Company’s group program & a yearly check-up plan.
  • Being a member of a Great Place to Work awarded company.
  • Experiencing a working environment that gives employees large goals, autonomy and mentoring, which creates incredible opportunities, both for you and the company.
  • Substantial yearly “Learning and Development” budget in accordance with our growth and development plan.
  • A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry.
  • A relaxed and modern working atmosphere located in the heart of Athens
  • Hybrid working and all safety requirements, in total compliance with covid-19 restrictions.
  • Personalized working station & laptop.

Title: Project Planner (Mega Projects)
Skills: Analytical Skills|English|Marketing|Microsoft Project|Procurement|Project Control|Project Planning|Research Skills|Teamwork|
Job Description:
About the job

Novibet is looking for Agile Delivery Lead to join our team in our offices in Athens.


Novibet, founded in 2010, is an established GameTech company operating in Europe and LATAM (Greece, Brazil, Ireland, Italy, Mexico, Chile, Ecuador), through its offices in Greece & Malta. Licensed and regulated by MGA, ADM and HGC, and Irish Revenue Commissioners, Novibet is committed to delivering the best sports betting and gaming experience to an ever-expanding customer base.


The primary responsibility of the role is to facilitate the development of multiple Scrum teams as well as improve their ways of working and agile mindset. The Agile Delivery Lead facilitates agile events, removes impediments, provides coaching to team members and ensures timely and accurate delivery of the roadmap items.


Your Role


  • Guide one or more Scrum teams; Acts as a Scrum Master facilitating all scrum ceremonies across delivery teams;Monitor the delivery flow of teams and ensure timely and accurate execution of the roadmap items, while maintaining inter-team alignment;
  • Promote Scrum / Agile principles in the Scrum teams and stakeholders and drive process improvements; Participate and share knowledge as well as promote best practices;
  • Coach Product Owners, team members and business leaders;
  • Support agile team transformation and encourage teams to adopt agile values and apply Scrum;
  • Remove impediments and distractions to optimize teams’ performance;
  • Capture and report team performance metrics.
  • Set objectives for and manages multiple projects within a division.
  • Understands estimation processes and provides insights to the estimates of the project team;
  • Maintains the documentation of the deliverables across all delivery teams;
  • Identifies issues / risks, escalating in advance where necessary;
  • Maintains a pragmatic approach always leading the delivery teams to successful completion of tasks;
  • Cooperates with other colleagues on issues and processed that require cross functional cooperation;


Requirements


Our ideal future co-worker is a strong team player, promotes transparency and cooperation with an agile mindset and has a strong sense of ownership. We expect you to have:


  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or relative field;
  • Previous working experience as a Scrum Master / Agile Delivery Lead in a technology environment; relevant certification is desired
  • 4+ years of relevant experience within information technology roles with increasing responsibility in designing, delivering, and maintaining large-scale, global systems & platforms
  • Understanding of technology - Language and Applications (previous experience as a developer will be considered as a plus);
  • Strong facilitation skills, both verbal and written communication;
  • Ability to communicate clearly and concisely across technology and the business teams;
  • Active participation in a culture of teamwork and quality;
  • Fluent in English, both oral and written.
  • Strengths in problem solving and issue-resolution
  • Ability to quickly gain credibility with senior management
  • Strong people management experience


Benefits


Our employees are our most important asset and that's reflected in the way we treat our people! We are proud to offer a variety of benefits to support employees, including:


  • Friendly working environment
  • Opportunities to learn and grow within a dynamic, fast developing company
  • Competitive remuneration package
  • Private insurance scheme


Novibet regrets that due to the large volume of applications received, we will only consider those who solely correspond to job requirements as listed above.

All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.

Title: Software Engineer (Backend)
Skills: API Development|Agile Methodologies|Back-End Web Development|Go (Programming Language)|Microservices|MongoDB|
Job Description:
About the job

Company Description


About Netcompany-Intrasoft


We are Netcompany-Intrasoft, a leading European IT Solutions and Services Group with strong international presence and expertise, offering innovative and added-value solutions of the highest quality to a wide range of international and national public and private organizations. More than 500 organizations in over 70 countries worldwide have chosen the company's services and solutions to fulfill their business needs.


For more information regarding our company, current projects, and openings around Europe, please consult our website: www.netcompany-intrasoft.com.


Job Description


A day in the life of a Cloud Engineer


As a Cloud Engineer, you will be part of a growing team composed of our Cloud Architects, Engineers and Analysts working on multiple Cloud Environments. You will focus on developing solutions leveraging cloud-based platforms and associated technologies.


Your main duties will be to:


  • Manage Information Technology cloud services provided to our clients
  • Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug cloud-based software programs based on business needs and requirements
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of the services provided, with a strong focus on quality
  • Work across the complete cloud stack: Software as a Service (SaaS), and/or Platform as a Service (PaaS) and/or Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
  • Analyze new and existing public cloud services and create solutions that meet client requirements and standards
  • Help our clients modernize their architecture and core technologies
  • Own the end-to-end delivery of solutions and release Infrastructure as Code
  • Manage incidents, requests, and changes, related to all the Information Technology services
  • Work closely with clients and third parties on infrastructure-related planning and operation


By joining Netcompany - Intrasoft, a leading IT company, you will be part of a hub of 1.700+ tech enthusiasts in Greece. You will work using cutting-edge technologies that contribute to the design and delivery of solutions and products for challenging, large-scale IT projects, that affect the lives of millions of citizens around the globe.


Qualifications


If you have


  • Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or Engineering
  • At least 5 years of experience in the field of ICT
  • At least 2 years of experience in the field of Cloud
  • Working knowledge of Cloud technologies such as Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure or Google Cloud Platform (GCP) or Oracle Cloud (OCI).
  • Troubleshooting and analytical skills
  • then this position is suitable for you!


It would also be a plus if you had


  • Ability to solve complex technical problems and accomplish tasks with minimal supervision
  • Familiar with containers (Openshift, Kubernetes, Docker etc.)
  • Familiar with DevOps and CI/CD tools
  • Knowledge of one or more scripting languages (bash, Powershell, Python)
  • Knowledge of cloud monitoring and alerting services and capabilities
  • Excellent communication skills verbal & written in English.


This position comes with


  • Competitive compensation packages
  • Continuous learning (with the most modern methods - unlimited access to Udemy for Business), and fast career growth
  • Interesting and challenging tasks within large-scale projects
  • An international dynamic within a fast-paced working environment
  • The opportunity to work in a diverse environment with talented colleagues


Additional Information


We ensure equal opportunities, treatment, and consideration to all candidates. Discrimination based on sex, racial or ethnic origin, religion or belief, disability, age, sexual orientation or marital status, physical or mental disability, or any other factor protected by applicable laws and regulations is prohibited. At Netcompany-Intrasoft we respect human rights as part of our culture, and we focus on creating a positive workplace in which all employees are valued and where diversity and inclusivity are welcomed.


The safety and well-being of our employees remain our top priority. Please note that Netcompany-Intrasoft’s recruitment process is being conducted virtually due to preventive measures against the Covid-19 pandemic.


  • Please submit your CV in English


All applications will be treated as strictly confidential


Our culture


Our people are the most important element of our success. Our work life is well defined by our set of fundamental Values: https://bit.ly/3SSbBzU


#BePartOfSomethingGreat!


  • Please submit your CV in English


All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.

Title: Agile Delivery Lead
Skills: Communication|Computer Science|English|Manufacturing Process Improvement|People Management|Performance Metrics|Problem Solving|Scrum|Teamwork|Written Communication|
Job Description:
About the job

About Agoda


Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.


Get to Know our Team:


The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.


Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples:


  • Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests.
  • Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap
  • Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders


What you’ll Need to Succeed:


  • Bachelor’s degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering business, science, or relevant field of study
  • 0 to 4 years experience in data crunching from top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company
  • Experience in one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g. SQL, SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA and visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Power BI, etc.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
  • Ability to move fast and be efficient, making decisions on objective data evidence
  • Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes
  • Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently


It’s Great if you Have:


  • Experience in digital marketing or e-commerce
  • Experience with A/B testing and other testing metrics
  • Strong presentation and negotiation skills

Title: Cloud Engineer
Skills: Cloud Computing|Communication|Computer Science|Information Technology|Information and Communications Technology (ICT)|
Job Description:
About the job

Sunlight Technosystems is a Sunlight Group company, based in Kilkis, northern Greece. The company specializes in the design and manufacturing of molds, machined parts and plastic components, as well as the production of metal cases (trays) for energy storage, suitable for industrial applications.

Following the recent acquisition of the Netelco S.A. business unit in Xanthi, northern Greece, that involves the production and sales of metal cases, Sunlight Technosystems further enhanced its production capacity.

An established and growing company with years of experience, Sunlight Technosystems uses innovative manufacturing methods and continuously invests in both high-tech applications and specialized personnel.

Driven by our commitment to inspire our people and unlock their potential, we have created an agile and innovative environment that promotes open communication and collaboration, while offering continuous learning and development opportunities to more than 130 people we employ at Sunlight Technosystems.


Keen to further empower our team by onboarding more talent, we're looking for a QA Manager to join our dynamic QC team. The role will be responsible for inspecting procedures and outputs, identifying mistakes or non-conformity issues to ensure that all external and internal requirements are met before the product reaches the customers.

Key activities and responsibilities of this role include:


  • Supervise the total production process and packaging, from the control of receipts of raw materials and packaging materials to the control of the final product
  • Perform quality audits at regular time intervals assessing the implementation of the Project Quality Plan / System
  • Assess customer requirements and ensure that these are met
  • Plan and coordinate the quality control activities
  • Daily interaction with the Production Manager for the proper organization, improvement and coordination of all actions related to quality issues
  • Develop the Project Quality Plan / System and monitor its implementation
  • Monitor the compliance of H&S procedures
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of the Company's Quality Management System and the Project Quality Program through the review of performance and performance indicators



Job requirements


  • >8 years of experience in Quality Control/ Quality Assurance in industrial/ manufacturing environment
  • BSc in Engineering and MSc in relevant field or MBA are a must
  • Excellent MS Office knowledge
  • Fluency in English & Greek (verbal & written)
  • Hands-on experience with Quality Management Systems (QMS) and testing methodologies
  • Very good knowledge and experience of applying Global Quality Assurance Standards
  • Excellent knowledge of health and safety regulations
  • Excellent leadership and organizational skills
  • Strong multi-tasking, decision-making and problem-solving skills



What we offer you


To start with, we give you the opportunity to thrive in a restless team and grow your potential in an innovative environment. As per your compensation and rewards package, this is a preview:


  • A competitive salary based on experience and topped up with other bonuses.
  • Company healthcare plan
  • Continuous learning opportunities. Allocated training budget that can be spent on books, online courses or other training materials.
  • Established framework for career development
  • International mobility opportunities

About the job

Είμαστε περήφανοι για το γεγονός ότι φημιζόμαστε για την παροχή υψηλών προδιαγραφών υπηρεσιών καθώς επίσης και για τις καινοτόμες υπηρεσίες μας. Η καταξίωσή μας αποκτήθηκε χάρη στους ανθρώπους μας για αυτό και επενδύουμε στο ανθρώπινο δυναμικό μας.


Στα πλαίσια της ενίσχυσης του ανθρώπινου δυναμικού αναζητούμε Μηχανολόγο Μηχανικό για να ενταχθεί στο τεχνικό τμήμα του συνεργείου στο υποκατάστημα στη Θεσσαλονίκη.

Ο κάτοχος της θέσης θα έχει την ευκαιρία να γνωρίσει την δομή και τη φιλοσοφία της εταιρίας, ενώ θα λάβει την απαραίτητη εκπαίδευση και πιστοποίηση με σεμινάρια σε Ελλάδα και εξωτερικό .


Ενδεικτικά κάποιες από τις αρμοδιότητες,

• Τεχνική υποστήριξη και παροχή συμβουλών στους πελάτες και στο δίκτυο συνεργατών

• Καταγραφή και τήρηση εγγράφων ιστορικού καθώς και report για τεχνικές υποθέσεις

• Διαχείριση προγραμμάτων της John Deere καθώς και άλλων κατασκευαστών

• Επικοινωνία με πελάτες και οργάνωση εξωτερικών συνεργείων


Αναζητούμε έναν άνθρωπο με όρεξη για εργασία, οργανωτικό, ικανό να εργάζεται υπό πίεση με ανεπτυγμένο αίσθημα ομαδικότητας και καλές επικοινωνιακές ικανότητες.


Απαιτείται:

• Πτυχίο ΑΕΙ ή ΤΕΙ με ειδικότητα Ηλεκτρολόγου Μηχανικού, Μηχανολόγου Μηχανικού ή σχετική με την αυτοκίνηση

• Γνώση Μηχανολογικού/Ηλεκτρολογικού/Υδραυλικού σχεδίου

• Δίπλωμα οδήγησης Β κατηγορίας

• Καλή γνώση αγγλικής γλώσσας

• Άριστη γνώση Η/Υ



Επιπλέον, θα εκτιμηθεί:


• Προϋπηρεσία που σχετίζεται με το συγκεκριμένο αντικείμενο

• Εμπειρία στην διάγνωση σύνθετων ηλεκτρικών και ηλεκτρονικών προβλημάτων

• Ενασχόληση με τον γεωργικό τομέα και τα γεωργικά μηχανήματα

• Γνώση διαγνωστικών προγραμμάτων

• Γνώση γερμανικής γλώσσας


Η εταιρεία μας προσφέρει :

• ένα ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών

• συνεχής εκπαίδευση των εργαζομένων

• ευκαιρία για επαγγελματική ανέλιξη


Μετά τη συλλογή και την αξιολόγηση των βιογραφικών σημειωμάτων θα υπάρξει επικοινωνία μόνο με τους υποψηφίους που ανταποκρίνονται στις απαιτήσεις της θέσης προς στελέχωση για να οριστεί συνάντηση για συνέντευξη.


Όλες οι αιτήσεις θεωρούνται απόλυτα εμπιστευτικές.

Title: Quality Assurance Manager
Skills: Continuous Improvement|Decision-Making|English|Performance Reviews|Problem Solving|Quality Assurance|Quality Auditing|Quality Control|Quality Management|Safety Regulations|
Job Description:
About the job

We are Kaizen Gaming

Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.


The Opportunity

Principal Engineers hold a central role in the Technology department. They are expected to help teams devise elegant and performant solutions in response to real business problems, guide them in designing and implementing these solutions in code, as well as teach coding, testing, debugging, and performance analysis techniques, while also carrying out code reviews.

Principal Engineers will frequently attend the team’s scrum events (esp. refinements) and help the team’s product owners shape a better understanding of the technical challenges involved. Production problems are usually escalated to the Principal Engineers, for triaging before landing in a team's backlog. Principal Engineers should also stay up to date on the latest technologies and drive their adoption.


Organization

At Kaizen, we operate in verticals, which represent the connection with our customers and the way that we are creating sustainable growth and seamless entertainment experiences. Each vertical (Sportsbook, Gaming, Account & Services, Rewards & Comms), as well as our core technology lines (Platform and International Expansion), consists of Technology and Product teams. The technology department is organized across tribes with each tribe focusing on a particular aspect of the business. Each tribe is led by its tribe-leader, who reports to the Vertical Director. Tribes are composed of teams and an architect may lead one or more of them.


Tech Stack

Our tech stack consists of many services and applications written in C#/.NET (both full framework and Core) for the backend stuff.

We use jQuery/Knockout.js for some of the older apps and Angular or Vue.js for the newer front-end stuff. We use MSSQL server and PostgreSQL for most of our storage needs interspersed with Redis and ElasticSearch, whenever it makes sense to do so. RabbitMQ is the message broker ubiquitously used in our systems and we deploy using a mixture of regular good old VMs and Docker containers on our on-prem Openshift installation. We're using git and Gitlab for version control and our CI/CD pipeline. We use the latest versions of our frameworks.

Title: Automotive Engineer
Skills: Automotive|
Job Description:
About the job

About The Job


About Workearly


Workearly, powered by Reatcode, is the Top Remote Learning Hub for students and young professionals, offering remote schools with asynchronous self-paced training, globally recognized remote talent digital badges, and connections with the top companies who hire talent right now! Our mission is to provide candidates with the opportunity to upgrade their skills, broaden their career opportunities and work for employers and projects that match their previous experience and expertise. Vice-versa, our goal is to provide companies with Talent, to help them hire top-quality candidates. Our team consists of Top Instructors & Recruitment experts from all over the world who are highly experienced in various industries. With a global presence and offices in more than 5 countries, we have managed to gather Top Skilled Recruiters and Talents together in one Platform.


We are currently looking for an ambitious Content Writer to join our team.


About The Role - Content Writer


In this position, you will be part of the training team of HR School.


More specifically, you will:


  • Create articles and other content, based on material available in our digital library.
  • Perform extended research to create content related to HR trends, professional updates & corporate news
  • Perform proofreading and suggest amendments
  • Transfer material among different platform to another
  • Translate from Greek to English and vice versa
  • Cooperate closely with other team members and departments.


We are NOT looking for:


We are not looking for candidates who prefer to work individually, who do not like fast-growing environments and whose goal is to perform the same kind of work every-day.


What we are looking for is:


An ambitious professional who has the passion to be creative and communicate with students and colleagues! If you are not excited about working in a team, this position is not a good fit for you. For this position, our priority is not your Master or your Bachelor Degree. What we need from you is to be able to answer correctly a few questions, proving your hard skills. Then, well communicate with you and get to know you better.


Requirements:


Familiarity with online platfroms & social media


Excellent oral and writing skills in Greek and in English


Translation skills


Ability to work flexibly, since we adapt our schedule according to our customers!


Prioritizing, time management, and organizational skills


Skilled in relationship management and open to feedback


Being part of a working culture that embraces autonomy and initiative-taking


Working with passionate professionals, who excel in their fields


Reatcode is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type and afford equal employment opportunities to employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law Industry


Employment Type


Full-time


Personal Data


Our Company is Data Controller for the processing of your personal data to assess your candidacy for the job vacancy, pursuant to General Data Protection Regulation. By submitting your CV, we collect and process your personal data that is included in your CV and the data you choose to share with us during the interviews. This data is: your full name, your contact details, your working experience and your education. We process the said data, according to the legal basis of legitimate Interest to the extent that the processing is necessary for the


assessment and selection of the most suitable candidate for the job vacancy. Your personal data is retained for 6 months of the receipt of your CV, in order to assess your candidacy for the current or future job vacancy. For more information about our practices and your rights, please visit our Privacy Policy on our website.

Title: Director, Application Engineering - Computer Graphics &AI
Skills: Analytical Skills|Application-Specific Integrated Circuits (ASIC)|Business Planning|Commercial Awareness|Demos|Interpersonal Skills|Processes Development|Resource Management|Sensitivity|Timelines|
Job Description:
About the job

Landis+Gyr is a leading global provider of integrated energy management solutions. We measure and analyze energy utilization to generate empowering analytics for smart grid and infrastructure management, enabling utilities and consumers to reduce energy consumption. Our innovative and proven portfolio of software, services and intelligent sensor technology is a key driver to decarbonize the grid. Having avoided more than 9 million tons of CO2 in FY 2021 and committed to achieve carbon neutrality by 2030, Landis+Gyr manages energy better – since 1896.

With sales of USD 1.5 billion in FY 2021, Landis+Gyr employs around 6,500 talented people across five continents.

Overall Objective

The Junior Reliability Engineer is supporting the product reliability scheme by implementing global reliability testing regimes, investigating failure root cause(s) and liaising with other product key stakeholders (GRD, PM) on continual product improvement to ensure that product of adequate reliability level is supplied to our customers.

Through application of global ORT guideline and management of issue RCA the Junior Reliability Engineer supports the SC in delivering products that meet the required level by our customers of product life expectancy.

Key Performance Indicators

Timely execution of yearly reliability testing schedule. Successful resolution of reliability testing related issues in terms of Quality and time (CI CAPAs).

Key Areas of Responsibility
  • Carry out all reliability tests scheduled for the FY in a timely manner.
  • Organize and coordinate planning of availability of ORT/LRI samples.
  • Organize and coordinate initial, intermediate and final testing of samples that have undergone ORT/LRI.
  • Initiate investigation of root cause analysis in cases of identified failures during ORT/LRI.
  • Carry out 1st level investigation of failure mechanism of issues deriving form ORT/LRI.
  • Open and coordinate a CI CAPA to drive and document preventive actions, RCA, corrective and preventive actions as well as product improvements deriving from ORT/LRI failures.
  • Support CI CAPA team members with all quality tools needed (8D, Ishikawa diagram, DFMEA etc.).
  • Conduct frequent reviews on resolution progress to assure that all CI CAPA tasks are closed out on time.
  • Escalate any issues that could potentially introduce delays in resolution or result in non-predictable costs that could have subsequent impact in the reliability of meters already delivered to customers.
  • Monitor the proper operation of all reliability testing equipment.
  • Coordinate equipment breakdown and preventive maintenance with external service providers.
  • Support improvement of testing methods as well as testing equipment within a cross-functional team.

Required Skills
  • Technical University Degree in Electronics
  • Fluency in English language
  • Very good knowledge of computer use
  • Previous working experience in electronic circuit fault analysis will be considered as a plus
  • Knowledge in basic reliability prediction models
  • Knowledge in electrical/electronic circuits operation and fault/performance analysis
  • Knowledge of problem-solving methodologies & tools
  • Facilitation, & coaching skills as a Quality partner
  • Knowledge of 8D, FMEA, Root cause analysis, 5-Why and other quality tools for problem solving
  • Ability to work efficiently within a matrix management organization

Personal skills
  • Ability to adapt working style within multicultural groups
  • Quality mindset
  • Agile and self-motivated
  • Team player
  • Ability to positively influence others without direct authority in efforts to move assigned tasks forward
  • Ability to accept change and respond to setbacks with minimal disruptions
  • Process oriented approach in daily work

If you have the drive and enthusiasm to accept this challenge and to work in a very dynamic, cross functional and international environment, we are looking forward to meeting you. Click apply now.

BYTE COMPUTER S.A. (www.byte.gr), the pioneer of integrated IT solutions and applications, is looking for an experienced SQL Server Database Administrator (contract) who will be responsible for the implementation, configuration, maintenance, and performance of critical SQL Server RDBMS systems.

The job assignment requires travelling and on-site presence. The duration of assignment will be at least 6 months.


Key responsibilities:

Required Skills/Experience:

  • 3+ years of experience as a SQL Server DBA in a production environment
  • 3+ years of experience with Windows server, including Active Directory
  • Hands-on experience in Performance Tuning and Optimization (PTO)
  • Hands-on experience in Backup, restore and recovery models
  • Hands-on experience in High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) options for SQL Server

Title: Content Writer
Skills: Content Development|Content Strategy|Editorial|Greek|Proofreading|Search Engine Optimization (SEO)|Web Content Creation|Web Content Writing|Workload Prioritization|Writing|
Job Description:
About the job

With you, Chubb is better!

Do you have a keen eye for detail, a nose for bugs, and a passion for breaking things just to see how they work? Then, check out this outstanding opportunity in our new Technology Hub in Greece – CBSG (Chubb Business Services Greece) as a QA Test Lead.

https://news.chubb.com/2022-12-08-Chubb-to-Launch-New-Technology-Hub-in-Thessaloniki,-Greece

If you are a tech lover and are raring to develop your career join our growing, pioneer, diverse team within one of the largest companies in the world, we would love to hear from you!

The Opportunity

Your Responsibilities for this role may include, but are not limited to:
  • Be the captain of a QA ship, mentoring and leading a team of testers to victory in the battle against bugs.
  • Be the master of the design, development, and implementation of testing components.
  • Establish and evolve formal QA processes, ensuring that the team is using industry-accepted standard processes.
  • Be responsible for all aspects of quality assurance, including establishing metrics, applying industry standard methodologies, and developing new tools and processes to ensure quality goals are met.
  • Do not be afraid to get your hands dirty (or their keyboard greasy) in the name of quality
  • Act as a "gatekeeper" for all QA aspects of releases, providing QA services and coordinating QA resources internally and externally.
  • Consistently demonstrates superb communication skills and can work successfully in a multi-functional matrixed organization. Ensures accurate and timely communication of the project landmarks with others and creates a high-functioning team environment.
  • Develop a testing strategy and master test plan to support testing objectives.

Qualifications

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities
  • At least 5 years of experience in software QA testing, with at least 3 years in a QA Lead role.
  • Demonstrated experience with test automation, performance testing, and a curiosity about finding the needle in the haystack (or the bug in the code).
  • Guru of project and software lifecycles, with understanding of project lifecycle methodologies such as Agile, Waterfall and CI/CD.
  • Ability to build a testing strategy that is customized and optimized for the situation and communicate it effectively to collaborators.
  • Strong communications skills with the ability to cooperate with both executives and technical staff in Greek and English.
  • Be part of a fast-paced tech team and provide technical leadership to agile development teams.
  • Be an analytical thinker and the main point of contact for problem-solving issues
  • A strong passion for quality, and captain of multitasking to handle multiple challenging priorities simultaneously.
  • ISTQB or relevant certification will be considered a plus.

Our team makes a difference, every time. For this reason, we offer in return!

We offer hybrid working model, explicit, structured career development, a competitive salary package, annual bonus, private medical cover, monthly allowance for lunch, continuous learning experiences, work in a fun, lively environment with mentoring from our groundbreaking senior mentors.

Integrity. Client Focus. Respect. Excellence. Teamwork

Our core values instruct how we live and work. We’re an ethical and honest company that’s wholly committed to its clients. A business that’s engaged in mutual trust and respect for its employees and partners. A place where colleagues perform at the highest levels. And a working environment that’s collaborative and encouraging.

Diversity & Inclusion. At Chubb, we consider our people our chief competitive advantage and as such we treat colleagues, candidates, clients, and business partners with equality, fairness, and respect, regardless of their age, disability, race, religion or belief, gender, sexual orientation, marital status or family circumstances. We strive to achieve an environment where all colleagues feel comfortable performing to their full potential and are recognized for their contributions.

Many voices, One Chubb!

About the job

EmDoT is a company at the forefront of developing IoT value-added solutions. Investing in cutting-edge technologies and in our team is at the core of our future growth. In order to meet our ever-increasing needs, we are currently looking for an Electronic Design Engineer to join us and to cover a position in the Electronics Department.


The candidate will typically have 5+ years working experience and a university degree in Electronics.


Your key responsibilities will be but not limited to

  • Design and develop IoT solutions from concept to product
  • Realization of complex system requirements to provide robust and reliable hardware and firmware solutions.
  • Documentation of design specifications and implementation details.
  • Collaboration with other team members including hardware, firmware, software and mechanical engineers to formalize specifications, interfaces etc.
  • Design and implement hardware and software for embedded devices and systems from requirements to production and commercial deployment.
  • Design, develop, code, test and debug system software.


Desired knowledge:

  • Design experience with common embedded MCUs including Microchip PIC and STM32 for IoT applications.
  • Embedded C programming
  • Experience in digital electronic design, schematic capture using EDA CAD software such as Altium or similar.
  • Good knowledge of peripheral interfaces UART, I2C, SPI etc
  • Experience on debuggers/programmers and lab equipment oscilloscope etc
  • Familiar with embedded telecommunication device modules GSM/GPRS, NbIoT, LoRaWAN etc


Desired skills:

  • Self-motivated and capable of dealing with fast moving and varied events which are demanding. Able to analyse complex situations and give balanced well-considered decisions.
  • Have a Team player mentality and a positive attitude

The opportunity
