About the job

Who we are

A coaching and learning ecosystem for talented and passionate tech professionals where you can find your next career goal in a diverse and multidisciplinary environment. At Agile Actors, you will experience continuous growth and development through coaching, learning and practice! An innovative self-paced personal development and rewarding model will support your advancement and along with the necessary tools, appropriate learning material, and real projects from organisations that are leaders of the industry (both domestic and international), such as RedHat, Blueground, GFK, Austrian Post, etc, cultivate a continuous growth mindset!

Be part of both the customer's and the Agile Actor's team, providing high-quality deliverables for the former and contributing to the cultivation of an inclusive and developmental culture in the latter!




Who we are looking for

We are looking for passionate, multi-talented IT professionals with a strong technology background, as well as a great propensity for creative problem solving. Joining our local Scrum teams based in Athens, the successful candidate will work closely with domestic and international development teams in exciting and challenging projects!



Requirements

Professional experience:

  • Knowledge of at least one dynamic scripting language (Python, Ruby, Groovy etc.)
  • Experience with Docker and container orchestration tools (Kubernetes)
  • Experience with cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Gitlab etc.)
  • Professional experience with automation and IaC tools (Ansible, Terraform)
  • Good knowledge of version control systems (Git preferably, SVN etc.)
  • Familiarity with RBDMS databases (MySQL, Postrgres)

Nice to have:

  • Experience with NoSQL databases
  • Experience with monitoring/logging tools (Prometheus, ELK stack)

Ιn addition to your technical skills and knowledge, we pay attention to the following :

  • Precise and efficient communication skills in English (written and verbal).
  • A disciplined approach and ability to work with cross-functional multicultural teams.
  • A desire to keep learning, growing and teaching.


Benefits

Why join us?

Join us if you enjoy being part of a people-centered culture that empowers you to work on the most important product; yourself! Continuously grow with the support of tech experts and maintain a matching skill set to market needs.



  • Personal Development Plan crafted with your dedicated coach
  • 360° continuous feedback model; drive your developmental pace
  • Unlimited personal training/learning budget to cover all your career developmental needs
  • Chapters (internal communities)-share knowledge, create training material, help others grow and shape our technological future
  • Vast roster of customers/accounts, providing more opportunities for growth and development within the AA ecosystem
  • Onboarding Buddy-Continuous support from day 1! A dedicated buddy to help you navigate through the first few weeks
  • Tailored remuneration package according to your level and expertise
  • Private Health Care insurance for physical wellbeing
  • Professional helpline for our professionals and their families for mental wellbeing
  • Flexible working conditions (fully remote work according to assigned account)



By clicking "Apply" for this Job, you agree that you have read and accepted our Data Protection Statement relating to job applicants and that you provide your consent for the processing of your personal data for the purposes described therein


Desired Skills and Experience

  • CD
  • CI
  • ansible
  • apache
  • automation
  • bash
  • docker
  • git
  • jenkins
  • jira
  • kubernetes
  • puppet
  • sonar
  • tomcat

Title: European Portuguese Linguist
Skills: Communication|English|Glossaries|Linguistics|Oral Communication|Problem Solving|Quality Control|Style Guides|Translation|Work Instructions|
Job Description:
About the job

About Signal Maritime: Signal Maritime brings together shipping best practice with internet-age advanced analytics and management methods. Our services focus on high-performance, sustainable commercial management and the creation of innovative pooling models providing flexibility, transparency, enhanced commercial performance and more fairly distributed returns.

About the Role: We are looking for self-driven, well-organized, inquisitive individuals with a passion for shipping, technology and strong analytical skills to join our team in Athens for an internship of 6 months, with the possibility to extend for 18 more months (24 total). A successful internship can lead to a permanent position. With primary duties focused around data analysis, shipping operations and strategic projects, candidates need to be exceptionally courteous, positive, engaging, detail-oriented.

During this internship, you will have the opportunity to be exposed to and help with a wide variety of shipping, operations and analytics matters and be part of a team that, with data and tools, provides advanced solutions in the domain of maritime transportation.

What you will do in this role

  • Participate and assist in data quality operations
  • Analyze data and develop models related to the shipping market
  • Support Chartering and Operations teams, helping them deliver great results
  • Master the Signal Ocean Platform, provide feedback on the product team
  • Contribute in strategic projects related to the growth of the maritime business as well as internal optimisation
  • Develop the skills required to grow into operational, commercial and analytical positions


Requirements

What you bring to the team

  • An Engineering / Computer Science, Shipping or Business (BSc or MSc) background from a top School
  • Passion about shipping and technology
  • Excellent listening and communication skills
  • Proactiveness, ability to make quick decisions with attention to detail
  • Team spirit; caring about the business and appreciating collaboration with colleagues
  • Ability to adapt and perform in diversified projects and tight timelines with the guide of senior team members
  • Business understanding and problem-solving capabilities with strong analytical thinking. Able to analyze problems end-to-end and propose solutions with the guide of senior team members
  • Good knowledge of analytical and presentation tools are welcome (e.g., MS excel, MS powerpoint, google sheets, google slides, PowerBI)
  • Relevant experience in shipping is welcomed but not a prerequisite
  • Programming experience is welcome
  • Technical skills related to PowerBI, basic database setup and management will be a plus
  • Excellent command of written and spoken English


Benefits

What we offer

  • Through this paid internship, you will have the opportunity to work alongside experienced people with deep knowledge in software engineering, data science & shipping business who are always eager to mentor.
  • COVID Remote Work setup (primarily remotely, with 6 days per month in the office for connectedness/team bonding purposes). Post-COVID setup in-progress.
  • 16 weeks of onboarding training to prepare you for your new role, having the opportunity to meet about 30 trainers/leaders while diving deep into our products and/or the shipping world.
  • Career growth opportunities and a structured development discussion every 4 months
  • Unlimited free access to Udemy for Business courses
  • Fun and well-equipped work environment that includes our in-house restaurant with healthy, freshly cooked lunches every day, ping pong & billiard tables.
  • Regular team bonding events and activities.

Strict adherence to Confidentiality, Intellectual Property and Non-Compete provisions is expected.

All applications will be considered under the terms and conditions of confidentiality in accordance with the regulations of personal data protection.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. At Signal, we believe that diversity of opinions, approaches and viewpoints is key to our innovation and success and we encourage that with our hiring, development and rewards practices. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, sex, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other protected characteristics by law and take actions to eliminate those from our workplace

Title: Assistant Accountant
Skills: Accounting|Accounting Balances|Eco-friendly|Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)|Finance|Hiring|Infor Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)|Microsoft Excel|Salary|Work-Life Balance|
Job Description:
About the job

Are you passionate about changing the future of banking in Greece?


At Alpha Bank, through our large-scale Transformation Program, we are changing the way we operate, the way we deliver results and the way we service our Customers. What drives us is the need to:

  • Understand our Customers’ needs and design experiences around them.
  • Work in partnership and invite diversity of skills and perspectives.
  • Be forward-thinking and drive continuous improvement.
  • Make things happen; execute quickly and focus on what is essential.


If you are a change enthusiast who sets ambitious goals and works with a sense of purpose, you can make a difference! We are a team that loves to jointly design, test and learn and we would love to welcome you in our tribe!


Join our team and #be_part_of_tomorrow


#AlphaBank #TheAlphaBlueprint #Tomorrow


The Web Designer will be placed in the Marketing and Public Relations Division of Alpha Bank, which is responsible for the design, coordination and implementation of all marketing activities regarding the products and services of the Bank and its Subsidiaries.


In order for the jobholder to be successful in this role, he/she will need to have excellent visual design skills and to be proficient in graphic design software. He/she will have the opportunity to collaborate with a great number of Stakeholders and to participate in an amazing creative journey in order to support the implementation of the Digital Roadmap and the fulfillment of other Customers’ needs. Furthermore, he/she will support branding and will create, enhance and optimize Alpha Bank’s websites.


The ideal candidate should also work closely with our website team to ensure a proper and smooth workflow. He/she should also conceptualize and implement creative ideas for Alpha Bank websites and create user interface and visual elements that are in line not only with the Bank’s Digital Identity but also with its Purpose and Values. He/she should also have strong communication and interpersonal skills.


What you will be doing


· Conceptualize creative ideas for Alpha Bank’s digital presence.

· Draft Digital Identity and Brand guidelines.

· Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables) and ensure that they are in line with our Digital Identity and Brand.

· Establish design guidelines, standards and best practices.

· Maintain the appearance of the websites by enforcing global best practices.

· Adhere to style standards on fonts, colors, and images.

· Communicate design ideas using user flows, process flows, sitemaps and wireframes.

· Incorporate functionalities and features into websites.

· Prepare design plans and present the website structure.

· Identify and troubleshoot User Experience (UX) problems (e.g. regarding responsiveness).

· Make layout adjustments, based on user feedback.

· Be empathetic towards Users and apply accessibility requirements as a set of design constraints to build better websites.


What you need to have


· A Bachelor’s degree in Fine Arts, Graphic Design or in a relevant discipline. A Master’s degree in a related field will be considered a significant asset.

· At least three (3) years of professional experience in creative positions as a designer.

· Excellent User Experience/User Interface (UX/UI) and Customer Experience (CX) skills.

· Excellent command of the English and the Greek language (both written and spoken).

· Ability to meet deadlines and to multitask.

· Proficiency in graphic design software, including Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and other visual design tools.

· Proficiency in front-end web development programming languages, such as HTML and CSS, jQuery and JavaScript.

· Good understanding of content management systems.

· Good understanding of search engine optimization principles.

· Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues.

· Excellent visual design skills.

· Up-to-date experience with international web protocols, standards and technologies.

· Creativity and openness to new ideas.


What we offer


It’s all about our people. At Alpha Bank, you will enjoy:


· An opportunity to join the most robust financial institution in Greece with a leading role in the Greek economy and a strong presence in the community.

· A friendly and collaborative work environment that supports taking initiative and action.

· A culture that centers around learning and continuous development and encourages everyone to bring their best self to work.

· The opportunity to challenge your thinking through your participation in complex tasks and transformation projects.

· A competitive salary and benefits.

· An annual bonus scheme based on performance.


Alpha Bank offers a remote interview process and a work-from-home scheme during the implementation of the current social distancing measures.


All applications will be acknowledged and treated in utmost confidence.

Title: DevOps Engineer (All Levels)
Skills: Container Orchestration|Elastic Stack (ELK)|Google Cloud Platform (GCP)|Groovy|Infrastructure as code (IaC)|Kubernetes|NoSQL|Prometheus.io|Terraform|Training Material|
Job Description:
About the job

Novibet is looking for a Technical Global Expansion Associate to join our team in our HQ in Athens.


Novibet, founded in 2010, is an established GameTech company operating in Europe and LATAM (Greece, Brazil, Ireland, Italy, Mexico, Chile, Ecuador), through its offices in Greece & Malta. Licensed and regulated by MGA, ADM and HGC, and Irish Revenue Commissioners, Novibet is committed to delivering the best sports betting and gaming experience to an ever-expanding customer base.


Your Role


  • Document platform properties and prepare technical licensing material for new markets
  • Analyze business and technical requirements, product performance and competitive initiatives and make recommendations on actions or implications for the business
  • Develop well-formed, strategic recommendations and actively contribute to development business plans from the technical domain
  • Effectively influence up and across the technology as the subject matter expert and point person for all questions related to a project/category
  • Provide project management and cross-functional supervision for assigned initiatives, including product innovation projects by developing and executing detailed timelines for international roll-out of the in-house platform


Requirements


  • Bachelor’s Degree in Informatics / Business or Marketing required
  • MBA/Master’s Degree preferred
  • Technical writing and requirement analysis experience
  • Demonstrated project management experience
  • Demonstrated experience leading cross functional teams
  • Interpersonal skills to build strong and influential relationships across different cultures and with region teams, franchisees, and cross-functional team members
  • Proficiency in English


Benefits


Our employees are our most important asset and that's reflected in the way we treat our people! We are proud to offer a variety of benefits to support employees, including:


  • Friendly working environment
  • Opportunities to learn and grow within a dynamic, fast developing company
  • Competitive remuneration package
  • Private insurance scheme


Novibet regrets that due to the large volume of applications received, we will only consider those who solely correspond to job requirements as listed above.

All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.

Title: Shipping Intelligence Intern
Skills: Analytical Skills|Attention to Detail|Business Understanding|Communication|Computer Science|English|Forklift Operation|Problem Solving|Quality Operations|Shipping & Receiving|
Job Description:
About the job

We are Kaizen Gaming

Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.


What's in for you

As a Team Lead in one of our multidisciplinary autonomous Scrum teams, you will develop end-to-end modern applications for our high-traffic, real-time products by using state-of-the-art technologies in order to offer a unique online experience to our customers.

Equally important, you will lead your fellow software engineers by developing their skills and fostering a culture of open communication and support. Together with the Software Architect, your goal will be to improve the team’s performance, technical expertise, and delivery velocity.

Tech Stack: .NET Core, C#, Microservices, REST API, RabbitMQ, MS SQL Server, OpenShift.


What you'll bring

We are looking for an experienced Team Lead with a can-do attitude, eager to take initiative, and lead by example. You will bring your expert skills in developing and testing distributed applications with Microsoft web technologies, as well as your experience in coaching other Software Engineers to reach their full potential.


Kaizen Gaming Perks


🕑We offer both work from the office (hybrid model) & remote working options.

🏃 A buddy will support you with your onboarding.

💸Competitive salary package and bonus scheme.

👩‍⚕️ Health and life insurance for you and your family.

💰 Monthly allowance for lunch & commuting expenses.

💻Nice rigs - 2.5K monitor, latest i7, tons of RAM, fast SSD.

📚 Pluralsight, unlimited access to Udemy & continuous training for all your learning and development needs.

⭐Clear career paths & a developmental 360° feedback framework.

✈️ Relocation package and "Brain Gain" relocation bonus for Greek expats.

Title: Web Designer
Skills: Adobe Illustrator|Adobe Photoshop|Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)|Content Management|Content Management Systems (CMS)|Graphic Design|Graphic Design Software|JavaScript|User Experience (UX)|Web Design|
Job Description:
About the job

Job’s Purpose

As a SAP BI Analyst, you will be a member of business intelligence enthusiasts’ team, establishing and developing applications related with all the reporting data flows. Your primary focus will be in-depth understanding of business needs & analyzing data, to enhance data driven decisions and develop bespoke solutions.



What you will focus on

  • Manage medium to large data sized projects, providing input to support high-end results and project tracking reporting
  • Set up new analytical tools and dashboards for the assigned processes and systems, in partnership with service manager within Group IT
  • Provide data modelling or relevant expertise for assigned functional areas/systems and processes to stakeholders and leverage business KPI’s
  • Lead and participate in the design, development, testing and implement computer applications, reporting tools and ad hoc data modeling tools that support leadership reporting needs
  • Work with the Product Owner to represent the customer to the team, answer questions and ensure the most effective deployment of business analysis blueprint
  • Prioritize the requirements and backlog according to business value
  • Develop a strong understanding of business processes in Supply Chain and gain working knowledge of respective applications
  • Perform user acceptance testing and ensure best quality solutions



What you have

  • BSc in Information Technology or any other relevant field. MSc in Finance-oriented education or other relevant area would be considered an asset.
  • At least 3-4 years of working experience in SAP BI/BO (BEX Query Designer, Web Intelligence, Information Design Tool)
  • Solid understanding of financial constructs within investment banking, including, however not limited to derivatives, equity securities, fixed income, currencies and commodities
  • MS solutions literate (Office, Project, Visio)
  • Experience in Microsoft Power BI, Azure and SQL Programming language skills
  • BI for SAP accounting modules (FI, CO, PS), SAP BW and BW4HANA experience or other integrated reporting tools would be considered an asset
  • Fluency in English language, both oral & written



What you bring

  • Embrace change – Challenge own self, be courageous, unlearn.
  • Stakeholder’s management – Seek & value stakeholders’ views, relate positively with others.
  • Influence others – Build relationships – Authentic Communication
  • Togetherness –Value team’s ideas, uniqueness and safeguard belonging
  • Quality Orientation – Follow processes and business standards
  • Momentum– Be creative, take initiatives pass your energy forward.
  • Analytical Thinking – grasp information to suggest strong solutions


We care for you

  • Room to grow and develop via numerous opportunities for learning, professional development and career advancement
  • A safe and healthy workplace and a friendly environment which respects each employee’s individuality and personality



Live our values of care, teamwork, humor, integrity and courage and start your retail journey in AB!

A place where everyone belongs


We strive to be a better place to work where our associates reflect the markets we serve, where their voices are heard and valued, they find purpose in their work, and can grow and contribute to their fullest. We are an equal opportunity employer, and all applicants/employees will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by law.


#EdoToKaloEinaiGiaOlous

Certified by Diversity Charter Greece and SHARE Equality Label


All applications are treated with utmost confidentiality

Title: Technical Global Expansion Associate
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business|Cross-functional Team Leadership|English|Interpersonal Skills|Marketing|Project Management|Requirements Analysis|Technical Writing|Writing|
Job Description:
About the job

Company Description


About Netcompany - Intrasoft


We are Netcompany - Intrasoft, a leading European IT Solutions and Services Group with a strong international presence and expertise, offering innovative and added-value solutions of the highest quality to a wide range of international and national public and private organizations. More than 500 organizations in over 70 countries worldwide have chosen the company's services and solutions to fulfill their business needs.


For more information regarding our company, current projects, and openings around Europe, please consult our website: https://www.netcompany-intrasoft.com/.


Job Description


We are looking for an Internship in Application Testing in Athens, Patra, Thessaloniki


We are looking for inspired talents that will be part of highly skilled teams who will analyze the requirements and design of test scenarios, develop and prepare test data and prepare the Test Execution Statistics and Reports for EU Institutions/Products/Public Sector. You will have the opportunity to be exposed to a wide variety of services and technologies in order to develop a solid background in the field of applications development.


By working at Netcompany-Intrasoft's STSC, the largest testing center in Greece, you will join a hub of more than 100 test engineers/analysts. You will work with cutting-edge technologies delivering Test Services for challenging, large-scale projects/products.


Qualifications


If you have


  • Current student status at BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science or other relevant fields
  • Eligibility to attend an internship program through your university or academic institution


…then this position is suitable for you!


It would be also a plus if you had


  • Very good knowledge of the English language (written and oral)
  • An analytical mind with problem-solving abilities
  • Self-motivated and eager to learn new technologies
  • Excellent interpersonal and teamwork skills


By attending an internship at Netcmpany-Intrasoft, you will have the opportunity to:


  • Work with competent teams delivering challenging IT projects engage in a well structured international environment
  • Learn cutting-edge technologies
  • Establish a strong candidacy for permanent employment
  • Have the equipment for home-based work
  • Use our corporate buses to transport from and to work


Additional Information


We ensure equal opportunities, treatment, and consideration to all candidates. Discrimination based on sex, racial or ethnic origin, religion or belief, disability, age, sexual orientation or marital status, physical or mental disability, or any other factor protected by applicable laws and regulations is prohibited. At Netcompany-Intrasoft we respect human rights as part of our culture, and we focus on creating a positive workplace in which all employees are valued and where diversity and inclusivity are welcomed.


The safety and well-being of our candidates and employees remain our top priority. Please note that the recruitment process in Netcompany - Intrasoft will be conducted virtually for the upcoming months, following the Covid-19 pandemic safety measures.


Our culture


Our people are the most important element of our success. Our work life is well defined by our set of fundamental Values:


Be the link of a great team that forms a unique network across departments, countries and business units and operates with trust, open communication, transparency and respect.


We make it happen with our expertise, accountability and solution-driven attitude. We always strive for improvement, always with an eye on the big picture.


We learn & evolve by embracing a culture of building on our experiences, sharing our knowledge and developing our skills. We are always open to new ideas and invite all #NetcompanyIntrasoftPeople to contribute with theirs.


We fuel creativity in every aspect of our everyday life; in the solutions and products we design and the initiatives we undertake.


We share customer success by understanding their unique needs, corresponding to their vision, and exceeding their expectations.


#BePartOfSomethingGreat


Please submit your CV in English


All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.

Title: Senior Software Engineer - Tech Lead
Skills: .NET Core|.NET Framework|C#|Distributed Applications|Microservices|OpenShift|REST APIs|SQL|Team Leadership|
Job Description:
About the job

Περιγραφή:
Κατανοούμε τις ανάγκες των πελατών μας και εκμεταλλευόμενοι την τεχνολογία ανακαλύπτουμε μαζί νέους τρόπους για να κάνουν αυτά που αγαπούν:


Είμαστε οι πρώτοι που θα συναντήσεις σε ένα κατάστημα Vodafone και αυτοί που θα σε καθοδηγήσουν, θα σε συμβουλέψουν και θα σε βοηθήσουν να εκμεταλλευτείς στο έπακρο τη λύση που ταιριάζει σε εσένα, την οικογένειά σου ή ακόμα και την επιχείρησή σου.


Είμαστε δημιουργικοί, αεικίνητοι και ψάχνουμε καθημερινά τρόπους να γίνουμε καλύτεροι σε αυτό που κάνουμε.


Έχουμε πάθος, ώστε να οδηγούμε τις πωλήσεις σε καλύτερο επίπεδο.

Είμαστε η Ομάδα Ready της Vodafone, μια υπερομάδα και θα μας βρεις σε ένα κατάστημα Vodafone.
Αν λοιπόν:
Έχεις πάθος με την επικοινωνία με πελάτες και την παροχή φανταστικής εξυπηρέτησης.


Αναζητάς διαρκώς χρήσιμες και καινοτόμες εφαρμογές για εσένα και τους φίλους σου και μαθαίνεις πάντα πρώτος τα τελευταία τεχνολογικά νέα.


Έχεις υπομονή και έχεις την ικανότητα επικοινωνίας της τεχνολογίας με απλό και κατανοητό τρόπο τόσο στους πελάτες, όσο και τους συναδέλφους σου στο κατάστημα.


Έχεις εμπειρία στις πωλήσεις ή διάθεσή για εκμάθηση της φιλοσοφίας εξυπηρέτησης πελατών της Vodafone.


Γνωρίζεις αγγλικά.


Τότε η Ομάδα Ready σε περιμένει να γίνεις μέλος της!

Σημείωση: Αν έχεις όλα τα παραπάνω αλλά δεν έχεις πτυχίο σε υπολογιστές ή γνώσεις σε επισκευή hardware, δεν πειράζει καθώς δεν είναι απαραίτητες!

Τι προσφέρουμε:
  • Ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών
  • Bonus επίτευξης στόχων
  • Μοναδικές προσφορές σε κινητό, σταθερό και τηλεόραση

Περιοχές απασχόλησης:
Αναζητάμε ανθρώπους για το δίκτυο ιδιόκτητων καταστημάτων της Vodafone και την αλυσίδα καταστημάτων συνεργατών (franchise shops) στις παρακάτω περιοχές:

Σαλαμίνα, Καλλιθέα, Νέος Κόσμος, Μοσχάτο, Νέα Σμύρνη, Μαρούσι, Άγιος Δημήτριος, Αμπελόκηποι, Ελευσίνα, Σεπόλια, Παγκράτι, Πατήσια, Πετρούπολη, Μενίδι, Χαϊδάρι, Άνοιξη, Μεταμόρφωση, Βύρωνας, Κυψέλη, Μάρνης, Πειραιάς, Χαλάνδρι, Χολαργός, Μαρκόπουλο, Ηλιούπολη, Γέρακας, Παλλήνη, Ίλιον, Βριλήσσια, Κηφισιά, Νέα Ερυθραία, Βάρη, Γλυφάδα, Κορυδαλλός, Χαλκίδα
Επόμενα στάδια μετά την αίτησή σου:
  • Οnline αξιολόγηση σε θέματα τεχνολογίας από τον δικό σου χώρο και χρόνο
  • Προσωπική συνέντευξη
  • Εφόσον το αποτέλεσμα είναι θετικό, προχωράμε σε προσφορά εργασίας
  • Πρόσληψη

Title: SAP BI Analyst
Skills: Analytical Skills|Business Intelligence (BI)|Microsoft Azure|Microsoft Power BI|SAP BI|SAP Business Warehouse (SAP BW)|SAP Products|SQL|Visio|Web Intelligence|
Job Description:
About the job

Job Description & Summary

At PwC we help our clients to make informed decisions and operate effectively within them. We serve clients and communities around the world, working to achieve our Purpose: to build trust in society and solve important problems.

We are a Global Partner of SAP with more than 14,000 SAP professionals in 61 countries, assisting organizations to get value from technology investments and bring together the skills to deliver improvements in people, processes, and technology. We combine strategy, technology and management consulting expertise to deliver tangible, measurable, human centered change.

Due to the continued growth of our practice, we are now recruiting a Senior SAP FI/CO Professional to join our firm.

The role entails
  • Advise our clients on the technical and functional implementation of SAP
  • Design of business processes with the use of SAP’s best practices.
  • Contribute actively in business development activities; participate in the RFP process; preparing the necessary documentation.
  • Coach others, recognise their strengths, and encourage them to take ownership of their personal development.

The successful candidate should have
  • University degree and preferably postgraduate studies in Computer Science, Business Administration, Information Systems or other relevant fields.
  • At least 2 years of experience in SAP projects or support for junior positions
  • Conduct business needs analysis and identify key business challenges
  • Relevant professional certifications in SAP FI or CO modules will be considered an asset
  • Strong presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills
  • Fluent in English, both written and verbal

What’s in it for you

PwC is all about people, encouraging high performance and quality. At PwC, you will have:
  • Continuous training and career development opportunities whilst learning from a wide range of top professionals.
  • The chance to handle different projects for big clients.
  • Access to a global network of firms and global mobility opportunities.
  • Life and medical plan, rewards and recognition schemes, flexible working program, mobile phone etc.

Who we are

PwC in Greece is the largest professional services firm in the country, with premises in Athens and Thessaloniki , Patras & Ioannina and approximately 1900 employees. More than 250,000 people in 156 countries across our network share their thinking, experience and solutions to develop fresh perspectives and practical advice. This enables us to provide top-quality industry-focused assurance, tax and advisory services to our clients.

All applicants will be acknowledged and treated in the strictest confidence.

Title: Internship in Application Testing
Skills: Analytical Skills|Application Testing|Computer Science|English|Financial Instruments|Manual Testing|Scenario Testing|Software Testing|Test Data|Test Execution|
Job Description:
About the job

Senior Project Development Manager – Greece – €Excellent + Bonus + Career Prospects


Are you able to develop a Utility Scale PV or Wind pipeline? Can you deliver a pipeline through the permitting process? Are you looking for a pathway to Managing Director? If so, please read on…


The Company

A leading international developer and IPP of Utility Scale Renewable energy projects. Due to the company significantly investing into International markets, and have been successful in securing a large pipeline in Greece this has created the opportunity for a Senior Project Development Manager, to lead the development and permitting of a pipeline of utility scale Solar PV, Wind (Onshore/ Off-shore) and Energy Storage projects within Greece.


The Role

As Senior Project Development Manager you will lead Project Development and business development activities on upstream and downstream development activities some of the duties will be to:

  • Develop a pipeline of projects for Utility Scale renewables through business development, origination, greenfield development and acquisition through feasibility, permitting to ready to build stage
  • Lead and coordinate internal team and external consultants for future success.
  • Lead relationships for co-development and partnership agreements
  • Lead & establish relationships with landowners, municipals, project developers and financial institutions across region
  • Follow project from land identification, development, permitting, through to contract closure.
  • Take a leading role in technical and commercial negotiations.
  • Report financial results to Global management


The Person

The successful candidate will likely have:

  • Bachelors Degree in Engineering, Economics, Environmental, Law or Renewable Energy
  • 3+ years experience in Utility solar PV/Wind project development and business development, project acquisition, origination and obtaining Grid interconnection agreements for Utility scale project permitting.
  • Proven abilities to develop project pipeline in Greece and network of landowners
  • A strong commercial knowledge risk management and contractual negotiations, PPA are advantageous
  • Be able to solve complex problems, Engage, Lead, motivate and inspire teams to success
  • Speak Greek, English


Due to the dynamic growth and accelerated build of a regional organisation your progression opportunities will be limited only by your desire to succeed as there is a real pathway to take on Country Manager Greece role in 3 years.


If you are looking for a broad and challenging role with prospects to match, make your application without delay.


For more information and a confidential career discussion please contact:


Isabella Monteiro

Senior Recruitment Consultant

Hunter Philips

Global Executive Search

Mobile: +44 7585 844 606

Email: isabella.monteiro@hunterphilips.com

Web: http://hunterphilips.com/

Title: Eιδικός τεχνολογίας #ομάδαReady (Αττική, Βοιωτία, Εύβοια, Φθιώτιδα)
Job Description:
About the job

SOFTWARE INTEGRATION ENGINEER



Η εταιρεία Impact από το 1998 αποτελεί μια από τις πιο καινοτόμες εταιρίες στην ανάπτυξη πρωτοποριακών Internet εφαρμογών με συνεχή ανάπτυξη τόσο στην Ελλάδα όσο και στο εξωτερικό. Η εταιρία στεγάζεται σε ένα μοντέρνο φιλικό περιβάλλον, όπου το τεχνικό τμήμα αποτελεί βασικό δομικό μέρος των λειτουργιών της. Στο πλαίσιο αυτό αναζητούμε υποψήφιο ενθουσιώδη με την επικοινωνία αλλά και την τεχνολογία, που θέλει να ενταχθεί σε μια δυναμική τεχνική ομάδα ανάπτυξης υπηρεσιών διασύνδεσης επιχειρηματικών διαδικασιών (integration services).

Κύριες αρμοδιότητες

  • Μέλος της ομάδας ανάλυσης, ανάπτυξης, παραμετροποίησης και υποστήριξης καινοτόμων εφαρμογών και υπηρεσιών ηλεκτρονικής ανταλλαγής παραστατικών και γενικότερα διασύνδεσης επιχειρηματικών διαδικασιών.
  • Παροχή υπηρεσιών υποστήριξης και αντιμετώπισης προβλημάτων σε πελάτες μέσω τηλεφώνου ή email ή απομακρυσμένης πρόσβασης

Απαραίτητα προσόντα

  • Πτυχίο AEI/TEI/IEK στην πληροφορική ή σε συναφές αντικείμενο.
  • Ελάχιστη προηγούμενη εμπειρία 3 ετών σε αντίστοιχη θέση
  • Άριστη κατανόηση σε MS SQL Server , TSQL
  • Άριστη γραπτή και προφορική επικοινωνία στην Ελληνική και Αγγλική Γλώσσα
  • Εκπληρωμένες στρατιωτικές υποχρεώσεις (για τους άνδρες υποψηφίους)

Προσωπικά χαρακτηριστικά

  • Καλή επικοινωνία με εταιρικούς πελάτες και αποθέματα υπομονής/επιμονής
  • Πνεύμα ομαδικότητας και διάθεση για εποικοδομητικής συνεργασίας με τα υπόλοιπα μέλη της ομάδας
  • Γρήγορη και ουσιαστική κατανόηση νέων τεχνολογιών
  • Ικανότητα διάγνωσης, ανάλυσης και επίλυσης προβλημάτων
  • Οργανωτική συμπεριφορά, συνδυαστική γνώση, μεθοδικότητα και συνέπεια

Τα οφέλη σου:

  • Ανταγωνιστικός μισθός
  • Ιδιωτική, ομαδική ασφάλιση υγείας και συνταξιοδοτικό πρόγραμμα
  • Υβριδικό μοντέλο εργασίας
  • Bonus παραγωγικότητας
  • Παροχή υπηρεσιών Catering
  • Συνεχής στήριξη από έμπειρους επαγγελματίες σε άριστο περιβάλλον εργασίας
  • Επιδοτούμενες ευκαιρίες εκπαίδευσης και προοπτικές εξέλιξης
  • Γραμμή ψυχολογικής και διατροφικής υποστήριξης

Title: Senior SAP FI/CO Professional
Skills: Business Process|Business Process Design|Business Requirements|Presentations|SAP Controlling (CO)|SAP FI|SAP FICO|SAP Products|SAP Projects|Statutory Accounting Principles (SAP)|
Job Description:
About the job

Company Description


We are Netcompany - Intrasoft, a leading European IT Solutions and Services Group with a strong international presence and expertise, offering innovative and added-value solutions of the highest quality to a wide range of international and national public and private organizations. More than 500 organizations in over 70 countries worldwide have chosen the company's services and solutions to fulfill their business needs.


For more information regarding our company, current projects, and openings around Europe, please consult our website: https://www.netcompany-intrasoft.com


Job Description


A day in the life of a Software Engineer in Test


As a Software Engineer in Test, you will be a part of a vibrant team who design, develop, deploy, customize and support technologies for large-scale software applications of EU institutions / Products / Public Sector. You will have the opportunity to be exposed to a wide variety of services and technologies in order to develop a solid background in the field of applications development.


Your everyday life will mainly consist of working for one of the most important phases of the S/W development lifecycle.


Your main duties will be:


  • Understand the business logic for the system under test
  • Familiarize with the architecture of the system under test
  • Analyze the tests to be automated and identify the most appropriate test automation methodology/technology
  • Implement and maintain test automation scripts/frameworks
  • Participate in PoC for evaluation of various tools, frameworks, methodologies
  • Participate in the building of a CI pipeline
  • Automate tests for any of the following test types (functional, performance, usability, compatibility, cross-browser, component)
  • Analysis of test results for troubleshooting, qualitative and quantitative analysis


Qualifications


If you have


  • Degree in Information Technology or another relevant field
  • Experience in Software Testing including expertise in writing Test scripts for Functional, Regression and Performance tests
  • Experience in various tools/frameworks such as Selenium, SoapUI, JMeter
  • Work experience in the creation of Test Cases, Test Scripts, Test Reports and participation in Test Cycles
  • Complete understanding of the Agile Software Development methodologies
  • Excellent command of the English language (written & oral)


…then this position is suitable for you!


It would also be a plus if you had


  • Knowledge in WebServices (SOAP & RESTful), Cucumber, Serenity, TestNG, JUnit, Mockito, REST Assured API and Jira, Jira XRay, Javascript, Typescript, Microservice Architectures, Kafka, Arquillian and Spring Boot are considered a plus
  • Work experience in Java, .Net, Groovy, SQL, XML


This position comes with


  • Competitive compensation packages
  • Continuous learning (with the most modern methods - unlimited access to Udemy for Business, STSC internal trainings), and fast career growth
  • Interesting and challenging tasks within large-scale projects
  • An international dynamic within a fast-paced working environment
  • The opportunity to work in a diverse environment with talented colleagues


Additional Information


We ensure equal opportunities, treatment, and consideration to all candidates. Discrimination based on sex, racial or ethnic origin, religion or belief, disability, age, sexual orientation or marital status, physical or mental disability, or any other factor protected by applicable laws and regulations is prohibited. At Netcompany-Intrasoft we respect human rights as part of our culture, and we focus on creating a positive workplace in which all employees are valued and where diversity and inclusivity are welcomed.


The safety and well-being of our employees remain our top priority. Please note that Netcompany-Intrasoft’s recruitment process is being conducted virtually due to preventive measures against the Covid-19 pandemic.


Our culture


Our people are the most important element of our success. Our work life is well defined by our set of fundamental Values: https://bit.ly/3SSbBzU


#BePartOfSomethingGreat!


  • Please submit your CV in English


All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.

Title: Software Integration Engineer, IMPACT a SOFTONE company
Skills: Software Integration|Systems Engineering|
Job Description:
About the job

We are looking for a Quality Assurance Software Engineer to join our Swordfish team!

About Swordfish

Swordfish is a microservices-oriented application hosted on Azure. The following technologies are utilized: Angular, .NET Core, Java (Spring Framework), MongoDB, Neo4J, MySQL, Camunda (BPMN workflow engine).


Description

The Quality Assurance Software Engineer will work as a member of the SWORDFISH team. S/he will be responsible for developing and running test cases according to the specifications of the development team, executing software performance tests, and developing and running scripts for automated testing. At least 2-years of QA experience on a live product with real-world users, test automation of web applications, and excellent communication and analytical skills is expected.


Key Responsibilities

  • Provides guidance and subject matter expertise to engineers on testing and Quality Assurance (QA) methodologies and processes
  • Works with engineers to drive improvements in code quality via manual and automated testing
  • Responsible for managing the definition, implementation, and integration of quality principles into the design and development of software and IT processes
  • Involved in the review of requirements specifications for weaknesses in function, performance, reliability, scalability, testability, usability, and security and compliance testing, and provides recommendations
  • Plans and defines testing approach, providing advice on prioritization of testing activity in support of identified risks in project schedules or test scenarios
  • Develops test plans, testing resource requirements, and overall scheduling of testing activity
  • Responsible for developing manual and automated test cases and configurations needed to meet testing of business requirements
  • Executes test cases/scripts to ensure delivery of quality software applications
  • Monitors and tracks resolution of defects, coordinating with engineers in order to prevent, report, and resolve
  • Designs, monitors, and analyzes quality assurance metrics such as defect, defect counts, test results, and test status
  • Identifies opportunities to adopt innovative technologies


Required Skills and Qualifications

  • 2+ years of experience in IT, with an emphasis on QA, and proven ability in writing test cases, running functional, automated, or performance tests, and managing defects
  • Working knowledge of commonly used concepts and practices in QA discipline (constructing test plans and test cases, report evaluation metrics effectively)
  • Excellent knowledge of test automation of web applications
  • In-depth experience with functional testing
  • Experience in test tracking tools (Selenium / JMeter)
  • Experience in TestRail or similar bug tracking tools
  • Experience with applications with microservices architecture
  • Experience working in an Agile Development environment
  • Good knowledge of API and Database testing
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Good communication skills, team spirit and self-motivation
  • Fluency in written & spoken English


Nice to have

  • Working knowledge of Azure or any other cloud computing platform
  • Experience with applications built on top of a workflow engine


Benefits

  • Dynamic and respectful environment – our people are the core of our business, we value each and every individual and support initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.
  • Continuous coaching – work with passionate people and receive both theoretical as well as hands-on training
  • Career development. Expand your career internationally and work alongside knowledgeable people from diverse cultures and backgrounds
  • A competitive compensation package dependent upon your experience and qualifications. We’re focused on rewarding efforts. Our salaries and benefits package will keep you motivated throughout your career

Job Description:
About the job

Empiria Group is seeking to hire for its Headquarters:

Human Resources Coordinator

About us:

Empiria Group, owns, manages, and operates a unique collection of luxury hotels & villas, members of The Luxury Collection & Design Hotels of Marriott International, located in prime destinations around Greece, namely in Santorini, Paros & Peloponnese.

For over 30 years and through a team that exceeds 300 associates, we create unique hospitality experiences delivered through our hallmark personalized services, with an attention to detail our customers deserve and appreciate.

At Empiria Group we aim to redefine destinations as the leading luxury hospitality brand of Greece, led by the most caring and positive associates.

About the role:

The Human Resources Coordinator will provide administrative support to the Human Resources department and assist with a wide range of Human Resources related tasks, including recruitment, onboarding, benefits administration, and employee record-keeping.

Requirements

Key accountabilities:
  • Reports to Human Resources Executive
  • Assists with recruitment efforts, including posting job openings, screening resumes, scheduling interviews, and communicating with candidates
  • Coordinates new employee onboarding, including preparing paperwork, conducting orientation sessions, and ensuring compliance with legal requirements
  • Manages employee benefits programs
  • Maintains accurate and up-to-date employee records, including personal information, job details, and performance evaluations
  • Assists with the coordination of employee training and development programs
  • Assists with the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures that align with the organization's goals and values
  • Provides support to employees with Human Resources related questions and concerns
  • Performs other HR related tasks as assigned

Skills & expertise:
  • Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration or related field
  • At least 2 years experience in Human Resources coordination or related role preferably in hospitality sector
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office and HRIS systems
  • Fluency in English, an extra language will be an asset

Candidate’s Profile:
  • Creative, innovative, proactive, and resourceful
  • Excellent organizational skills and ability to meet deadlines
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Strong team player & result-oriented
  • Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment
  • Positive attitude

Benefits

Empiria Group’s difference:
  • Competitive remuneration package & benefits
  • Ongoing training
  • Career prospects on a transparent & collaborative working environment

Great Opportunities for career development within the company or other hotel members of Marriott International

You provide the talent as we flourish the skills to unleash your full career potential.

Join our path of excellence!

Title: Quality Assurance Software Engineer
Skills: Analytical Skills|Database Testing|English|JMeter|Microsoft Azure|Quality Assurance|Spoken English|Test Planning|TestRail|Web Applications|
Job Description:
About the job

Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.


Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people’s lives by building cutting-edge technologies.


We are seeking a User Experience Designer to join our Product team! In this role, you will participate in every step of product development, from brainstorming to ensuring design quality to release. Using your comprehensive product thinking, vision and interaction skills, you will own the experience for our product


As a Senior User Experience Designer at Intelligencia, you will need to approach problems holistically and create elegantly simple solutions to multi-faceted problems. The ideal candidate is passionate about high quality solutions, is able to articulate design rationale to multiple stakeholders and can work in a fast pace, dynamic environment.


Join us if you are excited to


  • Infuse the team with the habit of identifying user needs and mapping user flows
  • Work with the team to enhance Intelligencia’s design process across discovery and implementation
  • Help the team to craft an end-to-end user experience that includes online and offline touchpoints, with a user-centered approach
  • Create a practice of drawing inspiration from the outside world and weaving it in the Intelligencia world (competitor analysis, design best practices and standards)
  • Help the product management and design team to use a variety of user feedback methods at a B2B setting i.e. user interviews, surveys and usability tests to iterate and support design decisions
  • Mentor other designers in developing their skills, communicating the user experience at various stages of the design process and advocating for users’ needs
  • Help design team to finalize Intelligencia’s design system leveraging own design expertise
  • Advocate for users’ needs and the prioritization of design-centered changes


What You’ll Bring To The Team


  • 7+ years of design experience
  • 5+ years of product design experience and a diverse portfolio demonstrating modern UI and exceptional user centric product experiences
  • Experience in end-to-end UX that includes online and offline touchpoints, with a user-centered approach
  • Demonstrable experience in building out the user experience and designs of tech products end-to-end
  • Experience in coaching designers
  • Experience initiating and leading creative ideation sessions with multiple stakeholders.
  • Experience collaborating with Designers, Product Managers, and Engineers across teams in a large technical organization.
  • Experience in solving highly complex and ambiguous problems without ample access to customers
  • Ability to communicate complex interaction concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization
  • Excellent presentation and communication skills


What Is Nice To Have


  • Experience with data heavy products
  • Experience in user research in B2B environment


What's in it for you


  • A competitive salary
  • Private Health Insurance
  • Ability to participate in Intelligencia’s equity compensation plan/ future success of the company
  • Career Development Stipend
  • A great opportunity to grow and work with some of the most exceptional minds in the industry
  • Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals, autonomy, and mentoring, which creates unparalleled opportunities both for you and the team
  • You will be part of a mission to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to drug development


As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, Intelligencia is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, color, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

Title: Full Stack Developer
Skills: Back-End Web Development|Computer Engineering|Computer Science|Databases|Full-Stack Development|Product Offerings|SQLyog|Server Management|Stack|TypeScript|
Job Description:
About the job

This position is open in the following countries:

Croatia

Greece

Hungary

Slovakia

We are hiring junior, middle and senior professionals


Do you want work in one of the best SW engineering teams in the tech industry?

If yes, join us at TDI. We are part of Deutsche Telekom and we shape the future of telecommunication, we provide the full lifecycle of telco products from engineering to operation, we provide the infrastructure from networking to orchestration.


Our Software Engineers work in agile teams along with colleagues from different disciplines and countries on products and services widely related to the telco industry, such as customized IT and NT software solutions, cloud and networking, automation and optimization to archive our main goal: best-in-class delivery to Deutsche Telekom’s operators in different countries and thereby win our customers’ hearts!


As learning and growing is essential, we are a chapter-based organization with a clear focus on our people and their satisfaction and development, part of our job is to learn and teach, to find new approaches and to deal with latest technologies.


… and by the way: we are a damn cool team with lots of spirit!



Job description and responsibilities


  • We are a highly talented, international team of Software Engineers acroos Europe who design, develop, test, and deploy well-architected software solutions that are reliable, secure, high-performing, scalable, maintainable and evolvable.
  • You will work as a software engineer across the full development stack for our products and services, building a modern development practice using CI/CD pipelines in a DevOps model.
  • Clarification of requirements and development of concepts for relevant software development activities is part of your job.
  • You will be enganged in several topics like driving forward our cloud portal, support the hyperscaler approach, improve the automation of mobile device and network testing or further new, challenging projects.
  • Supporting the team by continiously developing your own skills and those of your colleagues is part of your daily tasks
  • Further tasks are the creation and maintenance of software documentation and technical support of projects until the launch.



Professional skills Education

  • University degree in Computer Science, Telecommunication Engineering, Information Systems or similar qualification
  • ≥3 years proven experience in SW development
  • Deep knowledge in programming languages like Java, Python, Rust and/or Javascript; also experience with frameworks like Spring, React are preferred
  • Knowledge in IP technology and operation system (LINUX)
  • Experience with automation, testautomation and/or setting up deployment pipelines
  • Fluent language skills in English (oral and written)
  • Don’t worry if you might miss one of the skills – we are here to grow and develop our employees.


Social skills


  • A mindset of continuous learning, willingness to share knowledge and learn from others
  • Ability to innovate and find solutions to complex problems
  • Being a strong individual contributor and an empathic team player
  • Ability to communicate effectively with different stakeholders in the company


What can you expect working with us?


  • Our team is dedicated to supporting new team members and we’re building an environment that appreciates knowledge sharing and mentorship. Our experienced team members are passionate about mentoring junior and new members of the team.
  • We take a long-term commitment when it comes to our employees. You will develop your career working in truely innovative projects of Deutsche Telekom Group, exploring the latest trends and technologies which enable the product development process.
  • We offer open and friendly working environment, competitive remuneration package and attractive benefit scheme.



Learn more about us: Clemens & Torsten

https://www.linkedin.com/in/torsten-kaubisch-bbb6324

https://www.linkedin.com/in/clemens-loos-77b327244/



Data Privacy Information and Consent with Processing of Personal Data

Please be informed that by replying to the job offer, the company Deutsche Telekom Cloud Services s.r.o. with its registered seat at Ružová dolina 6, 821 08 Bratislava, Slovakia, ID no. (IČO): 48 129 178 (the “Company”) will process your personal data in the following scope: academic title, name, surname, photography, contact details (e-mail address, address, phone number), information about achieved education, previous working experience, other information that are included in your CV/motivation letter, information obtained during the online assessment, and so for the purpose of participation in a selection process for the job position that you are applying for.


Your personal data will be processed for the period of 6 months. Legal basis for processing of your personal data is the legitimate interest of the Company under art. 6(1)(f) of GDPR to select the right candidate for the vacant position from all job applicants. Please note that processing of personal data is prerequisite for participation in selection process. If you do not provide us with your data, you cannot participate in the selection process for concrete job position. Your personal data will not be subject to automated decision making and profiling.

Title: Senior User Experience Designer - Mentor
Skills: Creative Ideation|Human Computer Interaction|Presentations|Product Design|Usability|User Experience (UX)|User Flows|User Interface Design|User Interviews|User Research|
Job Description:
About the job

At Thermo Fisher Scientific, you’ll discover meaningful work that makes a positive impact on a global scale. Join our colleagues in bringing our Mission to life - enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. We provide our teams with the resources needed to achieve individual career goals while taking science a step beyond through research, development and delivery of life-changing therapies. With clinical trials conducted in 100+ countries and ongoing development of novel frameworks for clinical research through our PPD clinical research portfolio, our work spans laboratory, digital and decentralized clinical trial services. Your determination to deliver quality and accuracy will improve health outcomes that people and communities depend on - now and in the future.


Western European countries


Discover Impactful Work:


The Medical Director will provide medical support and medical advice for clinical trials and safety evaluation within the PPD Pharmacovigilance department.


A day in the Life:


  • Provide medical leadership to the study teams, including creating clinical trial protocols while implementing the latest scientific information, contribute to site selection, involved in review and approval of study protocols and amendments, Clinical Study Reports (CSRs), Informed Consent Forms (ICFs), Case Report Forms (CRFs), protocol deviation decisions and other clinical documents as required for the conduct of clinical trials
  • Real time Medical Monitoring of clinical studies: ensure medical validity of each individual primary endpoint as well study subject safety, while ensuring medical issues are identified early. Pro-active customer concern and correction of issues in consultation with the Global Medical Indication Lead
  • During initial review of protocol, consults with internal groups and support staff regarding procedural and budgetary items and the necessity for change due to any subsequent protocol amendments. Acquires other functions’ dedication to close gaps and address issues timely and effectively. Serves as chief liaison between sponsor and all PPD internal departments performing the required tasks during all study phases. Educates Investigator sites by delivering a protocol specific lab procedures presentation and demonstration during an investigator meeting. Controls, handles and follows day to day activities during the course of the clinical trial to resolve any issues and answer queries
  • Medical point of contact for all internal and external stakeholders: Interact with the investigators as needed, answer questions of IRBs and Health Authorities, prepare and present material to the study executive and independent safety committee if applicable; medical training of site staff at Investigator meetings; CRA training in new indications
  • Ensure study compliance for all medical aspects by understanding and applying all relevant SOPs and GCP
  • Closely collaborate with the cross functional study team members in order for medical risks, issues, and results to be clear to all involved parties


Education


  • MD, MB/BS or equivalent degree and strong medical knowledge, shown clinical experience running Endocrinology patients in hospital practice


Knowledge, Skills, Abilities


  • Significant experience within pharmaceutical industry, clinical trials and pharmaceutical medicine is critically important
  • Is fluent in spoken and written English
  • Shown understanding and experience with NDA submission process.
  • Shown understanding of regulatory guidelines for adverse event reporting
  • Strong communication & presentation skills and is a strong teammate


Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Watch as our colleagues explain 5 reasons to work with us. As one team of 100,000+ colleagues, we share a common set of values - Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement - working together to accelerate research, solve complex scientific challenges, drive technological innovation and support patients in need. #StartYourStory with PPD, part of Thermo Fisher Scientific, where diverse experiences, backgrounds and perspectives are valued.


Apply today! http://jobs.thermofisher.com


Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.


Accessibility/Disability Access


Job Seekers with a Disability: Thermo Fisher Scientific offers accessibility service for job seekers requiring accommodations in the job application process. For example, this may include individuals requiring assistance because of hearing, vision, mobility, or cognitive impairments. If you are a job seeker with a disability, or assisting a person with a disability, and require accessibility assistance or an accommodation to apply for one of our jobs, please submit a request by telephone at 1-855-471-2255*. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.


  • This telephone line is reserved solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes, such as not being able to get into the career website, following up on an application, or other non-disability related technical issues will not receive a response.

Title: Software Engineer in Athens, Bratislava, Budapest & Zagreb
Skills: Computer Science|English|Java|JavaScript|Professional Skills|Programming|Programming Languages|Python (Programming Language)|React.js|Rust (Programming Language)|
Job Description:
About the job

We are Kaizen Gaming


Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.


The Opportunity

Principal Backend Engineers hold a central role in the Technology department. They are expected to help teams devise elegant and performant solutions in response to real business problems, guide them in designing and implementing these solutions in code, as well as teach coding, testing, debugging, and performance analysis techniques, while also carrying out code reviews. Will frequently attend teams' scrum events (esp. refinements) and help teams' product owners shape a better understanding of the technical challenges involved. Production problems are usually escalated to Principal Engineer for triaging before landing in a team's backlog. Principal Engineers should also stay up to date on the latest technologies and drive their adoption.


Culture

Principal Backend Engineers across tribes cooperate with each other, aligning frequently among themselves and helping each other from designing new systems to filling in gaps in their business knowledge and everything in between. We strongly believe in coaching and being proactive. Principal Engineers will pair program with members of their teams, offering hands-on advice and addressing problems much sooner than code review time. We are proud of building an experienced and talented Principal Engineers team that everybody will be eager to join. But at the same time, we would like to make sure we engage kind and friendly personalities with leadership qualities, who can foster trust and personal growth among their peers.


Organization

At Kaizen, we operate in verticals, which represent the connection with our customers and the way that we are creating sustainable growth and seamless entertainment experiences. Each vertical (Sportsbook, Gaming, Account & Services, Rewards & Comms), as well as our core technology lines (Platform and International Expansion), consists of Technology and Product teams. Our Technology department is organized across tribes with each tribe focusing on a particular aspect of the business. Each tribe is led by their tribe-leader, who reports to the Vertical Director. Tribes are composed of teams and an architect may lead one or more of them. Principal Engineers, depending on the tribe, can report to Technology Managers or Tribe Leaders.


Tech stack

Our tech stack consists of many services and applications written in C#/.NET (both full framework and Core) for the backend stuff. We use jQuery/Knockout.js for some of the older apps and Angular or Vue.js for the newer frontend stuff. We use MSSQL server and PostgreSQL for most of our storage needs interspersed with Redis and ElasticSearch, whenever it makes sense to do so. RabbitMQ is the message broker ubiquitously used in our systems and we deploy using a mixture of regular good old VMs and Docker containers on our on-prem Openshift installation. We're using git and Gitlab for version control and our CI/CD pipeline.


Requirements

Must have:

  • 7+ years of working as a software engineer at least some of which for high traffic websites;
  • Current and up-to-date software engineering skills;
  • Good people skills;
  • Team player; analytical thinker and problem solver; ability to self-organize;
  • Fast learner- you will need to get up to speed on business, people and teams, infrastructure and the technologies used as quickly as possible.

Nice to have:

  • Experience in coding in C#;
  • Familiarity with functional programming, distributed architectures and eventually consistent systems.


Kaizen Gaming Perks

🕑We offer both work from the office (hybrid model) & remote working options.

🏃 A buddy will support you with your onboarding.

💸Competitive salary package and bonus scheme.

👩‍⚕️ Health and life insurance for you and your family.

💰 Monthly allowance for lunch & commuting expenses.

💻Nice rigs - 2.5K monitor, latest i7, tons of RAM, fast SSD.

📚 Pluralsight, LinkedIn learning accounts & continuous training.

⭐Clear career paths & a developmental 360° feedback framework.

✈️ Relocation package and "Brain Gain" relocation bonus for Greek expats

Title: Sales Advisor
Skills: Client Relations|Commerce|Customer Satisfaction|Menswear|Problem Solving|
Job Description:
About the job

Customer Advisor with Spanish and English for Airbnb


Why join us

Are you passionate about hospitality and have a natural drive to support people? Then join our fun-loving, multicultural team of #GameChangers at Webhelp Greece and use your communications skills in Spanish. We are bringing Customer Advisors on board for our client Airbnb.


You will learn fascinating insights into the hospitality industry while building a long-term career and developing your skills. No two days will be the same as you’ll provide valuable and memorable experiences to a wide range of customers.



What you’ll be doing at Webhelp:

  • Manage inbound calls and messages
  • Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
  • Build sustainable relationships of trust through open and interactive communication
  • Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the right methods/tools
  • Meet personal/customer service team targets and call handling quotas
  • Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts and file documents
  • Follow communication procedures, guidelines, and policies



What we’re looking for:

  • Proven customer support experience or experience as a client service representative
  • Native / near-native in Spanish language and at least C1 level of English language
  • Good MS Office skills
  • Strong oral and written contact handling skills and active listening
  • Customer orientation and ability to adapt/respond to different types of characters
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills
  • Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively
  • Passionate about hospitality sector



The Company offers:

  • Competitive remuneration package
  • Performance bonus
  • Indefinite term contract
  • Private life & medical Insurance (including eyecare & dental care)
  • Monthly meal allowance (prepaid Mastercard)
  • Opportunities for international Career development through Webhelp International Mobility program
  • Relocation package (including Welcome Bonus) and administrative support when required (tax, social security registration, bank account opening, etc)



Webhelp is a global organization headquartered in France with more than 100,000 employees. We focus on creating superb customer experiences and developing business solutions adapted to each company.


We are a fun-loving community who thrive on making a difference on behalf of the world’s most exciting brands. Being a people-first company is based on our strong belief that when you put people at the heart, everything comes alive

Title: Principal Backend Engineer
Skills: Angular|Back-End Web Development|C#|Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)|Distributed Systems|Functional Programming|Microsoft SQL Server|Software Development|Version Control|
Job Description:
About the job

Purpose of Role

To provide strong and effective leadership & management of Health and Safety at the 3 Sites of the Greek Cluster with additional responsibilities in Sustainability, Environment, and Risk.

Ensure HSSER is fully integrated into all business processes and further develop the existing positive Site HSSER culture. Ensure HSSER compliance with the law, relevant regulations, and all DS Smith Standards, including the Management Safety Standard.

Develop and maintain contacts with relevant regulatory and industry organizations and actively participate in meetings and initiatives with them.

To be a key point of contact for resources (including 3rd party contractors) working on behalf of the country on Risk, Environmental and Sustainability issues.

Location

The candidate's location could be from everywhere in Greece as the role requires frequent travel to all of our 3 Sites (Corinth, Thessaloniki, Ierapetra).

Reports

This position reports directly to the GM

Key Accountabilities & Responsibilities

Health and Safety (H&S) Standards - Control & Governance-Policies & Procedures

  • Facilitate and support the management of H&S across all site functions to ensure that working practices are both safe and to relevant H&S standards (e.g. Group Managing Safety & Group / Division Minimum H&S Standards, legal, regulatory accreditation, and quality standards).
  • Review, develop & implement relevant and effective H&S Policies, Procedures & Standards to ensure that they are legally compliant and meet Divisional / Group Standards & Policies.
  • Responsible with all other Managers, for achieving the targeted improvements in HS including reductions in accidents/incidents, improvements in near miss / observational safety reporting, increase in audit scores, and improvements in relevant employee survey scores.
  • Ensure that the site fulfils its legal obligations for H&S reporting & auditing (on behalf of leadership who are accountable for H&S)
  • (Any additional sustainability environment and risk obligations also need to be fulfilled)

Management Information and Reporting

  • Ensuring Site HSSER performance is effectively controlled, monitored, analyzed, and audited and feedback to relevant Site, Regional, Divisional & Group personnel and assist in developing and implementing appropriate preventative and corrective actions.
  • Development of HSSER management documentation & information for all
  • personnel.
  • Communicate effectively and in a timely manner, the HSSER performance across Site Region, Division, Group, and regulatory bodies. · Develop and improve data integrity for all H&S management information.

H&S Development

  • Develop & implement effective site HSSER management systems, processes and practices that support and deliver business and HSSER goals.
  • Develop and maintain contacts with relevant HSSER regulatory and industry organisations and actively participate in meetings and initiatives with them.
  • Develop and implement effective HSSER training needs analysis and program.

Sustainability and Risk

  • To be a key initial point of contact on-site for any risk and sustainability activities (As these areas develop, specific roles may be identified in the future)
  • To oversee the execution of any relevant risk-based projects on-site as identified by insurers (FM Global)
  • To oversee any required accreditation activities (e.g. ISO 50001, OHSAS 18001) as relevant to the Site.

Division / Region / Group

Site contact for developing and leading any Divisional / Regional / Group HSSER initiatives at Site.

Leadership & Communication

  • Leads by example, setting the standard of conduct required for excellent HSSER leadership.
  • Communicates effectively with leaders and employees alike, spending significant time in the site factory having HSSER conversations.

General

  • Assist with any HSSER matters, developments, investigations and initiatives as and when required
  • Support and advises the Senior Management Team (SMT) as required.
  • Participate as required in any future strategic development projects/opportunities.
  • To be a key point of contact for resources (including 3rd party contractors) working on behalf of the country on Environmental and Sustainability issues.
  • To help with identifying and participating in locally supported environment and sustainability development programs and funding schemes.

Core Competencies

  • Experienced and robust Health and Safety professional with strong leadership skills able to make a positive impact within a challenging & dynamic working environment.
  • Experience of maintaining, developing and implementing HSSER Policies, Procedures and Standards, in a dynamic environment, to ensure compliance with the law and relevant regulations.
  • Ability to build strong relationships with site personnel and possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Experience and ability to take on responsibilities for matters of Sustainability, Environment and Risk
  • Effective planning & organisational skills.
  • Provide HSSER leadership within a collaborative team working environment - able to clearly interpret & explain complex HSSER issues (including behavioural safety), influence decisions and make things happen.
  • Relevant experience in the Paper / Packaging / FMCG industry.
  • Fully IT literate.
  • Confidence to challenge personnel when appropriate.
  • Lead and undertake any required HSSER investigations and report, in a professional and timely manner, to relevant Site personnel and / or external organisations.
  • Experience of collaboration and communication with external regulatory bodies or organisations.
  • Experience of designing, implementing and conducting HSSER audit programmes.

About the job

On behalf of our client, a growing digital Product Design studio, based in Thessaloniki, with a broad clientele, we are currently looking for a self-motivated Full Stack .NET Developer, to join its software development team.


Your day-to-day

We love your personality if you

What’s in it for you


A very competitive package, depending on level of experience. You will have the opportunity to work in a motivating environment as well as on large-scale digital and innovative projects.

  • Αναλυτική σκέψη
